DESCRIPTION

MADE FOR AUDIO PROFESSIONALS

The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) is thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built using the finest, most luxurious materials combined with cutting-edge planar magnetic technology in California, U.S.A. Audeze made sure that they closely match transducers and even the earpads by leather texture and colour. All the earpads are filled with carefully chosen acoustical foam for the best fit and sound.

EXTENDED FREQUENCIES & LOWER DISTORTION WITH FAZORS

Fazors are special acoustical elements positioned on either side of the magnetic structure. They enhance transparency by affecting the sound waves generated by large planar diaphragms. A few of the benefits include extended frequency response, improved high-frequency extension, and lowered distortion, with better imaging.

AUDEZE'S INNOVATIVE PLANAR MAGNETS

Acoustically engineered for accuracy Audezeâ€™s innovative planar magnetic technology delivers a clear and accurate sound that reveals everything on the recording. The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) has an efficient push-pull magnetic structure that is specially designed and self-closing. This ensures an acoustically transparent music listening experience. The Double-sided Neodymium magnet arrays deliver a uniform driving force across the entire diaphragm for a near-zero distortion.

PROPRIETARY LOTUS DIAPHRAGM FOR A SMOOTH SOUND

Audeze's proprietary Lotus diaphragm has a printed circuit across most of its surface and is capable of handling maximum continuous operating temperatures of over 400Â° F. This gives the drivers a smooth, resonance-free frequency response, excellent internal damping, edge damping, very low distortion and an extremely fast transient response.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

ENGINEERED TO PERFECTION

The M-Series ATH-M40x professional monitor headphones are tuned flat for incredibly accurate audio monitoring across an extended frequency range. Now enhance your studio experience with superior sound isolation and swiveling earcups for convenient one-ear monitoring.

40MM DRIVERS WITH RARE EARTH MAGNETS AND COPPER-CLAD ALUMINIUM WIRE VOICE COILS

CUTTING-EDGE ENGINEERING AND ROBUST CONSTRUCTION

The M40x, even though made of plastic, is known for its use of high quality textured matte construction and overall solid durability. The Pro grade material has been used for the ear cups as well as the headband.

The cups literally contour your ears and place them inside an air-tight enclosure that feels plush and comfortable. There is no pressure being placed against your ears as a roomy interior is provided. Circumaural design contours around the ears for excellent sound isolation in loud environments.

THE MOST TRUSTED HEADPHONE BY AUDEZE

The Audeze LCD-3 is a thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built headphone. ENJOY EXTENDED FREQUENCIES & LOWER DISTORTION

The LCD-3 uses Fazors, special acoustical elements positioned on either side of the magnetic structure. They enhance transparency by affecting the sound waves generated by large planar diaphragms. PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS, A BENCHMARK FOR STUDIO SOUND

The DT 990 Pro are circumaural headphones that house extremely strong neodymium magnet systems offering highly detailed sound reproduction quality. These open-back studio headphones are a reliable tool for professionals for mixing, mastering and recording purposes. The wide stereo image and three-dimensional sound reproduction make the beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro headphones a loyal companion for producers. Outstanding tonal depth ensures that even small changes in the positioning of the acoustic source can be perceived while mixing.

NATURAL BASS AND TREBLE

The open back design allows the headphones to breathe, which creates beautiful natural sounding music that you are bound to enjoy. These have a special diffuse-field design, that make these quality products apt for studio usage.The diaphragm has been made extremely light for better impulse performance. Also the high quality design only helps in better sonic experience delivering a surreal soundstage experience and natural sound.

OPEN CIRCUMAURAL DESIGN FOR DETAILING

TThe DT 990 Pro features an open-back circumaural over-the-ear design for rich audio performance that's designed for critical listening and a more natural sound stage. This increased efficiency also leaves the DT 990 Pro with greater power reserves for a succinct linear response that is especially suited for high-achieving audio applications where appropriate sonic reproduction is of paramount importance, and dedicated equipment is available such as a headphone amplifier.

ADJUSTABLE HEADBAND, VELOUR EARPADS FOR ADDED COMFORT

Beyerdynamic developed The DT series in order to deliver optimal sound in a wide variety of applications and situations.They're dynamic with their headphone designs well suited for a broad range of environments.

ERGONOMIC AND DURABLE BUILD SHOWCASING 90+ YEARS OF GERMAN EXCELLENCE

The headband has been made with solid spring steel that makes these headphones durable and adds to their comfort feature since they come with two pairs of earpads: Padded faux leather and Velour. The 990 Pro's Soft earpads and adjustable, sliding, earpieces together with a single-sided connecting cable ensure listening comfort during extended periods of use.

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 990 Pro model gives a neutral and clear sound.

Does Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a semi open over-the-ear headphone which gives a slightly increased sound isolation and reduced noise leakage

How is the overall fit?

Beyerdynamic DT 990Â Pro comes with an adjustable headband so that it firmly and comfortably cradles your head.

Does Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro have detachable cables?

No,it does not have detachable cable.

Which devices are compatible?

The DT 990 Pro is compatible with Android and iOS devices as well as studio monitoring eqiupments.

Is Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro good for long useage?

Yes, due to it being durable, lightweight and soft earpads make music listening for long hours comfortable

Does it need an Amplifier?

Yes, since the driver units are bigger, they will need an amplifier so that the headphones can performance to its full potential.

Which hard case can I buy for my Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro?

You can get the Beyerdynamic - DT Hard Case for your DT 990 Pro.

Why isn't there a 600-ohms version of DT 990 Pro?

Since most headphone output in professional environments isn't designed for 600-ohms headphones, Beyerdynamic only offers headphones with a maximum impedance of 250-ohms.

What is the technical difference between DT 880/990 edition and DT 880/990 Pro?

The Pro series is designed for professional users and the Edition series are designed for end users. Also, the Pro and Edition series do not differ noticeably in terms of sound provided that they have the same impedance (e.g. the 250 ohms DT 880 Edition and the 250 ohms DT 880 Pro sound the same).

How does the Tygr 300 R differ from the DT 880 Pro and the DT 990 Pro?

The DT 880 PRO has a very linear frequency response, while the DT 990 PRO has a slightly more accentuated bass and accordingly more present trebles for a pleasant balance. Both are primarily designed for studio applications. The TYGR 300 R focuses on gaming. Powerful bass and detailed accentuated treble go very well with gaming. However, the sound design of the DT 990 PRO has been further optimized for gaming, sometimes through the use of a special acoustic fleece.

How can I tell what the impedance of my DT 770/880/990 Edition is?

You check the impedance of the integrated sound transducers from the connection plug. The impedance is sometimes hot-embossed onto the plastic shaft of the plug: If there is nothing there, the model has an impedance of 250 ohms. If it reads 32 Î©, the model has an impedance of 32 ohms. If it reads 600 Î©, the model has an impedance of 600 ohms.

What do "impedance" and "ohms" mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î© like the T 1.

Are the DT 990 Pro Available with less headband pressure?

No, the professional headphones are only available with the defined headband pressure. If the headband pressure is too strong for you, you can slightly try to expand the installed spring steel in the headband. For this purpose, we recommend stretching the headphones gradually for a few hours over books or similar. You should choose the width a little bit wider than the width of your head.

SETTING THE BENCHMARK FOR STUDIO HEADPHONES

The Beyerdynamic DT 770 PRO is built as an ideal studio monitoring headphone suitable for the most demanding professional and audiophile applications such as for recording studios, post-production or broadcasting situations.

LOVED BY PRODUCERS, MIXING ENGINEERS, SOUND ENGINEERS AND AUDIOPHILES ALIKE

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 770 Pro model comes with a bass heavy and a clean powerful sound.

Are the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro ideal for DJs?

No, they are not. You can have a look at the V-MODA Crossfade LP2 as it is ideal for DJ and live shows.

Is the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro open-back?

No, it does not come with open-back design. If you are looking for a wide soundstage our top recommendation will be the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro. It features an open-back design with much more detailing as compared to the DT 770 PRO.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a closed-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music even better thanks to its natural noise isolation.

How is the overall fit?

Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro fits on the ear so don't go expecting the earcups to envelop your ears in lush comfort.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro have detachable cables?

No, Unfortunately it does not come with a detachable cable feature.

Do you need an Amplifier for 80 Ohms or 250 Ohms?

Yes, since the driver units are bigger, they will need an amplifier so that the headphones can performance to its full potential.

How do these stack up against Ultrasone Performance 820?

Apart from both these headphones being able to be driven easily by your smartphones it is also a choice between a warm and smooth sound against a balanced sound. Read more comparison between the two headphones here

Will the DT 1770 Pro replace the DT 770 Pro?

No, the DT 1770 Pro is an upgraded version of the DT 770 PRO, made for audio engineers, producers, and musicians who need a pair of high-end studio headphones without compromising on performance in all the aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories. The DT 770 Pro is for beginners who want a reliable, robust, and affordable pair of headphones to work with.

What is the difference between Pro and edition models of DT 770, DT 880, and DT 990?

The Pro series is designed for professional users and the Edition series are designed for end users. Also, the Pro and Edition series do not differ noticeably in terms of sound provided that they have the same impedance (e.g. the 250 ohms DT 880 Edition and the 250 ohms DT 880 Pro sound the same).

Which hard case can I buy for my DT 770 Pro?

You can get the Beyerdynamic - DT Hard Case for your DT 770 Pro.

Why isn't there a 600-ohms version of the DT 770 Pro models?

In professional environments most headphone outputs aren't designed for 600-ohms headphones, we only offer headphones with a maximum impedance of 250-ohms.

Why does my DT 770/990 Pro have another connection cable with a smaller thread?

In order to be able to plug the headphones with the 3.5 mm jack (unscrewed jack adapter) into a mobile device with a bumper, the M8 thread, which was previously available, was converted to a smaller M5 thread. If your headphones have such an M5 thread you will need an adapter. If you own an M8 threaded jack adapter you can still use it for your headphones, but only as a plug adapter.

What's the difference between the DT770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 Pro is made for beginners musicians, sound engineers, producers who are looking for a reliable, sturdy, and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 Pro was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

SETTING THE BENCHMARK FOR STUDIO HEADPHONES

The Beyerdynamic DT 770 PRO is built as an ideal studio monitoring headphone suitable for the most demanding professional and audiophile applications such as for recording studios, post-production or broadcasting situations.

LOVED BY PRODUCERS, MIXING ENGINEERS, SOUND ENGINEERS AND AUDIOPHILES ALIKE

Beyerdynamic DT770 Pro studio headphones have set an industry benchmark for reference audio sound and accurate sound reproduction. They are loved by music enthusiasts, music producers, sound engineers and broadcasters all over the world. These studio headphones are used in all the studios and have a great response towards the entire frequency range. It also delivers punchy detail in low frequency music.

YOUR STUDIO ON THE GO

DT770 Pro would never let you compromise with the studio sound you prefer to listen to, you can just hold them up and take them where you want.

CHOOSE THE RIGHT VARIANT FOR YOU

32Î© - The highly optimized 32 ohms variant is used for regular casual listening over laptops and smartphones. 80Î© - The 80 ohms is a wide choice for a range of studio applications. It is the most commonly used variant. 250Î© - The 250 ohms are more suitable for mixing and recording in the studios with audio interfaces and mixing desks.

EXCELLENT IMPULSE RESPONSE WITH A CLEAN SOUND

These studio headphones deliver a top-notch impulse response and exceptional isolation in a perfectly neutral listening environment. The high frequencies have detailed and differentiated sounds whereas the ultra-low bass sounds are defined and crispy.

SUPREME COMFORT WITH SUPERIOR VELOUR EARPADS

The DT 770 PRO comes with velour earpads while the 32 Ohm Limited Edition variant comes with leatherette earpads which is meant for long hours of wearing. The inner headband softly sits on the head and the nominal pressure of the headband is approx. 3.5 N which in simple terms means it gives adequate comfort.

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 770 Pro model comes with a bass heavy and a clean powerful sound.

Are the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro ideal for DJs?

No, they are not. You can have a look at the V-MODA Crossfade LP2 as it is ideal for DJ and live shows.

Is the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro open-back?

No, it does not come with open-back design. If you are looking for a wide soundstage our top recommendation will be the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro. It features an open-back design with much more detailing as compared to the DT 770 PRO.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a closed-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music even better thanks to its natural noise isolation.

How is the overall fit?

Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro fits on the ear so don't go expecting the earcups to envelop your ears in lush comfort.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro have detachable cables?

No, Unfortunately it does not come with a detachable cable feature.

Do you need an Amplifier for 80 Ohms or 250 Ohms?

Yes, since the driver units are bigger, they will need an amplifier so that the headphones can performance to its full potential.

How do these stack up against Ultrasone Performance 820?

Apart from both these headphones being able to be driven easily by your smartphones it is also a choice between a warm and smooth sound against a balanced sound. Read more comparison between the two headphones here

Will the DT 1770 Pro replace the DT 770 Pro?

No, the DT 1770 Pro is an upgraded version of the DT 770 PRO, made for audio engineers, producers, and musicians who need a pair of high-end studio headphones without compromising on performance in all the aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories. The DT 770 Pro is for beginners who want a reliable, robust, and affordable pair of headphones to work with.

What is the difference between Pro and edition models of DT 770, DT 880, and DT 990?

The Pro series is designed for professional users and the Edition series are designed for end users. Also, the Pro and Edition series do not differ noticeably in terms of sound provided that they have the same impedance (e.g. the 250 ohms DT 880 Edition and the 250 ohms DT 880 Pro sound the same).

Which hard case can I buy for my DT 770 Pro?

You can get the Beyerdynamic - DT Hard Case for your DT 770 Pro.

Why isn't there a 600-ohms version of the DT 770 Pro models?

In professional environments most headphone outputs aren't designed for 600-ohms headphones, we only offer headphones with a maximum impedance of 250-ohms.

Why does my DT 770/990 Pro have another connection cable with a smaller thread?

In order to be able to plug the headphones with the 3.5 mm jack (unscrewed jack adapter) into a mobile device with a bumper, the M8 thread, which was previously available, was converted to a smaller M5 thread. If your headphones have such an M5 thread you will need an adapter. If you own an M8 threaded jack adapter you can still use it for your headphones, but only as a plug adapter.

What's the difference between the DT770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 Pro is made for beginners musicians, sound engineers, producers who are looking for a reliable, sturdy, and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 Pro was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

DESCRIPTION

M-CLASS 40MM DUAL DIAPHRAGM DRIVERS, BUILT LIKE A TANK

Every V-MODA XS is tuned and trusted by V-MODA's golden ears, editors, audiophiles, producers and DJs on the forums and around the globe. Our M-Class series has won a record 22 Editorsâ€™ Choice Awards, are the top-reviewed by customers and voted #1 by the world's top DJs. Every M-Class 40mm dual-diaphragm with inner and outer rings delivers vibrant bass, vivids mids and vivacious highs without overlap. The noise-isolating design keeps outside sound away. The XS is built to stand the test of time. The headphones are engineered entirely from tough metal. These have been tested against various temperatures, salt spray, humidity, and UV exposure to give you military-grade durability. The STEEL FLEX Headband is virtually indestructible and can bend completely flat (around 10 times).

LASER ENGRAVING & 3-BUTTON REMOTE & MICROPHONE

With the XS, you can impose your brand's logo, or your name or anything you want, pretty much! Opt for a favorite design and have it engraved on the metal shields. Choose from around 12 colors and replace the interchangeable metal shields with a favorite color to remix your style. The V-MODA XS comes with detachable cables that make life easier. This cable can endure over a million bends (100x industry standard). The SpeakEasy Mic Cable is specially tuned for voice recognition and calls in the noisiest environments. Seamlessly compatible with all devices, the button control universally works with all 3.5mm smartphones and tablets.

EASY TO CARRY AROUND, DYNAMIX IN-EARS WITH STYLE

These in-ears are extremely small and they come with Exoskeleton case which easily fits in your hands and can be virtually stored anywhere. It also has a Carabiner which allows you to hang your case on the bag. These in-ears feature a Cliqfold Hinge which folds to a small size with a click. The wind-tunnel design of these in-ears is a result of more than 5 years of R&D. This design adjusts to the shape of your head to give you the best fit. The sleek design of this headphone frames the lines of your face and reduces the unnecessary gap. You can add more utility to this headphone with the help of BoomPro Mic particularly for gaming and voice all purposes or use a number of other cables as well for more versatility.

How does the V-MODA - XS sound?

The V-MODA - XS delivers an extra bass with a refined and vibrant bass, lifelike vocals and crisp highs in an immersive soundstage.

What is the impedance on the V-MODA - XS?

V-MODA - XS come with an impedance of 32 Ohms. Not power hungry. Unlike our politicians.

Will the V-MODA - XS require an amp?

Although your smartphone and laptop will be able to drive it. If you just want that extra bass to bleed and hence soothe your ears like a bass addict, get an Amp.

Can I take calls with the V-MODA - XS?

Yes, the V-MODA - XS does come with an in-line microphone that lets you take calls on the go.

Yes, you do get an exoskeleton case in the box.

DESCRIPTION

A BIG UPGRADE TO THE LITTLE LEGEND: ZST

The KZ ZST has been quite popular amongst audio enthusiasts and audiophiles, some even touting it as the Budget IEM King. Fine tuning the best and making it better after user feedback, the ZST X houses KZ' latest dynamic driver â€œXUNâ€ and 30095 high performance balanced armature, along with the upgraded cable and classic innovative transparent cyan and purple color. A perfect stepping stone to the audio world!

HYBRID COMBINATION OF 10MM XUN DYNAMIC DRIVER + 30095 BALANCED ARMATURE

The ZST X adopts the hybrid configuration from its brethren, to mix a 10mm large diameter dual magnetic driver with a 30095 balanced armature. The result is amazingly well with clean and tidy sound, fast and transient response while also maintaining the losslessness in high frequency. It provides rich and detailed performance, especially for the interpretation of different instrumental music.

UPGRADED 3 TUNING ACOUSTICS FOR A RICH, VIVID AND DETAILED SOUND

Tuning is vital and KZ delivers where it matters the most! Electronic frequency division and physical structure double tuning present a favorable sound, detailed and vivid sound.

100 CORE HIGH PURITY SILVER-PLATED 0.75MM 2-PIN DETACHABLE CABLE

ZST X adopts standard 100 core high-purity silver-plated cable for quality sound performance. The cable reduces the loss and distortion in transmission, ensuring crystal clear and rich sound. Detachable features provide full upgradeability for future replacement.

DETAILING DOWN TO THE (ZS)T

Details can either make it or mess it. The ZST X focuses on every detail. From the HD microphone to the patented soft silicone sleeve and the L/R mark on the earbuds, the ZST X offers great details and a slick design. Ergonomically comfortable, the ZST X provides ultra comfort even for long time wearing.

DESCRIPTION

THE PERFECT BLEND OF GREAT SOUND & CLASSY LOOKS

Enjoy an incredible, rich bass with the BLON BL-03. These in-ears use 10mm dynamic drivers with a carbon diaphragm. It restores the lower and mid-low frequencies for strong vocals. Add the stylish Kirsite metal housings and these look as good as they sound.

DESIGNED TO BE DURABLE & COMFORTABLE

BLON has crafted the BL-03's ear moulds using professional ear canal data analysis. The angle of the sound tube is adjusted and positioned according to the ear canal. This special shape offers superior comfort and enhances noise isolation. The housing is made from Kirsite and is polished for a mirror-like look. It is covered in an anti-skid and anti-scratches coating to prevent smudges and fingerprints.

HIGH-QUALITY CABLE THAT MAKES CALLING EASY

The high-quality detachable cable is created from four strands of anti-tension and anti-interference wire. It terminates in a 90-degree, 3.5mm gold-plated plug that's meant to last. The cable has an inline mic & remote to take and make calls.

DESCRIPTION

PERFECT BLEND OF HYBRID DESIGN AND SONIC EXCELLENCE

Cambridge Audio's all-new Dorado 2020 is an upgrade to the original Dorado launched in 2016. Dorado 2020 sports a fresh hybrid design while still retaining the legacy of the original. These IEMs have a simple yet powerful setup and it comprises one balanced armature driver and one dynamic driver. Dorado 2020 is designed to offer a true hybrid design and sonic excellence.

FEATURING A MIX OF A BALANCED AND A DYNAMIC DRIVER

Cambridge Audio Dorado 2020 comes with a single balanced armature driver along paired with a custom-tuned 10mm A.D.L.C. diaphragm dynamic driver. This allows you to enjoy sparkling highs as well as rich and dynamic bass. You also get to enjoy detailed and nuanced vocals.

BRINGING BACK THE CLASSIC CERAMIC BODY DESIGN

With Dorado and Vega, Cambridge Audio has come back to its original ceramic body design for its earphones. The density of ceramic excellently complements the dynamic drivers by keeping the vibrations under control. Moreover, ceramic has a feature of scratch resistance which adds to the durability of these IEMs. These ceramic shells have to undergo an intense sintering process followed by a polishing process which gives these shells an eye-catching and glossy look.

OFFERING ENHANCED SOUND ALONG WITH WEARING COMFORT

Dorado 2020 features machined brass spout with a â€˜gunmetal greyâ€™ P.V.D. finish. It has a unique conical shape and decreased diameter which enhances audio tuning as well as the wearing comfort. The balanced armature driver is installed at the centre of the spout. Its proximity to the exit enhances its presence.

EMPLOYING BEST COMPONENTS FOR EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE

With a simple philosophy of using the best components possible and let these IEMs shine, Dorado 2020 gives you the freedom to enjoy listening to music. These IEMs sport a clutter-free design, a single high frequency centric balanced armature and a custom-tuned dynamic driver.

What is the impedance on the Campfire Audio Dorado 2020?

The Campfire Audio Dorado 2020 comes with the impedance of 10Î©.

Do I need an amp to drive the Campfire Audio Dorado 2020?

Although your smartphone and laptop will be able to drive it, an amplifier would certainly bring out the true potential of the Campfire Audio Dorado 2020. Read more about amplification and why it's important here.

What does â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î©.

BOX CONTENTS
1. JH Audio - JH13V2 Pro Universal IEMs

2. Wax Tool

3. Screw Driver, used to adjust the variable bass

SERVICE DETAILS

WARRANTY
NA

DESCRIPTION

Yearlong Research for the Most Optimum Fit

JH Audio is renowned worldwide for their custom IEMs that provide deep bass response and excellent sonic performance. With this kind of expertise, it was only natural that the engineers fine tune their Universal IEMs fit-wise, to be as close to Custom IEMs as possible. JH Audioâ€™s guys analyzed over 30,000 sets of ear molds in their Orlando Lab to find similarities in order to create the Performance Series IEMs. What they found was that most of the sound bores on Custom IEMs bore a similarity of having a 10% angle. Having identified this, JH Audio made the necessary sound bore adjustments and refined the shape of the ear bowl and helix area. The result? A Universal IEM that fits and seals almost as well as a Custom IEM.

Jerry Harvey
Jerry Harvey started his career as a sound engineer and shortly he picked up the legendary band Van Halen. Jerry Harvey thus came about the world's first Custom In-Ear Monitor. This became extremely popular with the band members and then he started making them for other brands as well. Jerry finally founded JH audio in 2007 as a manufacturer of custom aviation headsets and then started producing the JH Audio Pro series for professionals and audiophiles alike.

Performance-Series

For a custom-like experience, Jerry Harvey Audio has introduced the Performance series Universal Fit IEMs. These Universal series allows you to hear the music how the recording artist and mix engineer intended. The models achieve what no others have before: a smaller shell size to ensure proper fit, retention and an acoustic seal for a perfect IEM experience.

Handcrafted in the US

Jerry Harvey Audio has manufactured the entire Performance Series Universal IEM range in their US facility. JH Audio sincerely believes in old school craftsmanship, while employing the most cutting edge technology in order to create the worldâ€™s greatest IEMs.

Triple Bore with FreqPhase Steel Tube Waveguide

The FreqPhase corrects time and phase of multiple drivers. The waveguide ensures each driver signal arrives within 0.01 milliseconds, leading to a Phase coherent IEM.

SoundrIVe Technology (Quad Driver Technology)

JH13V2 is equipped with SoundrIVe Technology, using Jerry Harvey Audioâ€™s proprietary mini quad drivers. The JH13V2 has a 8 balanced armature driver configuration: dual drivers for the lows, dual drivers for the mids, and quad drivers for the highs.

Stunning Custom Mahogany Faceplates
Everything about the JH Audio Performance Series of Universal IEMs is stunning. The JH13V2's new custom mahogany faceplates are adorned with oversized teal JH logos which you'd think look too over-the-top, but actually look pretty darn good-looking!

Assembled, Matched & Finished by Hand

The Performance Series is truly exquisite in its design. After the unique shells go through the 3D printing process, the Universal IEMs are then, one pair at a time, finished and assembled in the JHA facility. Unlike other manufacturers that only match their IEMs within 3db +/- of their reference curves, JH Audio tests and matches their Universal IEMs to within an astounding 1db +/- of their reference curve. This level of attention to detail is simply unheard in this industry.

State of the Art 3D Modeling & Printing Technology

JH Audio just invested in their very own 3D printing system that cost them a quarter of a million dollars. Whew! This investment has surely paid off as weâ€™ve not seen more gorgeous looking IEMs anywhere. Every single angle on the new Performance Series 3D shell has been carefully redesigned to be smaller and fit all kinds of ear sizes more naturally. The Performance Series IEMs and their fancy new shells give a perfect seal for a comfy fit every time.

Integrated 3-Way Crossover

The JH13V2 has an impressive and sophisticated crossover network. This crossover circuit combined with the Freqphase waveguide and new proprietary quad drivers deliver an audio quality that is perfect for the recording studio, or for listening to exactly what the mixer/producer and band wanted you to hear, mixing your own tracks or performing live.

Variable Bass Output that is Adjustable from the Cable

You can control the low frequency drivers with the adjustable bass (0 - +10dB) from the cable itself. Frequency ranges from flat bass response up to +10dB (10Hz to 100Hz).

title: Klipsch - The Fives
description:
Designed in USA

Two Way Active Bookshelf Speaker

Balanced Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Movies and TV

1 Year of Warranty

1" tweeter + 4.5â€ woofer

In-Built Amplifier 20Watt + 60Watt

Bluetooth with aptX HD & AAC

Pair with Television via HDMI

Pair with Turntable via Phono

Ideal for Rooms 75-150sq ft

DESCRIPTION

TRUE ENTERTAINMENT - FOR IMPROVED TV EXPERIENCE

Elevate your TV viewing experience to the next level with improved sound using the easy-to-use, powered, hi-fi, Fives speakers. These speakers connect with your TV easily and to other devices virtually.

TRUE HI-FI - FOR BIG AND BOLD SOUNDSTAGE

The Fives feature Klipsch's award-winning Reference acoustic horn-loaded technology. This technology includes dedicated left and the right speakers delivering big and bold soundstage, dynamic bass equalization for thumping bass output at any volume levels. Moreover, the 192kHz/24-bit decoding process helps for efficient sound reproduction of hi-res music.

TRUE CONNECTIVITY - FOR A RANGE OF CONNECTIVITY OPTIONS

These speakers are one of its kind speakers that come with powered monitors and have HDMI-ARC to directly connect to the TV. This will allow you to enjoy Hi-res 2-channel TV sound. These speakers also come with a phono preamp, Bluetooth 5, HDMI-ARC, digital optical, analog RCA and USB inputs, and a subwoofer output.

PREMIUM SPEAKERS WITH HI-FI SOUND AND EASY SETUP

The Klipsch The Fives is made with real wood finishes as well as high-grade premium metal accents and controls. These speakers are designed with premium materials and they offer a wide and immersive soundstage. With easy plug-and-play setup enjoy room-filling incredible sound with just a cable.

What is the warranty period on the Klipsch - The Fives?

Klipsch The Fives comes with 1 year of warranty. In case you ever need to raise a warranty request you could simply get in touch with us. You could raise the warranty here.

The Klipsch - The Fives delivers a powerful bass and great clarity over the vocals with a wide and immersive soundstage.

What is the connector type in the Klipsch - The Fives?

The 19 pin HDMI Type A, 4 pin USB Type B, RCA, RCA x 2, TOSLINK, mini-phone 3.5 mm are the following connectors supported by the Klipsch - The Fives.

What is the Bluetooth version on the Klipsch - The Fives?

The Klipsch - The Fives comes with the Bluetooth version 5.0.

How many drivers does the Klipsch - The Fives come with?

The Klipsch - The Fives features a 1â€ titanium dome LTS tweeter + 4.5â€ long-throw woofer that delivers a great balanced sound.

Are the grille removable?

Yes, it is removable and attached magnetically.

What is the max output power on the Klipsch - The Fives?

The Klipsch - The Fives has a max output power of 160 Watt.

title: Klipsch - RP-500M II
description:
Designed in USA

Two Way Passive Bookshelf Speaker

Balanced Sound Signature

Ideal for Movies and TV

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Audiophiles

2 Years of Warranty

1" Tweeter + 5.25â€ Woofer

Pair with 15Watt Amp

Ideal for Rooms 150-300sq ft

DESCRIPTION

FEATURING TRACTRIX HORN TECHNOLOGY

Klipsch RP-500M utilises Tractrix horn-loaded technology that directs high-frequency energy directly towards listeners. This helps in the elimination of unnecessary reverb generated by indirect sound bouncing off of walls. This results in a clear and detailed sound.

DELIVERING SMOOTHER FREQUENCY RESPONSE

Reference Premiere range of speakers from Klipsch is equipped with a compressed moulded silicone face which has 90Â° x 90Â° Tractrix horn. This minimizes horn resonance to deliver smoother frequency response. To add to the smoothness, Klipsch computer modelled phase plugs that offer a flat frequency response that shields tweeter from damage.

WITH VENTED TWEETER AND LINEAR TRAVEL SUSPENSION TECHNOLOGY

The venter tweeter design minimises standing waves caused by the tweeter diaphragm resulting in smoother frequency response. While the titanium tweeter diaphragm enhances the performance of the speaker. These speakers also come with award-winning Linear Travel Suspension technology leveraging the piston motion of the titanium diaphragm leading to low distortion and lifelike sound. These speakers sport ceramic magnet housing for superior performance and Klipsch Reference Premiere tweeters for standardized acoustic reproduction.

WITH KLIPSCH CERAMETALLIC WOOFERS

The Klipsch Proprietary Cerametallic woofers are a perfect blend of sound and design. These are light in weight and are made of robust materials while delivering bass with utmost efficiency. For excellent conductivity, Klipsch Cerametallic cones have a dual-layered copper-wound voice coil. Even at the lowest of the frequencies, these speakers produce perfect airflow with low distortion or turbulence, thanks to the rear Tractrix port perfectly tuned with the cabinet and woofers.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Klipsch - RP-500M?

Klipsch comes with 2 years of warranty. In case you ever need to raise a warranty request you could simply get in touch with us. You could raise the warranty here.

How does the Klipsch - RP-500M sound?

The Klipsch - RP-500M delivers a loud acoustics, crystal-clear sound and robust bass.

What is Hybrid Tractrix Horn Technology?

The Hybrid Tractrix Horn Technology ensures the high frequency of the Klipsch - RP-500M is directly aimed at the listener. This reduces unwanted, artificial reverb caused by indirect sound bouncing off the walls.

What is spun copper cerametallic woofers?

The cerametallic woofers are exceptionally rigid and lightweight for minimal distortion and maximum efficiency. When paired with the Tractrix horn-loaded LTS tweeter, it provides the highest speaker efficiency in its class.

Are the grille removable?

Yes, it is removable and attached magnetically.

What is the max output power on the Klipsch - RP-500M?

The Klipsch - RP-500M has a max output power of 300 Watt.

title: KZ - ZST X
description:
Chi-Fi Excellence

V-Shaped Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Commuting

Ideal for Taking Calls

1 BA + 1 DD Drivers

Replaceable 2-Pin Cables

Works with Android & iOS

Tangle-Free Silver-Plated Cables

Super Lightweight Design

The hybrid-driver ZST X packs a very lively V-shaped sound. The staging is wide and immersive. The shells are ergonomically shaped making them one of the most comfortable options at the price.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

A BIG UPGRADE TO THE LITTLE LEGEND: ZST

The KZ ZST has been quite popular amongst audio enthusiasts and audiophiles, some even touting it as the Budget IEM King. description:
Designed in USA

Two Way Passive Bookshelf Speaker

Balanced Sound Signature

Ideal for Movies and TV

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Audiophiles

2 Years of Warranty

1" Tweeter + 5.25â€ Woofer

Pair with 15Watt Amp

Ideal for Rooms 150-300sq ft

DESCRIPTION

FEATURING TRACTRIX HORN TECHNOLOGY

Klipsch RP-500M utilises Tractrix horn-loaded technology that directs high-frequency energy directly towards listeners. This helps in the elimination of unnecessary reverb generated by indirect sound bouncing off of walls. This results in a clear and detailed sound.

DELIVERING SMOOTHER FREQUENCY RESPONSE

Reference Premiere range of speakers from Klipsch is equipped with a compressed moulded silicone face which has 90Â° x 90Â° Tractrix horn. This minimizes horn resonance to deliver smoother frequency response. To add to the smoothness, Klipsch computer modelled phase plugs that offer a flat frequency response that shields tweeter from damage.

WITH VENTED TWEETER AND LINEAR TRAVEL SUSPENSION TECHNOLOGY

The venter tweeter design minimises standing waves caused by the tweeter diaphragm resulting in smoother frequency response. While the titanium tweeter diaphragm enhances the performance of the speaker. These speakers also come with award-winning Linear Travel Suspension technology leveraging the piston motion of the titanium diaphragm leading to low distortion and lifelike sound. These speakers sport ceramic magnet housing for superior performance and Klipsch Reference Premiere tweeters for standardized acoustic reproduction.

WITH KLIPSCH CERAMETALLIC WOOFERS

The Klipsch Proprietary Cerametallic woofers are a perfect blend of sound and design. These are light in weight and are made of robust materials while delivering bass with utmost efficiency. For excellent conductivity, Klipsch Cerametallic cones have a dual-layered copper-wound voice coil. Even at the lowest of the frequencies, these speakers produce perfect airflow with low distortion or turbulence, thanks to the rear Tractrix port perfectly tuned with the cabinet and woofers.

What is Hybrid Tractrix Horn Technology?

The Hybrid Tractrix Horn Technology ensures the high frequency of the Klipsch - RP-600M is directly aimed at the listener. This reduces unwanted, artificial reverb caused by indirect sound bouncing off the walls.

The cerametallic woofers are exceptionally rigid and lightweight for minimal distortion and maximum efficiency. When paired with the Tractrix horn-loaded LTS tweeter, it provides the highest speaker efficiency in its class.

Yes, it is removable and attached magnetically.

title: Sennheiser - HD 560S
description:
Designed in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

DESCRIPTION

EXPERIENCE THE TRUE SOUND OF MUSIC

If you are an audiophile you must be listening to music through a varied range of products like the headphone Amp's, computers and other audio devices. The Sennheiser HD 560s is designed to offer linear performance which allows audio enthusiasts to listen to their music in depth and detail.

OPEN EAR CUP DESIGN FOR NATURAL SOUND

The open ear cup design of the Sennheiser HD 560s allows for a free flow of sound waves. The driver unit is placed, keeping in mind E.A.R. (Ergonomic Acoustic Refinement) which sets up an optimal triangular listening position for hi-end sonic performance. It also leads to delivering a wide and clear soundstage for a natural and life-like music listening experience.

CUSTOM-TUNED TRANSDUCERS FOR SIGNATURE SENNHEISER SOUND

Sennheiser HD 560S features custom-tuned transducers designed for accurate sound reproduction for reliable /B comparisons of components, mixes, and media formats. It delivers natural sound along with enhanced bass. The all-new and improved 120-ohm transducer has a polymer blend in the membrane designed for linear excursion and better performance of above 10 Hz. Owing to the drive magnet and the damping system, HD 560 S offers distortion-free deep bass output and fatigue-free music listening.

FOR WHERE THERE IS MUSIC THERE IS COMFORT

Inspired by the sound of HD 660S and the comfort of ultralight HD 599, the Sennheiser HD 560s features comfortable music listening experience. The velour pads are super soft on the ears, while the open around the ear design offer real sound and also keeps your ears cool without warming up.

THE BEST OF CONNECTIVITY IS HERE

No matter which device you are using with the Sennheiser HD 560s, these headphones offer best-in-class connectivity. It comes with a 3-meter cable giving you enough space to reach your device while the 6.3mm / Â¼-inch plug allows you to connect to headphone Amp's and other high-grade audio devices. What is the warranty period on the Sennheiser HD 560S?

How does the Sennheiser HD 560S sound?

The HD 560S treats your ears to audiophile sound quality. With great clarity over the mids and the highs and itâ€™s wide soundstage takes your music listening experience to a next level.

Does the Sennheiser HD 560S come with a mic?

No, the Sennheiser HD 560S does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Can I use the Sennheiser HD 560S for long hours?

The Sennheiser HD 560S is made of lightweight durable plastics that allows you to use them for long hours without experiencing fatigue. The soft leather headband and over-ear design with memory foam earpads also helps in the same.

Do I require an amp to drive the Sennheiser HD 560S?

Yes, to bring the best of these headphones an Amp is recommended. You could have a look at our collection of portable Amps here and desktop Amps here.

What is the impedance on the Sennheiser HD 560S?

The Sennheiser HD 560S comes with the impedance of 120Î©.

What do â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î©.

description:

DESCRIPTION

FEATURES WORLD'S FIRST DIAPHRAGM IN NANOMETER THICKNESS

Experience exceptional sound reproduction with the HiFiMAN HE1000V2 as it features ultra-thin diaphragm with nanometer thickness. This breakthrough technology was developed by HiFiman and is used in headphones for the first time. This is the core of HIFIMAN HE1000V2 and leads to the production of a remarkable sound.

WITH ASYMMETRICAL MAGNETIC CIRCUIT AND WINDOW-SHADE SYSTEM

Enjoy sound with near-perfect sound reproduction that gets close to that of live music. The HE1000V2 features groundbreaking asymmetrical circuit design which is a result of around 7 years of in-depth research and analysis. Moreover, the patented window shade system protects the driver and optimized open-back design.

ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED WITH ADVANCED HEADBAND AND POLYESTER EARPADS

The headband of the HE1000V2 is ergonomically designed for comfort and it also adds to better reliability and durability. The new and improved headband can now adjust to a wide range of head sizes. These headphones are now lighter in weight and the ear cups are sleeker in look. The earcups are now thicker and asymmetrically shaped for comfort. Enjoy better sound transparency with polyester ear pads along with leather material around the earpad.

FINE SPECIMEN OF EXCELLENT CRAFTSMANSHIP

The excellent metal structure in the HE1000V2 is a result of CNC milling and hand polishing. Highly talented craftsmen have meticulously worked on surface finishing to meet the critical HiFiMAN standard. The design features and excellent craftsmanship makes HE1000V2 a luxury headphone that redefines the audio landscape.

USER REPLACEABLE CONNECTORS AND UPGRADED CABLE

The HIFIMAN HE1000V2 comes with three types of plugs: 6.35mm, 3.5mm, 4-pin XLR connectors allowing you to use it with a wide range of products. You can easily switch the plugs and can quickly connect with multiple cables and amps. The HE1000V2 comes with newly upgraded cable as well, with more durable materials. This cable is designed to offer a wide frequency range, reduced signal loss and improved focus on the low end for quality audio reproduction. The HIFIMAN HE1000V2 inherits the best of its older variant while also providing user-friendly pairing with amplifiers. This allows you to listen to all the nuances of your sound.

What do â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î©.

title: Shure - AONIC 5
description:
Designed in USA

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Stage & Live Shows

3 X Balanced Armature Drivers

Works with Android & iOS

Super Lightweight Design

DESCRIPTION

TRIPLE THE DRIVERS, THREE TIMES THE DETAILING

The tri-driver Balanced Armature earphone from Shure, the AONIC 5 earphone features immersive and detailed sound through three balanced armature design and unique acoustic pathway. Experience comfort and immersive audio wherever you go while hearing music the way it was meant to be heard.

SLEEK, EARHOOK STYLE DESIGN HOUSING A TRIPLE BALANCED ARMATURE DRIVER FOR A FULL-RANGE SOUND

The earphones are designed for long-wearing comfort from the smallest dimensions in the AONIC line. Experience a full range sound from a triple balanced armature combination that delivers a warm, detailed sound.

SHURE'S SOUND ISOLATINGâ„¢ TECHNOLOGY

An ergonomic design with foam tips ensures blocks up to 37 dB of noise to eliminate distractions. Enjoy the most immersive listening experience no matter where you are.

DETACHABLE MMCX OPTION ALLOWS YOU TO CHOOSE FROM A HOST OF DIFFERENT CABLES

A detachable MMCX cable option allows you to or direct connection to laptops, in-flight entertainment systems and other mobile devices. Secure, over-the-ear design with wireform fit ensures earphones stay in place and cables remain out of the way. The debatable cable opens possibilities for separately available Secure Fit Wireless Adapter, or connect to other MMCX cable accessories for further customization. Stay connected to any device, no matter where you are.

THE ULTIMATE HANDS-FREE COMPANION WITH UNIVERSAL COMPATIBLITY

The integrated remote + mic ensures easier communication and a seamless control for phone calls and easily accessible operation of voice commands, volume and music playback. A 3.5 mm connection ensures it is compatible with Apple & Android devices.

RUGGED, DURABLE BUILD WITH A TWO-YEAR WARRANTY

These are engineered for professional wear and tear to ensure a lifetime of use.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Shure - AONIC 5?

The warranty period for all Shure products is 2 year. Read more information on Shure warranty.

How comfortable are the Shure - AONIC 5?

Since the Shure - AONIC 5 is an in the ear product so it depends on your ear size and which earbud fits you perfectly for which the brand provides a variety of ear tips. Because the earphones contour around the ear, however, you should find that you have a better security of fit.

Which Comply tips can I use with my Shure - AONIC 5?

The Comply - 100 Series will be compatible with your Shure - AONIC 5.

Does the Shure - AONIC 5 come with mic?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 5 does come with an inline microphone and 3 button remote.

Are the cables detachable?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 5 comes with detachable MMCX cables.

Will the Shure - AONIC 5 work with my smartphone?

Yes the Shure - AONIC 5 is fully compatible to work with Android and iOS devices.

What do â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î©.

How many drivers does the Shure - AONIC 5 come with?

The Shure - AONIC 5 features 3x Balanced Armature features immersive and detailed sound through three balanced armature design and unique acoustic pathways.

WARRANTY AND MEDIA REVIEWS

2 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Shure AONIC 5 comes with a 2 year warranty from Shure that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Shure's warranty in India.

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. DESCRIPTION

THIRD TIME'S THE CHARM, RICHTIG SO

The newest iteration marks a milestone in beyerdynamic's flagship model: T1. With the third generation, beyerdynamic have raised the bar once again in both standards of sound and design. Handmade by beyerdynamic in Heilbronn, Germany, the T1 looks, feels and sounds one step closer to perfection.

AUF WIEDERSEHEN TO BAD SOUND WITH FINE-TUNED DRIVERS AND GREAT SOUND

beyerdynamicâ€™s T1 headphones are known for their uncompromising, clear sound quality. With the 3rd generation, they've managed to now make them even better: The third-generation T1 achieves more precision, better staging and a natural reproduction of high mid-range frequencies.

WILLKOMMEN ALL-NEW IMPROVED TESLA DRIVER TECHNOLOGY

The T1 features the legendary Tesla technology. The Tesla drivers are designed, developed, manufactured and individually measured by beyerdynamic at their German headquarters.They're synced and fine-tuned together to ensure extreme precision and particularly realistic sound.

WUNDERSCHÃ–NEN SOPHISTICATED OPEN-BACK DESIGN FOR A NATURAL SOUND AND WIDER STAGE

For its look, the T1 model draws on the design of its open-back sibling, the T1, replicating the sophisticated surface structure of the housing. The T1 isn't optimally designed to cancel out external and ambient noise, as the T1 has acoustic openings and is designed as a open-back headphone.

PERFEKT SPATIALITY AND OPEN-BACK DESIGN FOR WIDER, NATURAL SOUND

The T1 is recommended for quieter environments thanks to its open-back design. The open-back nature makes it a little susceptible to sound leakage. The T1â€™s drivers are tilted to achieve the most spatial sound signature possible. As a result, the music appears â€œin frontâ€ on centre stage. As an alternative to the T1, the T5 is available with a closed-back design.

HI-RES ZERTIFIZIERUNG FOR LOSSLESS AUDIO PLAYBACK

The T1 headphones are also Hi-Res Audio certified and provide lossless high-resolution sound. This means your music of choice keeps all of its musical details and nuances during playback and sounds as close as possible to the original recording.

FINEST MATERIAL OF BESTE QUALITÃ„T MAKES IT A HI-END THROUGH AND THROUGH

The T1 screams quality through and through. Only high-quality materials are used in the T1 headphones. The housing covers are made from finely brushed, lacquered aluminium. The plug-in cables are covered in fabric and contain conductors made from ultra-high-purity OCC7N copper ensuring optimum signal transmission. The use of AlcantaraÂ® gives the model that certain something that elevates it to a truly high-end set of headphones.

MEMORY FOAM EARPADS DESIGNED FOR EXTREME KOMFORT

The replaceable ear pads made from protein-coated leatherette contain a multi-layer filling which helps fine-tune the sound while also making the headphones extremely comfortable to wear. One of the layers is made from memory foam which adapts to each user and ensures an excellent customised fit. As a result, nothing can stand in the way of a long listening session.

What is the difference between t1 / t5 (3rd generation) and their predecessors?

The T1 comes up with gently intensified bass to give the very authentic, spatial sound signature more warmth for even more enjoyment. The T5 achieves a more realistic reproduction of high mid-range frequencies. Especially voices and instruments are much clearer and more accentuated.

Why do Beyerdynamic - T 1 (3rd generation) have an impedance of 32 ohms?

The Tesla transducers used in T1 (3rd generation) have been optimised to an impedance of 32 ohms. As a result, these headphones achieve the highest performance and best sound quality on all music sources, both stationary amplifiers and mobile players.

DESCRIPTION

PERFECTION JUST GOT AN UPGRADE!

The original STAX SR-Lamda series was introduced over 36 years ago. The SR-L500MK2 has taken the excellent sound of the original series and combined it with a newly designed enclosure. The STAX SR-L500MK2 is an advanced Earspeaker that features tough stainless fixed electrodes and a hand-selected thin-film diaphragm. Expect the perfect balance of delicate treble, soothing mids and deep bass.

DESIGNED FOR LONG LISTENING SESSIONS

The SR-L500MK2 has been designed keeping comfort and long listening sessions in mind. The headband (ARC) has a 10-click slider mechanism that allows you to adjust the head pad's height. Once adjusted, the slider ensures that it stays put doing away with the need of constantly readjusting the height. The plush handcrafted earpads are made of high-quality synthetic leather that adds to the comfort as well as the sound performance.

CABLES THAT ARE DESIGNED FOR PERFECTION

The detachable cable uses HiFCâ„¢ (High-Performance Pure Copper) wires developed by Hitachi. These wires have the same sonic characteristics as the SR-009 and SR-L500's 6N high-purity 99.99999% copper wires. The cable is designed in a wide, flat format to reduce the capacitance between each wire and drive the SR-L500MK2 in a more effective manner.

description:

The Balanced Armatures adds the Pro, while the dynamic driver adds the X. The Hybrid drivers tag team to offer a sound that is unheard of, at a price point unseen.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

UPGRADED KZ ZSN PRO X FEATURING A HYBRID DRIVER SETUP

There has been a significant number of changes done to the all-new KZ ZSN Pro X. It features a customised 30095 high frequency balanced armature and a 10mm mid-bass low-frequency dynamic driver in a hybrid setup. Tuned flawlessly by a dedicated team of acoustic engineers, the KZ ZSN Pro X has a balanced armature driver. Dynamic lows, soothing mids and clear highs are adjusted to perfection. So the next time you can enjoy the vocals of your favourite artist in great detail and accuracy. You also get a brand-new high-purity silver-plated cable which improves the performance of the highs and the lows. The blend of metal and resin design along with bright colour options gives the KZ ZSN Pro X a refreshing new look.

HIGH-GRADE ACOUSTIC TECHNOLOGY FOR UNRIVALLED SONIC PERFORMANCE

These earphones come with a refined and dynamic 10mm dual magnetic driver delivering sonic excellence. Oftentimes, magnetic drivers have to deal with magnetic gaps but that's not the case with the KZ ZSN Pro X. The magnetic driver of the ZSN Pro X is optimised to reduce magnetic gaps and to prevent eddy current loss. This paves the way for an enhanced low-frequency power and allows for wider frequency response ensuring a comprehensive music listening experience.

COMFORT ELEVATING FIT FOR PERFECT NOISE ISOLATION

The in-ear fit is all about comfort. Comfort that helps you enjoy your music even for extended hours. The KZ ZSN Pro X offers that comfort with an ergonomically designed curved cavity. This cavity is uniquely engineered to ensure that comfort is not lost even when you are wearing these earphones for too long. Not just that, this comfort-elevating fit also leads to effective noise isolation for peaceful music listening.

PREMIUM 100 CORE SILVER-PLATED CABLE WITH HD MICROPHONE AND IN-LINE CONTROLS

The cable bundled with the KZ ZSN Pro X is built with high-quality materials, offering superior audio transmission. This cable features 100 core high-purity silver-plated cable with 4 strands of wire tightly wound, elevating the audio resolution. The result of this cable is wide and natural-sounding audio with minimum distortion and loss in signal transmission. These cables come embedded with an HD condenser microphone allowing communication. This microphone is a high-quality mic capable of transmitting clean audio. There are quick-access functions assigned to the button on the microphone housing and it allows for receiving calls, rejecting calls, playing/pausing music and changing the songs played. This is truly useful as you donâ€™t need to access your devices to execute these frequently used functions.

2PIN CONNECTOR WITH DETACHABLE CABLE ALLOWING FOR UPGRADABILITY

The design for the KZ ZSN Pro X is carefully engineered, featuring a 2PIN connector and detachable cables. The detachable nature of the cable allows the earphones to be able to attach to different cable accessories. KZ ZSN PRO X supports the additional Bluetooth module and can be easily upgraded to a wireless headset.

FEATURING ALLOY-SHELL DESIGN WHICH GIVES A STUNNING LOOK TO YOUR KZ ZSN PRO X

The streamlined metal and resin design gives a strikingly unique look to your KZ ZSN Pro X. The colours breathe new life into the design. High-grade Zinc Alloy is used for the faceplate while the cavity uses imported resin. The blend of unique materials and the use of a wide range of colour options add a modern look to the KZ ZSN Pro X.

The blend of metal and resin design along with bright colour options gives the KZ ZSN Pro X a refreshing new look.

HIGH-GRADE ACOUSTIC TECHNOLOGY FOR UNRIVALLED SONIC PERFORMANCE

These earphones come with a refined and dynamic 10mm dual magnetic driver delivering sonic excellence. Oftentimes, magnetic drivers have to deal with magnetic gaps but that's not the case with the KZ ZSN Pro X. The magnetic driver of the ZSN Pro X is optimised to reduce magnetic gaps and to prevent eddy current loss. This paves the way for an enhanced low-frequency power and allows for wider frequency response ensuring a comprehensive music listening experience.

COMFORT ELEVATING FIT FOR PERFECT NOISE ISOLATION

The in-ear fit is all about comfort. Comfort that helps you enjoy your music even for extended hours. The KZ ZSN Pro X offers that comfort with an ergonomically designed curved cavity. This cavity is uniquely engineered to ensure that comfort is not lost even when you are wearing these earphones for too long. Not just that, this comfort-elevating fit also leads to effective noise isolation for peaceful music listening.

PREMIUM 100 CORE SILVER-PLATED CABLE WITH HD MICROPHONE AND IN-LINE CONTROLS

The cable bundled with the KZ ZSN Pro X is built with high-quality materials, offering superior audio transmission. This cable features 100 core high-purity silver-plated cable with 4 strands of wire tightly wound, elevating the audio resolution. The result of this cable is wide and natural-sounding audio with minimum distortion and loss in signal transmission. These cables come embedded with an HD condenser microphone allowing communication. This microphone is a high-quality mic capable of transmitting clean audio. There are quick-access functions assigned to the button on the microphone housing and it allows for receiving calls, rejecting calls, playing/pausing music and changing the songs played. This is truly useful as you donâ€™t need to access your devices to execute these frequently used functions.

2PIN CONNECTOR WITH DETACHABLE CABLE ALLOWING FOR UPGRADABILITY

The design for the KZ ZSN Pro X is carefully engineered, featuring a 2PIN connector and detachable cables. The detachable nature of the cable allows the earphones to be able to attach to different cable accessories. KZ ZSN PRO X supports the additional Bluetooth module and can be easily upgraded to a wireless headset.

FEATURING ALLOY-SHELL DESIGN WHICH GIVES A STUNNING LOOK TO YOUR KZ ZSN PRO X

The streamlined metal and resin design gives a strikingly unique look to your KZ ZSN Pro X. The colours breathe new life into the design. High-grade Zinc Alloy is used for the faceplate while the cavity uses imported resin. The blend of unique materials and the use of a wide range of colour options add a modern look to the KZ ZSN Pro X.

description:

DESCRIPTION

A REVOLUTION IN HEADPHONE TECHNOLOGY

The first of its kind, full-fledged Air Motion Transformer (AMT) headphones are here. Geared particularly towards audiophiles and professional recording artists around the world, the HEDDphone features AMT which is an electrodynamic transducer that enables faster airflow compared to ordinary systems.

VVTÂ® DIAPHRAGM THAT'S BETTER THAN YOUR AVERAGE DIAPHRAGM

The HEDDphone uses the patent-pending VVTÂ® diaphragm. It extends the AMT principle to a linear full-range headphone transducer using the latest diaphragm geometry. This upgraded folded diaphragm lets air out four times faster and allows the playback of even the little nuances in the audio recording.

INTRODUCING THE 4TH DRIVER TECHNOLOGY

The HEDDphone presents a fourth transducer technology that brings high levels of dynamic capabilities and advanced sonic clarity through the AMT principle to high-end headphones. It is designed to deliver excellent performance through precise, unaltered and impactful sound reproduction.

30+ YEARS OF HEDDPHONE INNOVATION

It all began 30 years ago with HEDD Audio CEO and Chief Engineer Klaus Heinz designing the first AMT tweeter that was inspired by Oskar Heilâ€™s original Air Motion Transformer invention. Since then, it has seen a lot of sonic advancements in its revised versions over the years. The latest (2019) AMT version can be heard in HEDD AudioÂ´s ONE studio monitor line.

The HEDDphone comes with extra soft earpads and itâ€™s over-ear design makes them comfortable to wear for long hours.

Are the cables on the HEDD Audio - HEDDphone detachable?

Yes, the cables are indeed detachable. Making for easy storage and convenient for whenever you want to replace or upgrade cables.

What is the impedance on the HEDD Audio - HEDDphone?

The HEDD Audio - HEDDphone Pro comes with impedance of 42Î©.

What do â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î©.

Enjoy an incredible, rich bass with the BLON BL-03. These in-ears use 10mm dynamic drivers with a carbon diaphragm. It restores the lower and mid-low frequencies for strong vocals. Add the stylish Kirsite metal housings and these look as good as they sound.

BLON has crafted the BL-03's ear moulds using professional ear canal data analysis. The angle of the sound tube is adjusted and positioned according to the ear canal. It is covered in an anti-skid and anti-scratches coating to prevent smudges and fingerprints.

description:

Active Noise Cancellation

Why should you get the Shure AONIC 50? Simply put, it's the best sounding wireless headphones available in the segment. For audiophiles looking for great sound on the move as well as active noise cancellation, the Shure AONIC 50 is a winner.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

SUPREME STUDIO QUALITY SOUND. MINUS THE WIRES.

The Shure AONIC 50 has been designed as a premium, wireless, noise cancelling headphone that doesn't compromise on sound despite losing the wires. Studio-quality sound engineered from decades of professional experience. They're designed with the purview of providing supreme studio-grade wireless sound on the go.

LET YOUR MUSIC DISTURB YOU. NOTHING ELSE.

THE AONIC 50 offers on-demand noise cancellation. These adjustable noise cancellation headphones allow you to fine-tune the control of the NC levels thereby eliminating distractions for a truly immersive listening experience. Environment mode allows you to hear the outside world with the flip of a switch.

"The Shure Aonic 50 is perhaps the most detailed, analytical, and to-the-point pair of wireless headphones you can buy right now, thanks to focused tuning and wide Bluetooth codec support."
-Ali Pardiwala

20 HOURS OF WIRELESS MUSIC, UNLIMITED ON WIRES

Keeping longer listening durations in mind, Shure AONIC 50 noise cancelling headphones offer up to 20 hours battery life provides uninterrupted audio on the move! In case your battery runs out, you can connect to wired sources with 3.5mm analog audio input to stay connected to any device, including airplane entertainment systems, or USB-C digital input for charging and High-Resolution audio.

SUPPORTS MULTIPLE CODECS OVER BLUETOOTH 5.0 FOR LOSSLESS WIRELESS AUDIO

The Shure AONIC 50 has been designed to deliver a studio-grade sound over Bluetooth v5, despite losing the wires. It supports different codecs like QualcommÂ® aptXâ„¢, aptXâ„¢ HD, aptXâ„¢ Low Latency audio, Sony LDAC, AAC and SBC ensuring a seamless, lossless wireless CD-quality audio that Shure has come to be known for.

SHUREPLUSâ„¢ PLAY APP FOR COMPLETE CUSTOMISATION

Take complete control of your Shure headphones with the ShurePlusâ„¢ PLAY app. It allows you to customize your noise cancellation levels and Environment Mode levels. Available to download for iOS and Android.

DESIGNED KEEPING YOUR COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE IN MIND

Designed and engineered after decades of experience, the Shure AONIC 50 has been designed for long listening sessions, keeping your comfort and durability in mind. A solid, rigid built worthy to withstand the wear and tear on a daily basis. These noise cancelling headphones are equipped with touch controls for quick access to answer calls, adjust volume, or pause your music with the push of a button.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Shure and how do I claim Warranty?

The warranty period for all Shure products is 2 year. Read more information on Shure warranty.

How does the Shure - AONIC 50 sounds?

The Shure AONIC 50 has been designed as a premium, wireless headphone that doesn't compromise on sound despite losing the wires. Studio-quality sound engineered from decades of professional experience.

How comfortable are the Shure - AONIC 50?

The Shure - AONIC 50 is designed and engineered after decades of experience, the Shure AONIC 50 have been designed for longer listening sessions, keeping your comfort and durability in mind.

What is the battery life in the Shure - AONIC 50?

The Shure - AONIC 50 has a 20-hour battery life. Enough to last numerous movies, games and music listening sessions.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 come with ambient sound?

Shure - AONIC 50 blocks out ambient noise thanks to its ANC (Active Noise Cancellation) feature which works in combination with its excellent passive noise attenuation and perfect fit in the ear canal. This allows you to create a relaxing sound environment and to enjoy its superior hi-fi sound even in noisy environments such as on trains or in busy offices.

Can I use the Shure - AONIC 50 with my smartphone?

Yes, you can easily pair the Shure - AONIC 50 with any Android and iOS devices.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 supports Siri or Google Assistant?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 does support Siri and Google Assistant.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 come with a carry case?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 does come with a carrying pouch in the box.

Can I use the Shure - AONIC 50 wired as well?

Yes, since the Shure - AONIC 50 comes with a 3.5mm connection you can use them as wired headphones as well.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 come with app control?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 comes with app control, through which you can personalise your listening experience.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 support aptX?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 does support Bluetooth codecs like LDAC. aptX HD, aptX LL and AAC.

What is the wireless range of the Shure - AONIC 50?

The Shure - AONIC 50 has a wireless range of 10m when connected to any Bluetooth devices.

Which Bluetooth version does Shure - AONIC 50 come with?

The Shure - AONIC 50 come with the latest Bluetooth version 5.0

What kind of charger should I use to charge the Shure - AONIC 50?

The best option is to use a 5V output charging source with the included Shure type-C cable. DO NOT use external chargers with output voltage above 5V (e.g. 9V, 12V etc.) as they might cause damages to the headphones.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Shure and how do I claim Warranty?

The warranty period for all Shure products is 2 year. Read more information on Shure warranty.

How does the Shure - AONIC 50 sounds?

The Shure AONIC 50 has been designed as a premium, wireless headphone that doesn't compromise on sound despite losing the wires. Studio-quality sound engineered from decades of professional experience.

How comfortable are the Shure - AONIC 50?

The Shure - AONIC 50 is designed and engineered after decades of experience, the Shure AONIC 50 have been designed for longer listening sessions, keeping your comfort and durability in mind.

What is the battery life in the Shure - AONIC 50?

The Shure - AONIC 50 has a 20-hour battery life. Enough to last numerous movies, games and music listening sessions.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 come with ambient sound?

Shure - AONIC 50 blocks out ambient noise thanks to its ANC (Active Noise Cancellation) feature which works in combination with its excellent passive noise attenuation and perfect fit in the ear canal. This allows you to create a relaxing sound environment and to enjoy its superior hi-fi sound even in noisy environments such as on trains or in busy offices.

Can I use the Shure - AONIC 50 with my smartphone?

Yes, you can easily pair the Shure - AONIC 50 with any Android and iOS devices.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 supports Siri or Google Assistant?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 does support Siri and Google Assistant.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 come with a carry case?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 does come with a carrying pouch in the box.

Can I use the Shure - AONIC 50 wired as well?

Yes, since the Shure - AONIC 50 comes with a 3.5mm connection you can use them as wired headphones as well.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 come with app control?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 comes with app control, through which you can personalise your listening experience.

Does the Shure - AONIC 50 support aptX?

Yes, the Shure - AONIC 50 does support Bluetooth codecs like LDAC. aptX HD, aptX LL and AAC.

What is the wireless range of the Shure - AONIC 50?

The Shure - AONIC 50 has a wireless range of 10m when connected to any Bluetooth devices.

Which Bluetooth version does Shure - AONIC 50 come with?

The Shure - AONIC 50 come with the latest Bluetooth version 5.0

What kind of charger should I use to charge the Shure - AONIC 50?

The best option is to use a 5V output charging source with the included Shure type-C cable. DO NOT use external chargers with output voltage above 5V (e.g. 9V, 12V etc.) as they might cause damages to the headphones.
