DESCRIPTION

6 DRIVERS FOR A SPACIOUS SOUND

Experience an open, spacious sound with the VISION EARS VE6 XControl. The 4-way system with 6 drivers offer outstanding clarity and detailed sound. It consists of 2 drivers for the bass, 2 for the mids, 1 for the high-mids and 1 for the treble.

YOUR SOUND, THE WAY YOU LIKE IT

Customise your VE6 XControl's sound however you like. You can pick between two different sound signatures. The two micro-switches on the faceplates let you choose between: X1: Offers a boost in the bass and high mids. Punchy sound without overpowering other frequencies. X2: Offers a neutral sound with detailed audio across the frequency range.

TAKE A TRIP TO MUSIC ELYSIUM

Take a trip to music paradise with the VISION EARS ELYSIUM. The hybrid driver configuration has resulted in a sound that's pure, brilliant and alive, with every emotion intact. The BA technology creates a stunning layered bass response. The dynamic driver enables smooth and vivid mids. The state-of-the-art dual electrostatic tweeter offers airy, crystal-clear highs. It comes with a premium 8-wire SPC 28 AWG cable that terminates in a 2.5mm OYAIDE balanced connector.

title: Dan Clark Audio - AEON 2 Open
description:
Designed & Made in the USA

Balanced Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

2 Years of Warranty

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

MEET THE UPGRADED VERSION OF THE ORIGINAL AEON FLOW

The Dan Clark Audio AEON 2 Open is an upgraded open-back version of the original AEON Flow. These headphones were popular among critics and audio lovers alike due to their stylish industrial design, great sound and exceptional value. The Ã†ON 2 Open includes these award-winning elements along with the state-of-the-art driver technology of the award-winning flagshipâ€”the ETHER 2.

NEWLY UPDATED DRIVER FOR MORE DETAILED & IMMERSIVE SOUND

The newly updated driver has been flipped by 180 degrees to remove all motor structures between the driver and the ear for better resolution and a wider, more immersive soundstage. It features superior damping for improved resolution, dynamics and a smoother frequency response. Streamlined precision-machined single-piece flow elements completely remove voids and stray air paths within the motor to improve internal airflow. The AEON 2 Open delivers detailed treble, transparent mids and visceral bass.

MADE TO BE YOUR CONSTANT COMPANION

The AEON 2 Open features an all-new collapsable gimbal that allows this full-sized headphone to fold to become really compact and tiny. Just slip it into the case and carry it anywhere. The cast aluminium baffle has been replaced with real carbon fibre cup inserts. It has a stylish red finish with black anodizing. You get to pick between Dan Clark Audio's DUMMER (Distinctly Un-Magical) and VIVO cables as well as between multiple connectors and cable lengths for the best experience ever.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

EFFICIENCY
94dB

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
Yes

IMPEDANCE
13 ohms

CONTROLS & CONNECTIVITY

CABLE
Detachable 2m premium dual-entry cable with 3.5mm and 1/4" termination

DESIGN & BUILD

WEARING STYLE
Over-Ear

WEIGHT
327gr

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS
1. Dan Clark Audio AEON 2 Open

2. 77" Audio cable (3.5mm plug)

3. Screw-on 3.5mm-to-1/4" adapter (installed)

4. 3 Pairs of tuning pad inserts

5. Cleaning cloth

6. Quick User Guide

7. Certificate of Authenticity

WARRANTY AND MEDIA REVIEWS

2 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Dan Clark Audio AEON 2 Open comes with a 2 year warranty from Dan Clark Audio that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Dan Clark Audio's warranty in India.

GOLD AWARD
Major HiFi Dec, 2019

APPLAUSE AWARD
Stereonet May, 2020

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
Hi-fi News May, 2020

PRODUCT OF THE YEAR
Headphone Guru Nov, 2019

"Elegantly balanced and multidimensional, with a classy level of warmth and color, as well a lot more charisma than its predecessor. The Aeon 2 is a tough competitor at this price point"
Read More

"There may be better choices of headphones if you specifically favour acoustic-lead jazz music, these are perhaps the finest planar headphones available for the audiophile on the go right now."
Read More

"On top it comes with a very clever folding mechanism that transforms them into a very small and compact package. Itâ€™s a portable package through and through."
Read More

"The Aeon 2 open back headphones are a collective sum of everything Dan Clark has learned over the past few years of headphone making.The headphone is a continuation of what he is best at doing."
Read More

title: Campfire Audio - Cascade
description:
Designed in USA

Extra Bass Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

42mm Beryllium Dynamic Drivers

Metal Build

Tangle Resistant Litz Cables

Replaceable Cables

The Cascade has to be the Bass lover's favorite headphone of all time. The soundstage is deceptively wide, but the USP has to be the incredible low end. It's unapologetic, it's fun. It blows your socks off. And that's rare in the Audiophile space.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

RESULT OF THREE YEARS OF ENGINEERING DEDICATION

Campfire Audio has dedicated three years of engineering to develop Campfire Audio Cascade with its classic signature sound. This is a portable headphone with closed-back design. Even though its closed-back, it delivers results better than open-back headphones. The highlight of this headphone is its excellent sound that sets Campfire Audio apart from its competitors.

FEATURING A POWERFUL 42MM BERYLLIUM PVD DRIVER

Experience wide soundstage with the new Campfire Audio Cascade. This headphone offers the best open sound which does not limit the listening space. The sonic features of these headphones go beyond the limits of closed-back headphones. At the heart of Cascade is the powerful 42mm Beryllium PVD Driver that delivers impactful sound with precision and detail. You will enjoy effective high frequencies and controlled bass as well.

PORTABLE-FRIENDLY HEADPHONE MADE FOR MUSIC ON-THE-GO

The Campfire Audio Cascade is designed for music while travelling. Be it in your house or while travelling, Cascade will always be your music relief staying with you all the time. With high-frequency extension and a wide soundstage, you are assured of getting the best-in-class music experience.

DESIGNED WITH HIGH-GRADE DURABLE COMPONENTS

Cascade is a fine specimen of portable audiophile headphone and is made of highly durable premium materials. The body of Cascade is lightweight and is made of machined aluminium cups along with stainless steel materials. This makes the headphone portable and adds to its durability. The earpads are made of premium sheepskin which is not only comfortable but is perfect for noise isolation. This will allow you to listen to your favourite music without any kind of external disturbances.

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

DESCRIPTION

MEET THE UPGRADED VERSION OF THE ORIGINAL AEON FLOW

The Dan Clark Audio AEON 2 Closed is an upgraded closed-back version of the original AEON Flow. These headphones were popular among critics and audio lovers alike due to their stylish industrial design, great sound and exceptional value. The AEON 2 Closed includes these award-winning elements along with the state-of-the-art driver technology of the award-winning flagshipâ€”the ETHER 2.

NEWLY UPDATED DRIVER FOR MORE DETAILED & IMMERSIVE SOUND

The newly updated driver has been flipped by 180 degrees to remove all motor structures between the driver and the ear for better resolution and a wider, more immersive soundstage. It features superior damping for improved resolution, dynamics and a smoother frequency response. Streamlined precision-machined single-piece flow elements completely remove voids and stray air paths within the motor to improve internal airflow. The AEON 2 Closed delivers detailed treble, transparent mids and visceral bass.

MADE TO BE YOUR CONSTANT COMPANION

The AEON 2 Closed features an all-new collapsable gimbal that allows this full-sized headphone to fold to become really compact and tiny. Just slip it into the case and carry it anywhere. The cast aluminium baffle has been replaced with real carbon fibre cup inserts. It has a stylish red finish with black anodizing. You get to pick between Dan Clark Audio's DUMMER (Distinctly Un-Magical) and VIVO cables as well as between multiple connectors and cable lengths for the best experience ever.

title: Dan Clark Audio - ETHER Flow 1.1
description:
Designed & Made in the USA

Balanced Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

2 Years of Warranty

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

LIFELIKE AUDIO EXPERIENCE

The Dan Clark Audio Ether Flow 1.1 is an open-back entry-level headphone in the Ether line. It uses Trueflow technology for a warm, authentic sound that's detailed and brings out every nuance. The wide soundstage is immersive, creating a lifelike experience.

PATENT-PENDING TRUEFLOW TECHNOLOGY

The magnets used in planar magnetic drivers tend to create hard right angles. When sound waves travel through these angles, it creates turbulence in the audio wavelength. This tends to conceal minute details and results in audio that's not true-to-life. The TrueFlow technology fills in the area between magnets with perforated material. This removes the hard angles so that the air moves through a flat, perforated surface resulting in improved dynamics, resolution and an extended frequency response.

DESIGNED & ENGINEERED IN SAN DIEGO

This headphone has been designed and built in San Diego, California. The lightweight, hinge-free nitinol headband is comfortable and practically indestructible. You get the all-new Vivo cable and travel case along with the Ether Flow 1.1.

The iFi Audio Aurora is made to mimic grandnessâ€”both in terms of sound and design. Its look has been inspired by French design and Japanese architecture. Julien Haziza, the designer of the Aurora took inspiration from Shigeru Ban, Tadao Ando and the OmotesandÅ and Harajuku districts in Tokyo. With the bamboo and aluminium frame, you get a striking design with a hint of vintage.

FEEL THE MUSIC WITH PUREEMOTIONÂ®

Experience PureEmotionÂ®, a proprietary amp technology that features a hybrid circuit design with multiple key stages. The preamp stage includes a Russian 6N3P from the 2C51 premium tube/valve family. Each half of the tube is used for the left & right channels and adds gain to the audio signal in preparation for further amplification. This signal is delivered by the ESS Sabre Hyperstream DAC chipset which along with AMRâ€™s Global Master Timing (GMT)/ Memory Buffer System, reduces jitter and unneeded noise. This results in a life-like sound that combines the purity of tone with a high level of engagement, speed and dynamic gusto.

STREAM HIGH-QUALITY MUSIC WIRED AND WIRELESSLY

Stream music however you like with the Aurora. It has Bluetooth v5.0 and just about every audio codec i.e. Qualcomm aptX, aptX HD, aptX Low Latency, aptX Adaptive, LDAC, AAC and HWA/LHDC (codecs created by Sony, Apple and Huawei respectively). Using WiFi and LINKPLAYâ„¢, you can link several Auroras to create a multi-room system. Enjoy music from the built-in Tidal and Spotify functionality or play music offline with the micro SDHC cards slot. You can also connect to other devices via a variety of cable inputs like optical, coaxial, USB, 3.5mm and Ethernet.

START THE CONCERT IN YOUR HOME

Enjoy a deep, genuine bass with TrueBassÂ®. It includes two downward-firing 8-inch bass radiators and dual-level depth control that lets you adjust the bass response according to your taste, even down to 27Hz. Want to turn your room into a concert hall? Consider it done! With SoundSpaceÂ®, the driver unit array consists of a proprietary matrix that allows you to change the level of output from specific drivers at certain frequencies. This results in an immersive, room-filling soundstage.

AUTO ROOM TAILORING THAT'S SMART AND SOUNDS GOOD

The Aurora features Auto Room Tailoring (ART)Â®, a â€˜room correctionâ€™ system developed entirely by iFi engineers. Six sensors measure the distance between the Aurora and surrounding walls using ultrasonic sound. Then, a 32-bit ARM Cortex microprocessor adjusts the output from the speaker array to precisely tailor the musical performance according to the room. The result? A deep, voluminous sound that'll make you forget the artificial, tinny sound of systems that use DSP.

description:

DESCRIPTION

THE ER3SE and ER3XR EARPHONES

Most of the portable media players in the market today require an extremely sensitive pair of earphones. This is exactly what the Etymotic ER3SE Studio Edition earphones are meant to do. These earphones offer professional quality sound reproduction at a budget price. The ER3XR Extended Response, on the other hand, offers a decently boosted low-end frequency output. Based upon the audio standards of the ER3SE, the ER3XR provides a slightly enhanced bass output for the segment of music listeners who like to hear more bass in their music.

TOP-NOTCH PERFORMANCE AND NOISE ISOLATION

With the best-in-class features, high-end performance and superior build quality the Etymotic ER3 Earphones deliver an uncompromised music listening experience. These earphones are perfectly in tune with the newest innovations of music players that support 3.5 mm stereo plug. They have recorded the highest noise isolation capacity compared to any other earphones with 35 dB to 42 dB of noise isolation.

HIGHLY ACCURATE SOUND OUTPUT WITH DURABILITY AND ASSURANCE

These earphones have the best-in-class output sensitivity with 105dB SPL sensitivity at 1kHz at 0.1mV. These earphones feature powerful and meticulously designed balanced armature drivers. The Etymonic ER3 earphones comprise of a highly durable reinforced cable. You also get a user-replaceable filter over the balanced armature drivers to protect it from ear wax. The earphones come with a 2-year replacement warranty.

FINE-TUNED FOR PERFECTION

The body of the ER3 is designed with high-grade metal and has an anodized finish. They are built to offer a perfect and comfortable in-ear fit. The 4ft cables that come with the earphone are detachable so that if need be these cables can be replaced.

DESCRIPTION

MEET THE LIMITED EDITION LCD-24

When Audeze introduced its flagship â€” the LCD-4, it was thought to be the ultimate planar magnetic headphone. But, the brand has gone ahead to prove everyone wrong with the Limited Edition LCD-24. After decades of research, experimentation, and passion, you get a headphone that's not only superior to others but also way ahead of its time.

FEWER MAGNETS, LARGER DIAPHRAGMS

Enjoy the powerful sound of Audeze's staggered Fluxorâ„¢ magnetic structure. The magnets are placed on either side of the driver in an asymmetrical design to improve the airflow's linearity and deliver an enhanced resolution and transparency. This, and the 0.5-micron Nano-scale diaphragms offer a powerful bass, vibrant mids and extended treble.

DRIVEN BY ANY SOURCE DEVICE

The LCD-24 has been made by hand at Audeze's headquarters in California, USA. This special limited edition headphone comes with a premium silver-plated copper cable and hard travel case. PS: This headphone is optimised for use with the King MKII whose creator (& Audeze's CTO), Dr. C, played a big role in designing this headphone.

title: Etymotic - ER4
description:
Designed in the USA

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Detachable MMCX Cables

Needs Amplification

DESCRIPTION

THE LEGACY OF QUALITY AND TRUST

Etymotic is credited with the invention of noise isolating in-ear earphones 30 years ago. The Etymotic design adopted balanced armature receivers and was used for auditory research and hearing tests. This served as the standard benchmark for high definition in-ear earphones. However, the Etymotic ER4 became the first noise-isolating, high fidelity in-ear earphones to be featuring this unique technology in a consumer earphone. That's not all, these in-ear earphones are known to be the world leader for response accuracy when compared to other earphones. Therefore even after years, these reference-quality headphones are preferred by audiophiles, musicians and audio engineers.

EXPERIENCE NOISE ISOLATION LIKE NEVER BEFORE

These are the first earphones to provide a completely sealed in-ear fit. They offer 98% (35dB - 42dB) noise isolation which is best when compared to any earphones available in the market. One of the benefits of the best-in-class noise isolation is that you don't have to listen to your music at extremely high volumes.

WITH STYLE, COMFORT, DURABILITY AND ASSURANCE

The body of the ER4 is designed with high-grade metal and has an anodized finish. They are built to offer a perfect and comfortable in-ear fit. The reinforced 5ft cables that come with this earphone are detachable and has 3.5 mm gold plated stereo jack as well as MMCX connectors. The Etymonic ER4 earphones feature a user-replaceable filter over the balanced armature drivers to protect it from ear wax. Moreover, these earphones have a 2-year replacement warranty.

RESULT OF YEARS RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT

Etymotic is known as the world leader in sound reproduction. They have unrivalled accuracy in frequency response and audio quality. The ER4 in-ear earphone has 92%+ response accuracy from 20Hz-16kHz. These are exclusive earphones to feature custom made balanced armature drivers with best-in-class output sensitivity.

One of the benefits of the best-in-class noise isolation is that you don't have to listen to your music at extremely high volumes.

WITH STYLE, COMFORT, DURABILITY AND ASSURANCE

The body of the ER4 is designed with high-grade metal and has an anodized finish. They are built to offer a perfect and comfortable in-ear fit. The reinforced 5ft cables that come with this earphone are detachable and has 3.5 mm gold plated stereo jack as well as MMCX connectors. The Etymonic ER4 earphones feature a user-replaceable filter over the balanced armature drivers to protect it from ear wax. Moreover, these earphones have a 2-year replacement warranty.

RESULT OF YEARS RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT

Etymotic is known as the world leader in sound reproduction. They have unrivalled accuracy in frequency response and audio quality. The ER4 in-ear earphone has 92%+ response accuracy from 20Hz-16kHz. These are exclusive earphones to feature custom made balanced armature drivers with best-in-class output sensitivity.

What is the difference between the SR and XR Models?

Both the ER4SR and the ER4XR have distinct sound signatures. While the ER4SR has the most accurate flat response across frequencies, the ER4XR delivers high accuracy response with mildly improved bass frequencies.

title: MEE Audio - X10 (Unboxed)
description:
Designed in USA

Warm & Smooth Sound Signature

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Sports & Gym

Ideal for the Workplace

1 Year of Warranty

Works with Android & iOS

Use Wirelessly with Bluetooth

4.5 + 18 Hours of Battery Life

Wireless Range of 10m

Use Siri & Google Voice Assistant

IPX5 Sweat Resistant

My absolute top reccomendation for a true wireless earbud under Rs. 5000/- The MEE Audio X10 has everything you are looking for in a true wireless earbuds - great sound, great design, great battery life and great comfort.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

UNBOXED

Headphone Zone Certified UnboxedÂ Units
Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. Usually, the product's packaging may have gotten damaged in transit. Customers use a product once or twice and then return it with opened upÂ packaging.

WHERE DO UNBOXED PRODUCTS COME FROM?

Customer Returns Returned headphones are fully functional products that have left the warehouse and therefore can no longer be sold as new as their packaging has been opened. The product may have been used once or twice by the customer who returned it.

Transit Damages Sometimes we receive headphones in damaged packaging due to shipping accidents. These are brand new headphones with cosmetic flaws on the packaging.

Why Buy Unboxed Headphones?

Save Upto 15%
Since you won't get the original packaging, we give you a good discount compared to a new headphone.

Professionally Inspected
A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

Original Warranty
All unboxed headphones carry the same warranty period as a brand new headphone would.

Unbiased Customer Service
We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Unboxed Products or new products.

Unchanged ReplacementÂ Policy
Received a defective Unboxed unit? Return it under our Replacement Policy.

ALL Original Accessories
The unboxed headphones itself comes with all original accessories.

See More

DESCRIPTION

LIBERATE YOURSELF FROM WIRES TRULY

With a decade of experience and knowledge, MEE Audio has launched the new X10 True Wireless earbuds. Having a 5mm HD microdriver, these are made to deliver a pure and natural sound with a deep bass response without overpowering the mids and highs. With superior wireless range and stability, these make for a good pick for someone looking to venture into the true wireless segment.

4.5 HOURS OF BATTERY ON THE BUDS, 18 HOURS ON THE CASE

Listen to music all day long on the X10 earbuds. With a 4.5-hour battery life, you can use these earbuds anywhere you go. The charging case on the other hand, provides for an additional 18 hours of battery which means that you can charge your earbuds when not in use.

IPX5 SWEAT-PROOF BUILD FOR YOUR DAILY WORKOUTS

The X10 comes with an IPX5-certified design letting you enjoy them while jogging or during workouts without ever being worried about getting them damaged. Be it sweat, moisture, or any such element, these earbuds can withstand all of them without the slightest of issue.

SMARTER CONNECTIVITY AND MONO HEADSET FEATURE

The X10 is fitted with a smart wireless technology that connects to your device as soon as the earbuds are taken out of the charging case. With the integrated microphone, you can take calls on-the-go. You also have the option to use the right earbud as an independent mono headset to attend to calls.

ONE-BUTTON DOES IT ALL

The controls on the earbuds are easy to understand and use. With its single button design, you can control the music volume, skip tracks and even activate your digital assistant such as Siri or Google Assistant.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN AND 3 EARTIPS OPTIONS FOR COMFORT

The X10 comes in a compact and sleek build which works in a twist and insert design. Thanks to the 3 pairs of soft silicone eartips, you can decide which fits your ears the best to provide additional noise isolation when travelling or in a crowded place.

SPECS

SPEAKER SPECIFICATIONS

DRIVERS
5mm HD

DRIVER TYPE
Micro drivers

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
20 Hz to 20 kHz

BLUETOOTH SPECIFICATION

WIRELESS CONNECTIVITY
BluetoothÂ® 5.0

BLUETOOTHÂ® RANGE
30 ft (10 m)

BLUETOOTH PROFILE SUPPORTED
A2DP, HSP, HFP, AVRCP

COMPATIBILITY
Universal

Built-in rechargeable batteries

4.5 hours

2 hours

18 hours

100 mAh

CASE BATTERY CAPACITY
450 mAh

CHARGING CASE CONNECTOR
USB-C

MICROPHONE SPECIFICATION

DIRECTIVITY
omnidirectional

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
100 Hz to 10 kHz

SENSITIVITY
-42dBÂ± 3dB

PRODUCT DETAIL

EAR COUPLING
Intraaural (in-ear)

WATER RESISTANCE
IPX5

0.3 oz (8 g)

WEIGHT (CARRYING CASE)
1.8 oz (51 g)

DIMENSIONS (CARRYING CASE)
2.5x1.75x1 inches (6.4x4.5x2.6 cm)

IN THE BOX

WHAT YOU WILL GET
1. MEE Audio X10 Truly Wireless Bluetooth Earphones

2. Charging Case With Built-In Rechargeable Battery

3. USB Type-C Charging Cable

4. 3 Pairs Of Soft Silicone Eartips

WHAT YOU WILL NOT GET
1. Original pacakging of MEE Audio X10 Truly Wireless Bluetooth Earphones

FAQs

What is the warranty like and who should I contact?

MEE Audio - X10 offers a one year warranty. If you need to claim warranty, you can contact us. We are quite friendly people, just sayin. You can read more about the warranty here.

Is MEE Audio X10 compatible with all devices?

MEE Audio X10 works with all Android and ios devices.

Does MEE Audio X10 have noise cancellation?

No, but thanks to the 3 pairs of soft silicone ear tips, you can decide which fits your ears the best to provide additional noise isolation when travelling or in a crowded place.

What is the battery life like?

MEE Audio X10 offers a 4.5-hour battery life, you can use these earbuds anywhere you go and the charging case, on the other hand, provides for an additional 18 hours of battery which means that you can charge your earbuds when not in use.

How do I control my music and calls withÂ MEE Audio X10?

The controls on the earbuds are easy to understand and use. With its single-button design, you can control the music volume, skip tracks and even activate your digital assistants such as Siri or Google Assistant.

Are MEE Audio X10 earphones sweatproof?

Yes, spread love, peace and sweat.

What is the wireless range on the MEE Audio X10?

The MEE Audio X10 has a wireless range of 10m when connected to any Bluetooth devices.

What kind of charger should I use to charge the MEE Audio X10?

The best option is to use a 5V output charging source with the included cable. DO NOT use external chargers with output voltage above 5V (e.g. 9V, 12V etc.) as they might cause damages to the headphones.

Does the MEE Audio X10 support Siri or Google assistant?

Yes, the MEE Audio X10 does support voice assistants like Siri and Google Assistant.

Which cable is required to charge the MEE Audio X10?

You will need a Type-C cable to charge the MEE Audio X10.

What is the Bluetooth version on the MEE Audio X10?

The MEE Audio X10 come with the latest Bluetooth version 5.0

Is the MEE Audio X10 sweat resistant?

Yes, as the MEE MEE Audio X10 have an IPX5 rating they are resistant to sweat and water sprays.

Warranty & MEDIA REVIEWS

1 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this MEE Audio X10 (Unboxed) comes with a 1 year warranty from MEE Audio that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about MEE Audio's warranty in India.

"It would appear that the MEE X10 have left me, in general, impressed with its signature audio style and battery life. These will be an easy recommendation if you have a budget of Rs 5k."
Read More

"I would say that I am quite impressed with the performance of MEE X10.The earphones come with IPX5 sweat resistance, boasts of 23 hours of battery life with included charging case. Looks good."
Read More

"Up to 22.5 hours of battery life is promised on the MEE Audio X10. The Mee Audio X10 features the company's classic styling, with Bluetooth 5.0, and is IPX5 rated for water resistance."
Read More

"MEE audio's Truly wireless in-ear headphones X10 deliver unparalleled freedom of movement with MEE signature sound. Features include IPX5, compact and ergonomic earpiece design"
Read More

title: Marshall - Stockwell II
description:
Designed in the UK

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Movies and TV

Best Suited for Portable Use

Use Wirelessly with Bluetooth

Wireless Range of 30 Feet

Multi-point Connection

IPX4 Splash & Sweat Resistance

20 Hours of Battery Life

Volume Controls

DESCRIPTION

Portable Music Speakers

Designed for music-on-the-go, this comfortably portable Marshall speaker gives a music playtime of up to 20+hours. So hit the road with Marshall - Stockwell II and never miss the beat.

Music Playback For 20+ Hours

Stockwell II offers 20+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. Its pint-sized frame and guitar inspired carry strap make it perfect to take with you.

Immersive Sound Experience

Powered with the Blumlein Stereo Sound construction, the Stockwell II is designed to give you a multi-directional immersive experience which will bring your music to life.

The Convenience Of Bluetooth 5.0

Play your favourite music seamlessly with the latest Bluetooth 5.0. The Stockwell II gives you a connectivity range of up to 30 feet. Perfect for outdoor partying!

Hit The Road With Stockwell

The highly durable build of Stockwell II comprises of silicone exterior, steel metal grille and an IPX4 water-resistance. So no matter where you go the Stockwell II follows you.

Sweat And Splash Resistant

The Stockwell II comes with an IPX4 rating, which means that this Marshall speaker can withstand water splashes making it extremely durable.

Multi-Point Connectivity

Want to use your speaker with two Bluetooth devices at once? Do so with the multi-host functionality available in Stockwell II, allowing you to seamless switch between two Bluetooth devices.

Music At Your Control

Adjust the volume, bass and treble quickly with analogue control knobs. Enjoy loud and clear music and the freedom to fine-tune your music the way you like it.

Want More Juice? Use Quick Charge

Even when in hurry do not lose on music with Stockwell II. It comes with a quick charge option, giving you 6 hours of playtime with just 20 minutes of charge. It takes five hours to fully charge this Marshall speaker.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

POWER AMPLIFIERS
One 10 W Class D amplifier for the woofer Two 5 W Class D amplifiers for the tweeters

CABINET PRINCIPLE
Bass-reflex

MAXIMUM SOUND PRESSURE LEVEL
80 dB SPL @ 1 m

FREQUENCY RANGE
60-20,000 Hz

ADJUSTABLE BASS AND TREBLE CONTROLS
Fine-tune your music using the analogue controls on your speaker

STEREO/MONO
Stereo

CONTROLS & CONNECTIVITY

WIRELESS CONNECTIVITY
Bluetooth 5.0

WIRED CONNECTIVITY
3.5 mm Input

TOP PANEL CONTROLS
Bluetooth button Power/volume knob Bass knob Treble knob Battery indicator

BATTERY TYPE
Built-in, rechargeable Li-ion battery

PLAY TIME
20+ hours

CHARGING TIME
20 minutes charge gives 6 hours of playtime (quick charge) 5 hours gives 20+ hours of playtime (full charge)

DESIGN & BUILD

DIMENSIONS
180 x 161 x 70 mm 7.09 x 6.34 x 2.76 in

WEIGHT
1.38 kg 3.04 lb

WATER RESISTANCE
IPX4

POWER

MAINS INPUT VOLTAGE
5-12 V, 3 A USB-C

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS
1. Stockwell II Portable Stereo Loudspeaker

2. USB-C cable

3. Quick Start Guide

4. Legal and Safety Information

WARRANTY

1 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Marshall Stockwell II comes with a 1 year warranty from Marshall that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Marshall's warranty in India.

description:
Designed in Japan

Warm & Smooth Sound Signature

3 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

DESCRIPTION

GET YOUR HANDS ON AUDIO-TECHNICAâ€™S FIRST PROFESSIONAL OPEN-BACK HEADPHONE

The Audio Technica ATH-R70x is the first pair of open-back reference professional headphones and stands as a flagship model in A-Tâ€™s lineup of professional studio headphones from Audio Technica. ATH-R70x features specially designed proprietary 45mm large-aperture drivers and acoustically transparent housings fashioned from aluminium honeycomb mesh. These headphones provide an accurate and natural open-back sound. They also incorporate a new, improved design of the popular 3D wing support system to provide even greater comfort during the prolonged use often required in a professional setting.

PROPRIETARY DRIVERS FUSED IN AN OPEN-BACK DESIGN FOR AUDIO PROFESSIONALS

Accuracy and clarity are apexes when it comes to sound quality. Audio-Technica ATH-R70x professional open-back headphones deliver just that and bring out all the detail in your music and mixes. The ATH-R70x features proprietary 45mm large-aperture drivers tuned to accurately reproduce extreme low and high frequencies while maintaining perfect balance. High-efficiency magnets and pure alloy magnetic circuit design reduce distortion and ensure accurate and extended frequency response from 5-40,000 Hz. Combined with the open-back design and acoustically transparent aluminium honeycomb-mesh housings, these premium headphones are suited for studio mixing, personal listening, mastering, post-production and audio forensics.

MASTERFULLY ENGINEERED AND DESIGNED FOR LONG LISTENING HOURS IN THE STUDIO

The Audio Technica ATH-R70x have been engineered with carbon composite resin that improves structural rigidity and delivers a detailed transient response never heard before. The Audio Technica ATH-R70x allows you to stay focused on your music with the exceptionally lightweight design and 3D Wing Support system to keep you comfortable during extended use. To elevate the wearing experience further, the ATH-R70x embodies breathable fabric on its earpads to provide superior comfort even during extended listening.

DETACHABLE CABLE DESIGN FOR STEREO ORIENTATION AND BUNDLED WITH ACCESSORIES

Audio Technica ATH-R70x are robust yet lightweight and equipped with a unique, dual-sided detachable cable that automatically maintains proper stereo orientation (no matter how itâ€™s attached). Every aspect of the R70x headphones is designed for lasting comfort, convenience and audio purity. To get you started right out of the box, Audio Technica ATH-R70x comes bundled with a dual-sided straight cable for a tangle-free experience. You also get a protective carrying pouch to store your ATH-R70x headphone and carry it whoever you go.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Audio-Technica ATH-R70x and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period is 3 Years from the date of invoice for all M-Series and E-Series (Pro Products). In order to claim warranty, please visit our Audio-Technica warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

The sound signature of the Audio-Technica ATH-R70x is?

The Audio-Technica ATH-R70x comes with a Warm & Smooth Sound Signature that delivers great clarity over the mids with punchy bass. The ATH-R70x is a perfect fit if you like listening to all kinds of genres.

Does the Audio-Technica - ATH-R70x require an amp?

Although your smartphone and laptop will be able to drive it, an amplifier would certainly bring out the true potential of the Audio-Technica ATH-R70x. Read more about amplification and why it's important here.

Does detachable cable mean I can use it without the wire as well?

No, they canâ€™t. Detachable cables mean they can be replaced when they go south!

What devices is the Audio-Technica ATH-R70x compatible with?

These headphones are mostly used by studio professionals, you can use the 3.5mm jack with your laptop or smartphone.

Does the Audio-Technica - ATH-R70x come with a carry pouch?

Yes, the Audio-Technica - ATH-R70x does come with a carry pouch in the box.

Does the Audio-Technica - ATH-R70x come with a carry pouch?

Yes, the Audio-Technica - ATH-R70x does come with a carry pouch in the box.

For mixing which is better, open or closed back headphones?

A closed back headphone is ideally a good choice since it contains the sound within the earpads since they are also over the ear. To understand how they are different from open back read Difference between open back and closed back headphone.

What do â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î© like.

title: JAYS - a-Jays Five (Unboxed)
description:
UNBOXED

Headphone Zone Certified UnboxedÂ Units
Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. Usually, the product's packaging may have gotten damaged in transit. Customers use a product once or twice and then return it with opened upÂ packaging.

WHERE DO UNBOXED PRODUCTS COME FROM?

Customer Returns Returned headphones are fully functional products that have left the warehouse and therefore can no longer be sold as new as their packaging has been opened. The product may have been used once or twice by the customer who returned it.

Transit Damages Sometimes we receive headphones in damaged packaging due to shipping accidents. These are brand new headphones with cosmetic flaws on the packaging.

Why Buy Unboxed Headphones?

Save Upto 15%
Since you won't get the original packaging, we give you a good discount compared to a new headphone.

Professionally Inspected
A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

Original Warranty
All unboxed headphones carry the same warranty period as a brand new headphone would.

Unbiased Customer Service
We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Unboxed Products or new products.

Unchanged ReplacementÂ Policy
Received a defective Unboxed unit? Return it under our Replacement Policy.

Custom A5 Drivers Experience award winning high quality sound with tailor made drivers which deliver powerful, precise and natural sounding bass. Whatever your music choice maybe, its all going to sound absolutely great. Ergonomically Designed After a lot of research JAYS has carefully designed these earphones to be comfortable for longer periods of usage. The fit is secure, Â andÂ the angular shape of the earphones make sure they rest comfortably in your ears, isolating external noise. Tangle free Flat cables JAYS was the first brand to come up with tangle free cables ensuring that you enjoy a great music listening experience. Zero tangles spare you of all the effort needed in detangling your earphones when you can be enjoying your favourite tracks instead. Go tangle-free! Full Feature Remote The three-button remote provides you control of your Android, iOS or Windows phone with features such as answer/reject calls, play/pause, skip songs, volume up/down etc. Advanced MEMS Mic Technology The a-JAYS Five has a remarkable mic that consists of an acoustic sensor, a low noise input buffer, and an output amplifier resulting in incredible speech quality. The built-in echo cancellation is especially good as it reduces surrounding noise and wonâ€™t degrade over time as it auto-recharges the mic-magnets each time you connect your earphones to your phone. JAYS Headset Control App for Android The a-JAYS Five for Android can be used with JAYS Headset Control app for Android for even more features. It lets you customize settings and dedicate buttons with new or alternate functionalities to make your remote tailored, just as you would like it.

title: Shure - KSE1200
description:
Designed in USA

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Best Suited for Portable Use

Description

ELEGANT ELECTRO-ECSTATIC EARPHONES

The KSE 1200 is an Electrostatic Earphones System which contains a sound isolating earphones and a portable amplifier which produces a luxurious sound and are used with portable media players. They are elegantly designed for black aluminum housing and provide the most accurate and fastest transient response making this system extraordinary.

ELECTROSTATIC SINGLE-DRIVER FOR CLEAR, FINE-TUNED SOUND

The sound-isolating earphones use the electrostatic sound technology which features the single MicroDriver design and the cable specifically isolates every conductor. Extremely high correlation to the source audio provides the fastest, most accurate transient response on the market. The earphones are extremely lightweight and its ergonomic shape lessens the ear fatigue to deliver a comfortable sound. The sound isolation sleeves block up to 37 dB of ambient noise.

12 HOURS OF BATTERY FOR CONTINUOUS PLAYBACK

The KSE1200 has a battery life of 12 hours a day. The battery is chargeable from any standard USB charging cable which can be plugged into the USB wall of the amplifier. It contains an LED indicator that indicates the input level and has the Control functions for main power and volume knob.

PERKS OF ELECTROSTATIC TECHNOLOGY

The Electrostatic Earphone Technology features an electrostatic earphone that is virtual or lightweight, has a massless diaphragm, and is surrounded by an electrostatic field generated by the backplates to manage change in oscillation. The perk of electrostatic technology is, they provide the fastest and accurate transient response and deliver the unmatched detailed and pure sound.

RETURN OF THE PRODIGAL 'HIFIMAN' SON

The new HiFiMAN HE1000se is a remarkable audio reproduction by HiFiMAN. The HE1000se is an opportunity for you to upgrade your HE1000v1, HE1000v2 or HE1000 headphones. Developed on the lines of what made the HE1000 an audiophile favourite, the HE1000SE is everything an audiophile wants. The Planar technology offers a rich, detailed sound for the.

PATENTED HIFIMAN DIAPHRAGM TECHNOLOGY

The HE1000se has been built using the patented HiFiMAN The Nanometer Thickness Diaphragm technology and have given a breakthrough by implementing it for the first time in these headphones. And the planar magnetic driver has been an add on to this incorporated material used by the HiFiMAN which produces an extraordinary sound.

PATENTED WINDOW SHADE AND ASYMMETRIC MAGNETIC CIRCUIT

HiFiMAN HE1000se's window shade system is designed in the way that it protects the driver and gives excellent open-back design. The headphone has a lower sound wave transmission from the diaphragm as it is designed asymmetrically with smaller magnets directly facing the ears.

FLEXIBLE CABLES WITH ADD-ON ADAPTERS

The HE1000se comes with three options of cable which would meet all your audiophile needs. It includes 3.5mm plus adapter, Â¼â€ (6.35mm) and the new 4.4mm balanced jack.

LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN AND ASYMMETRICAL EARCUPS FOR COMFORT

The Arya is lightweight as it is made from high grade plastic and the headband is built with high grade metal. This makes the headphone durable and comfortable.It perfectly complements the headphone in terms of sound as well as looks. The asymmetrical ear cups are designed to meet the shape of the human ear offering added comfort.

CRAFTSMANSHIP OF THE HIGHEST ORDER

These headphones are crafted with CNC milling and hand polishing. With its amazing bold design, extraordinary sound and magnificent craftsmanship, the HE1000se is a legendary creation in the HiFiMAN legacy.

description:

DESCRIPTION

Free Custom Laser Engraving
Make your headphones truly your own. Be it a logo, your name or even a piece of artwork you've created, the stateâ€‘ofâ€‘theâ€‘art laser engraving turns the shields on your V-MODA headphones into something others will envy. *Once you've placed an order, please send your logo here Read More

BALANCED IN MORE WAYS THAN ONE: FROM SOUND TO DESIGN

Whether youâ€™re mixing the next hit or want to listen to the audio as it is, the V-MODA M-200 delivers every detail. It offers a crystal-clear, neutral sound that picks-up even the subtle nuances of any track. The M-200 has been finely tuned by engineers at Roland to faithfully reproduce sound up to 40kHz. The 50mm drivers with neodymium magnets and CCAW voice coils ensure accurate audio reproduction. No wonder, itâ€™s certified as Hi-Res Audio by the Japan Audio Society (JAS).

V-MODA'S FIRST REFRENCE STUDIO HEADPHONES

The M-200 has been made for all-day usage. The broad headband design distributes the weight on the head evenly for added comfort. Large, detachable magnetic memory foam cushions, as well as the premium sweat-resistant PU leather exterior, ensure comfort all day long. The closed-back design keeps distractions away through its superior noise isolation while the flexible headband allows for single-ear monitoring.

HOST OF CABLE OPTIONS TO USE YOUR V-MODA TO THE FULLEST

The M-200 comes with two cables. The first is a single-sided balanced cable for critical listening and producing. It offers a lower signalâ€‘toâ€‘noise ratio for a more transparent, spacious sound. The second is the SpeakEasyâ„¢ 1-Button Mic Cable for music and taking calls when on-the-go. Apart from these, you can also separately purchase a variety of other options like: CoilPro Cable : Perfect for Producers, DJs and audio professionals for its extended listening reach. It comes with TwistLock technology. BoomPro Microphone : Perfect for gamers for crystal-clear communication. Speakeasy DAC/AMP Lightning Cable : Perfect for studio-quality sound from an iOS device (with lightning port). Audio Only Cable : Cable without remote for pure analogue sound.

STRONG. FLEXIBLE. PORTABLE. COMFORTABLE.

Whether in the studio or on the road, the V-MODA M-200 is built to stay along all-through. The CliqFold hinge folds to be really tiny and can be easily slipped into the newly redesigned Exoskeleton case. The case offers more space for accessories as well as a carabiner clip to be attached to your backpack.

description:
Designed in the UK

Ideal for Long Flights

DESCRIPTION

43.6mm Customised Drivers

The Bowers & Wilkins PX7 uses the 43.6mm drivers which delivers the glorious sound of all time which matches the Bowers & Wilkins standards. And are tuned by the same team which built the 800 Diamond Series Bowers & Wilkins speakers used in Abbey Road Studios. These headphones are lightweight and compact and are easy to carry along with you wherever you want.

30 Hours of Playback Time

The Bowers & Wilkins PX7 makes you indulge in your music for the whole day as it carries 30 hours of playback time. And even if your headphones run out of battery, a quick charge of 15 minutes will give you a playback time of 5 hours. Isn't it cool?

Experience Adaptive Noice Cancelation

These headphones manage to eliminate the unnecessary noise coming from the outside world and give you time to enjoy your music with any disturbance with its Adaptive Noise Cancelling feature.

Simply follows you

These headphones allow you to listen to the background chatter when you lift the earcup. And it's more convincing because the music automatically stops. Put the headphones back in place, and the music starts again.

Motivated by the Power and Swiftness of Race Cars

Taking inspiration from the strength of race cars, the PX7 features woven carbon fibre composite arms which helps the headphone to channel clear sound while also protecting it against everyday wear and tear. They are extremely portable allowing you to carry your PX7 easily and to enjoy your favourite music on the go.

43.6mm Customised Drivers

The Bowers & Wilkins PX7 uses the 43.6mm drivers which delivers the glorious sound of all time which matches the Bowers & Wilkins standards. And are tuned by the same team which built the 800 Diamond Series Bowers & Wilkins speakers used in Abbey Road Studios. These headphones are lightweight and compact and are easy to carry along with you wherever you want.

30 Hours of Playback Time

The Bowers & Wilkins PX7 makes you indulge in your music for the whole day as it carries 30 hours of playback time. And even if your headphones run out of battery, a quick charge of 15 minutes will give you a playback time of 5 hours. Isn't it cool?

Experience Adaptive Noice Cancelation

These headphones manage to eliminate the unnecessary noise coming from the outside world and give you time to enjoy your music with any disturbance with its Adaptive Noise Cancelling feature.

Simply follows you

These headphones allow you to listen to the background chatter when you lift the earcup. And it's more convincing because the music automatically stops. Put the headphones back in place, and the music starts again.

Motivated by the Power and Swiftness of Race Cars

Taking inspiration from the strength of race cars, the PX7 features woven carbon fibre composite arms which helps the headphone to channel clear sound while also protecting it against everyday wear and tear. They are extremely portable allowing you to carry your PX7 easily and to enjoy your favourite music on the go.

FAQs

What is the battery life of Sony WI-XB400?

The Sony WI-XB400 offers 15 hours of battery life. If you are looking for a battery our top recommendation for you will be the SoundMAGIC E11BT, it offers a great 24 hours of battery life for all-day use.

Do Sony WI-XB400 earphones have a microphone ?

Yes, these earphones come with a microphone, making your hard life easy.

Do Sony WI-XB400 earphones come with a remote?

Yes, they come with a 3-button remote to control your music and calls on-the go.

Which Bluetooth version Sony WI-XB400 comes with?

These earphones come with Bluetooth version 5.0, as updated as your phone.

What is the warranty period on these earphones and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on all Sony products is 1 year from the date of purchase. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Sony warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

How is the overall sound of Sony WI-XB400?

The Sony WI-XB400 delivers lots of low end but tends to overpower mids & highs.

Does the Sony WI-XB400 support Siri or Google Assistant?

Yes, the Sony WI-XB400 does support Siri & Google Assistant.

Does the Sony WI-XB400 come with magnetic earbuds&gt?

Yes, both earbuds of Sony - WI-XB400 have a built-in magnet that will make it easier for you to carry these earphones. It will also keep these earphones clutter-free when kept away.

title: Focal - Stellia
description:
Designed in France

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Closed-Back Design

Metal Build

40mm Beryllium Drivers

Detachable Cables

DESCRIPTION

M-SHAPED BERYLLIUM DOME FOR FLAWLESS SOUND

Focal is known for producing pure acoustic sound for 40 years and the Stellia is definitely one of them. An exceptional headphone, these are equipped with an â€˜Mâ€™-shaped pure Beryllium dome and new surround, frameless 100% copper voice coil that ensures stunning dynamics for this closed-back headphone. The Stellia reveals the tiniest details and realistic audio reproduction.

40MM SPEAKER DRIVERS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Focal Stellia produces the purest sound. Its 40mm electrodynamic speaker drivers offer a frequency range of 5Hz- 40kHz even at the low volume levels. The Vents, EVA foam behind the speaker driver, absorb the high frequencies while the acoustic diffusers break up standing waves resulting in interference-free sound.

SUPERIOR COMFORT AND STYLISH FINISH

Stellia is extremely comfortable thanks to the high-resilience memory foam earpads. No matter the size and shape your ears, the consistent curve between the headband and Yoke offers a flawless fit. The Stellia consists of two finishes â€” cognac and mocha. The headband is made from full-grain leather which makes this headphone supremely classy.

LISTEN IN PERFECT ISOLATION

The Stellia amazingly isolates unwanted outside sound as it has been created with a closed-back design. 50% of the earpads' height is designed to diffuse sound through non-perforated full-grain leather. The other 50% absorbs the audio signal through an acoustic cloth which covers the memory foam which produces the perfect sound isolation.

DESIGNED & ENGINEERED IN FRANCE

The Stellia uses technology developed exclusively by Focal in France. To ensure that each and every product is high-performance, it has to feature a 100% Focal design. This allows complete control over the design and quality control processes in order to guarantee high-quality loudspeakers, headphones and earphones that offer enduring value.

description:

UNBOXED

Headphone Zone Certified UnboxedÂ Units
Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. Usually, the product's packaging may have gotten damaged in transit. Customers use a product once or twice and then return it with opened upÂ packaging.

WHERE DO UNBOXED PRODUCTS COME FROM?

Customer Returns Returned headphones are fully functional products that have left the warehouse and therefore can no longer be sold as new as their packaging has been opened. The product may have been used once or twice by the customer who returned it.

Transit Damages Sometimes we receive headphones in damaged packaging due to shipping accidents. These are brand new headphones with cosmetic flaws on the packaging.

Why Buy Unboxed Headphones?

Save Upto 15%
Since you won't get the original packaging, we give you a good discount compared to a new headphone.

Professionally Inspected
A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

Original Warranty
All unboxed headphones carry the same warranty period as a brand new headphone would.

Unbiased Customer Service
We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Unboxed Products or new products.

Unchanged ReplacementÂ Policy
Received a defective Unboxed unit? Return it under our Replacement Policy.

ALL Original Accessories
The unboxed headphones itself comes with all original accessories.

See More

DESCRIPTION

4 BALANCED ARMATURES + 1 DYNAMIC DRIVER FOR INCREDIBLE SOUND

As an upgraded version of the ZS10, the KZ ZS10 Pro uses customised balanced armature drivers, 2 for the high and 2 for the mid frequencies. It also adopts the 2nd generation Tesla double magnetic dynamic unit for the rhythm and bass.

USES ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY TO MAKE YOUR MUSIC COME ALIVE

KZ's independent research and development with dynamic drivers are responsible for the ZS10 Pro's low-frequency output. It is excellently crafted using the PCB electronic frequency division board resulting in smooth and distortion-free sound. The Dual Balanced Armature drivers are responsible for the mid and treble performance. It provides a high-intensity resolution, rich sense of quality and full vocals that makes these IEMs a pure listening experience for you.

DESIGNED TO LOOK GOOD & LAST LONG

This IEM's faceplate is made of 304 stainless steel while the cavity is made from imported resin. These two different materials add shimmer and an exquisite look to the earphone which also makes them durable and long-lasting. The superior noise isolation cancels out ambient sound.

MADE TO BE FLEXIBLE

The ZS10 Pro's wire hooks are made of expensive memory metal, which makes it very convenient for users to adjust the earphones around the ear. The cable that comes in the box terminates in a 3.5mm plug and comes with an inline remote & mic. It's easy to change your IEMs from wired to wireless or upgrade the cable with the detachable 2-pin slots. The new limit slot protection design keeps the pins from breaking and ensures a longer life.

IMPEDANCE

111dB

FREQUENCY RESPONSE

The warranty period on KZ - ZS10 Pro is for 1 year. Read more information on Click here.

What is the sound signature in the KZ - ZS10 Pro?

The KZ - ZS10 Pro comes with a Warm & Smooth Sound Signature that delivers great clarity over the mids with punchy bass. The KZ - ZS10 Pro is a perfect fit if you like listening to all kinds of genres.

Can I take calls on the KZ - ZS10 Pro?

Yes, the KZ - ZS10 Pro comes with an inline microphone so that you can take calls on the go.

Will the KZ - ZS10 Pro work with my smartphone?

Yes! The KZ - ZS10 Pro is compatible to work with both Android and iOS.

How is the overall fit of KZ - ZS10 Pro?

The KZ - ZS10 Pro comes with an over-ear design which gives a secure fit. Also the lightweight design of ZS10 Pro makes them comfortable to use for long hours.

How many drivers does the KZ - ZS10 Pro come with?

The KZ - ZS10 Pro is loaded with 4 Balanced Armature Drivers and 1 Dynamic Driver.

Are the cables on the KZ - ZS10 Pro replaceable?

Yes, the KZ - ZS10 Pro comes with replaceable 2pin cables.

What is the impedance on the KZ - ZS10 Pro?

The KZ - ZS10 Pro comes with an impedance of 24Î©.

Are the cables on the KZ - ZS10 Pro tangle free?

Yes, the KZ - ZS10 Pro comes with tangle free cables. One less thing to worry about.

Which Comply eartips will be compatible with my KZ - ZS10 Pro?

You can get the Comply - Audio Pro or the Comply - Sport Pro for your KZ - ZS10 Pro.

DESCRIPTION

4 BALANCED ARMATURES + 1 DYNAMIC DRIVER FOR INCREDIBLE SOUND

As an upgraded version of the ZS10, the KZ ZS10 Pro uses customised balanced armature drivers, 2 for the high and 2 for the mid frequencies. It also adopts the 2nd generation Tesla double magnetic dynamic unit for the rhythm and bass.

USES ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY TO MAKE YOUR MUSIC COME ALIVE

KZ's independent research and development with dynamic drivers are responsible for the ZS10 Pro's low-frequency output. It is excellently crafted using the PCB electronic frequency division board resulting in smooth and distortion-free sound. The Dual Balanced Armature drivers are responsible for the mid and treble performance. It provides a high-intensity resolution, rich sense of quality and full vocals that makes these IEMs a pure listening experience for you.

DESIGNED TO LOOK GOOD & LAST LONG

This IEM's faceplate is made of 304 stainless steel while the cavity is made from imported resin. These two different materials add shimmer and an exquisite look to the earphone which also makes them durable and long-lasting. The superior noise isolation cancels out ambient sound.

MADE TO BE FLEXIBLE

The ZS10 Pro's wire hooks are made of expensive memory metal, which makes it very convenient for users to adjust the earphones around the ear. The cable that comes in the box terminates in a 3.5mm plug and comes with an inline remote & mic. It's easy to change your IEMs from wired to wireless or upgrade the cable with the detachable 2-pin slots. The new limit slot protection design keeps the pins from breaking and ensures a longer life.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

XX-SERIES, XX-BASS

XX-series FX103BT in-ear headphones reproduce powerful bass sound by Extreme Deep Bass Ports and fine-tuned neodymium driver units.

8.5MM NEODYMIUM DRIVERS FOR POWERFUL SOUND

The JVC HA-FX103BT doesnâ€™t fail to provide you with high-end stereo quality sound. Its 8.5mm Neodymium driver units have a wide frequency range of 20 to 20,000 Hz while the Extreme Deep Bass Ports offer a rich bass-heavy sound output.

HASSLE-FREE HANDS-FREE EXPERIENCE

Play, pause and take calls with ease with the 3-button inline remote and mic. Now hands free functionality is possible at the touch of a button.

5 HOURS OF BATTERY FOR UNLIMITED BASS

These in-ear headphones are Bluetooth-enabled and consist of 5 hours of playback time. Now, enjoy your music for most of the day.

DURABLE AND STURDY

These earphones are known for their long-lasting durability. The tough protectors make sure that they don't break easily.

Yes, you can easily take calls with the JVC - HA-FX103BT as it comes with an inbuilt microphone.

The V-MODA Crossfade M-100 is a very special headphone. The worlds first crowdsourced headphone from the audiophile community. It's also the ultimate DJ headphone used by virtually every top DJ in the country. It's also an audiophile favourite.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

Free Custom Laser Engraving
Make your headphones truly your own. Be it a logo, your name or even a piece of artwork you've created, the stateâ€‘ofâ€‘theâ€‘art laser engraving turns the shields on your V-MODA headphones into something others will envy. *Once you've placed an order, please send your logo here Read More

BETTERMENT OF THE BEST: A STEP-UP OVER THE M-100

With the success of the legendary Crossfade M-100 over the years, the Crossfade M-100 Master is built keeping exceptional performance and style in mind that are perfect for professional headphones. The worldâ€™s first crowdsourced headphone, the Crossfade Mâ€‘100 was developed to achieve ultimate reliability and accuracy for stage performance and studio mastering. This, in turn, has led to over 150,000 professionals choosing it for their craft. This legacy has now been passed on to the Crossfade M-100 Master which raises the bar in terms of fit, audio quality and durability.

A HI-RES SOUND THAT IS AS CLEAN AS YOUR CONSCIENCE

The V-MODA Crossfade M-100 Master consists of dual-diaphragm 50mm drivers which feature a sophisticated sound signature. Expect unmatched clarity from the sharpest highs and the deepest bass. This headphone is Hi-Res certified (after numerous tests) by the Japan Audio Society.

BUILT LIKE A TANK: STURDY, LIGHTWEIGHT AND WITHSTANDS YOUR LONG HOURS AT THE STUDIO

Nothing should come between you and your music when you have the Crossfade M-100 Master. These headphones are made from impermeable materials that have long-lasting durability and breathability. The memory foam ear cushions are a great companion to the SteelFlex, 100% premium vegan leather headband that offers a comfortable fit.

HOST OF CABLE OPTIONS TO USE YOUR V-MODA TO THE FULLEST

The communication of the Crossfade M-100 Master just got better with the SpeakEasyâ„¢ 1â€‘Button Mic Cable which ensures high-quality listening and the SharePlayâ„¢ Cable for mixing & mastering. PS: If you want to further personalize your Crossfade M-100 Master in terms of cables, below are the recommendations. (These are not included in the box.) CoilPro Cable : With TwistLock technology, it extends listening reach for DJs and other audio professionals. BoomPro Microphone : Mainly for next-level gaming experience and crystal-clear communication. Speakeasy DAC/AMP Lightning Cable : Studio-quality sound for your Apple devices.: Without remote. Made for pure analogue sound.

The V-MODA - M-100 Master has more bass compared to M-200. The M-200 are the most balanced and neutral sounding out of their entire range.

title: JVC - HA-ET90BT
description:
Designed in Japan

Balanced Sound Signature

Neodymium Drivers

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Sports & Gym

Works with Android & iOS

1 Year of Warranty

IPX5 Sweat Resistance

Use Wirelessly with Bluetooth

3+6 Hours of Battery Life

Wireless Range of 10m

DESCRIPTION

Designed For Sportsmen

JVC has worked specifically to develop the HA-ET90BT for serious runners and athletes. The idea behind this was to ensure music can be used as a motivation for runners to push themselves further and enjoy a stress-free experience while training.

Safe And Secure Fit

The ET90BT comes in an oval design and a pivot motion fit which ensures that the earbuds fit securely in your ears and prevent them from falling off easily. This in turn lets you use these for rigorous exercises and workouts without having to deal with loose earbuds.

Sweat Your Way

Fitted with IPX5 water and sweat resistance you can use these during the sweatest of workouts as well as during a jog in the rains. One less thing to worry about while working out.

Enjoy Long Listening Sessions

The ET90BT comes with 3 hours of earbud battery life which should suffice your everyday workout. In case you want to listen for a longer period of time, the charging case provides an additional 6 hours of battery life. Also, since the case is portable you can take them everywhere you go.

Apps Your Way

JVC comes with an app which guides you with everything you need to control your earbuds. From battery indicator to freedom of sound customization all things are possible when using the app. Also, the "Find" feature lets you spot your earbuds in the night as it emits a sound and the LED lights begin to flicker. Available for Android & iOS.

Get A Customized Playlist

The "Run & Music" app analyses the music you are listening and curates a playlist from that stored in your smartphones. The songs are chosen in such a way that the beats increase in order to help you increase your running speed naturally along with the song.

title: Focal - Elegia
description:
Designed in France

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Closed-Back Design

40mm Aluminium/Magnesium Dynamic driver

DESCRIPTION

FOCAL'S FIRST HI-END CLOSED-BACK HEADPHONE

After intense research and meticulously considered design comes Focal's newest audiophile headphone â€” the Elegia. Integrated with the brand's exclusive technologies, these are their first audiophile circumaural closed-back headphones that's meant to entirely enclose a user's ears and offer great isolation from ambient sound.

DOME-SHAPED DRIVERS THAT OFFER A NATURAL, PRECISE SOUND

Elegia's speaker drivers are a mass of innovation dedicated to sound purity. The electrodynamic transducers provide great expansion at the heart of extremely dynamic sound and a linear, extended frequency response of 23 kHz. The geometry of the new, half-roll NBR surrounds guarantees a lightweight moving part that is always under control, even at the lowest frequencies and the highest volumes. The M-shaped inverted dome and the larger emissive surface make every listening session sensational.

SUPERIOR NOISE ISOLATION FOR UNINTERRUPTED MUSIC LISTENING

Elegia provides the perfect noise isolation for music lovers out there. Engineers at Focal have worked hard to ensure that the ear cup's fit, vents and earpads give you the perfect isolation so you no longer get disturbed by the surrounding sound. The headphones make sure that there is no resonance or unwanted sound signals hindering your music while the precise, naturalness of the sound is retained.

CREATED TO LOOK, SOUND AND FEEL GOOD

The Elegia has been designed to perfect the wearer perfectly. The headband, yoke and 20mm memory foam microfibre earpads mould perfectly to the head and face, providing optimal grip and fatigue-free on-the-go use. It uses premium materials like leather, solid aluminium and microfibre to look good, stay durable and add comfort.

DESIGNED & ENGINEERED IN FRANCE

The Elegia uses technology developed exclusively by Focal in France. To ensure that each and every product is high-performance, it has to feature a 100% Focal design. This allows complete control over the design and quality control processes in order to guarantee high-quality loudspeakers, headphones and earphones that offer enduring value.

description:
Designed in Japan

Flat Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

DEMO UNIT

Headphone Zone Certified Demo Headphones
Our careful selection of demo headphones gives you the experience of pre-burned in headphones - at drop dead prices. We do this sale every year to clear up our existing demos and to make way for new units instead. These demo headphones have been used at our Experience Studio in Mumbai. The pictures above depict the condition of the product and also indicate the accessories available with the headphone. For any specific questions about the condition please get in touch with us! While the product itself is fully tested by our Headphone Gurus and the outer packaging may have suffered some damage.

GET THE BEST DEAL
You may or may not get the original packaging or some accessories may be missing & because of the fact that they've been extensively used as a demo at the Experience Studio, we give a good discount compared to a new gear.

UNCHANGED REPLACEMENT POLICY
Received a defective Demo unit? Return it under our 7 Day Replacement Guarantee Policy. P.S. If you do not like your gear, unfortunately we will not be able to accept the return.

PRE-BURNED IN
Demo headphones save you the time of burning in new headphones. Typically, brand new headphones take up to weeks to fully break in and sound as good as they should. With demoâ€‹ â€‹headphones, you get to enjoy the best sound out of the box.

UNBIASED CUSTOMER SERVICE
We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Demo Units or any products.

CONSIDER IT VINTAGE
Vintage products have a certain charm that cannot be put into words. Think of old, discontinued demo headphones as vintage. They have a story; they have, how-to-say, character.

PROFESSIONALLY INSPECTED
A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

IN THE BOX

WHAT YOU WILL GET

BOX CONTAINS
1. STAX - SR-009 (Demo Unit)

SERVICE DETAILS

WARRANTY
NA

DESCRIPTION

WHAT IS ELECTROSTATIC TECHNOLOGY?, EXPERIENCE â€˜LIVEâ€™ SOUND

Stax earspeaker adopt electrostatic transducer over dynamic-coils or dynamic drivers. The headphones house thin electrically charged diaphragm that are placed between two conductive plates or electrodes. Thereby, these earspeakers produce extremely great audio. These "millennium" headphones have been tuned to produce the most powerful lows with crisp highs and lows. Enjoy your music in in its purest form, just like the way it has been recorded at the studio.

THE SMALLEST SOUND SPEAKER, BEST BUILD QUALITY

Stax calls the SR-009 a Earspeaker, as these headphones produce audio that is exceptional and on par with the music produced by the best loudspeakers. Thus, Stax indubitably contributes to the most advanced level of sonic transduction. The SR-009 has been build to last. The drivers sit safely enclosed inside a durable body that has been ergonomically engineered from stable aluminium. Aluminium being the most suitable material for audio equipment, produces your music in the best quality. In order to ensure stability like no other, every part of the SR-009 has been manufactured through precise machine processing.

COMFORTABLE FOR LONG MUSIC LISTENING SESSIONS, HIGH QUALITY CABLE

The Stax SR-009 features earpads that have been handcrafted by craftsmen from real leather and can withstand harsh environmental conditions. The soft cushioned earpads enable hours of comfortable music listening. The arc headband is equipped with position adjustment mechanism, and perfects sits on your crown. The cable comprises of high-purity copper that is used in the wiring of large scale integration circuits and also known as high-quality audio cables. Silver-coated and finished with the most suitable-structure, they are built to drive the best of your earspeakers.

title: KZ - ZS10 Pro
description:
Chi-Fi Excellence

V-Shaped Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Commuting

Ideal for Taking Calls

1 Dynamic + 4 BA Drivers

Works with Android & iOS

Tangle-Free Cables

Replaceable 2-Pin Cables

Super Lightweight Design

A penta-driver configuration at a price quite unheard of is insane innit? The ZS10 Pro more than delivers with it.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

4 BALANCED ARMATURES + 1 DYNAMIC DRIVER FOR INCREDIBLE SOUND

As an upgraded version of the ZS10, the KZ ZS10 Pro uses customised balanced armature drivers, 2 for the high and 2 for the mid frequencies. It also adopts the 2nd generation Tesla double magnetic dynamic unit for the rhythm and bass.

USES ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY TO MAKE YOUR MUSIC COME ALIVE

KZ's independent research and development with dynamic drivers are responsible for the ZS10 Pro's low-frequency output. It is excellently crafted using the PCB electronic frequency division board resulting in smooth and distortion-free sound. The Dual Balanced Armature drivers are responsible for the mid and treble performance. It provides a high-intensity resolution, rich sense of quality and full vocals that makes these IEMs a pure listening experience for you.

DESIGNED TO LOOK GOOD & LAST LONG

This IEM's faceplate is made of 304 stainless steel while the cavity is made from imported resin. These two different materials add shimmer and an exquisite look to the earphone which also makes them durable and long-lasting. The superior noise isolation cancels out ambient sound.

MADE TO BE FLEXIBLE

The ZS10 Pro's wire hooks are made of expensive memory metal, which makes it very convenient for users to adjust the earphones around the ear. The cable that comes in the box terminates in a 3.5mm plug and comes with an inline remote & mic. It's easy to change your IEMs from wired to wireless or upgrade the cable with the detachable 2-pin slots. The new limit slot protection design keeps the pins from breaking and ensures a longer life.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

4 BALANCED ARMATURES + 1 DYNAMIC DRIVER FOR INCREDIBLE SOUND

As an upgraded version of the ZS10, the KZ ZS10 Pro uses customised balanced armature drivers, 2 for the high and 2 for the mid frequencies. It also adopts the 2nd generation Tesla double magnetic dynamic unit for the rhythm and bass.

USES ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY TO MAKE YOUR MUSIC COME ALIVE

KZ's independent research and development with dynamic drivers are responsible for the ZS10 Pro's low-frequency output. It is excellently crafted using the PCB electronic frequency division board resulting in smooth and distortion-free sound. The Dual Balanced Armature drivers are responsible for the mid and treble performance. It provides a high-intensity resolution, rich sense of quality and full vocals that makes these IEMs a pure listening experience for you.

DESIGNED TO LOOK GOOD & LAST LONG

This IEM's faceplate is made of 304 stainless steel while the cavity is made from imported resin. These two different materials add shimmer and an exquisite look to the earphone which also makes them durable and long-lasting. The superior noise isolation cancels out ambient sound.

MADE TO BE FLEXIBLE

The ZS10 Pro's wire hooks are made of expensive memory metal, which makes it very convenient for users to adjust the earphones around the ear. The cable that comes in the box terminates in a 3.5mm plug and comes with an inline remote & mic. It's easy to change your IEMs from wired to wireless or upgrade the cable with the detachable 2-pin slots. The new limit slot protection design keeps the pins from breaking and ensures a longer life.

title: KZ - ZS10 Pro
description:
Chi-Fi Excellence

V-Shaped Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Commuting

Ideal for Taking Calls

1 Dynamic + 4 BA Drivers

Works with Android & iOS

Super Lightweight Design

A penta-driver configuration at a price quite unheard of is insane innit? The ZS10 Pro more than delivers with it.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

4 BALANCED ARMATURES + 1 DYNAMIC DRIVER FOR INCREDIBLE SOUND

As an upgraded version of the ZS10, the KZ ZS10 Pro uses customised balanced armature drivers, 2 for the high and 2 for the mid frequencies. It also adopts the 2nd generation Tesla double magnetic dynamic unit for the rhythm and bass.

USES ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY TO MAKE YOUR MUSIC COME ALIVE

KZ's independent research and development with dynamic drivers are responsible for the ZS10 Pro's low-frequency output. It is excellently crafted using the PCB electronic frequency division board resulting in smooth and distortion-free sound. The Dual Balanced Armature drivers are responsible for the mid and treble performance. It provides a high-intensity resolution, rich sense of quality and full vocals that makes these IEMs a pure listening experience for you.

DESIGNED TO LOOK GOOD & LAST LONG

This IEM's faceplate is made of 304 stainless steel while the cavity is made from imported resin. These two different materials add shimmer and an exquisite look to the earphone which also makes them durable and long-lasting. The superior noise isolation cancels out ambient sound.

MADE TO BE FLEXIBLE

The ZS10 Pro's wire hooks are made of expensive memory metal, which makes it very convenient for users to adjust the earphones around the ear. The cable that comes in the box terminates in a 3.5mm plug and comes with an inline remote & mic. It's easy to change your IEMs from wired to wireless or upgrade the cable with the detachable 2-pin slots. The new limit slot protection design keeps the pins from breaking and ensures a longer life.
