title: HiFiMAN - Arya (Stealth Magnet Version)
description:
Chi-Fi Excellence

Balanced Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Cables

Needs Amplification

DESCRIPTION

UPGRADED PLANAR MAGNETIC HEADPHONE WITH STEALTH MAGNETS

HiFiMAN is known for introducing technologically advanced headphones to the world and the Arya Stealth Magnet Version is one of them. Unlike the sound waves created by a conventional magnet, the shape of Stealth Magnets enables the waves to pass through the magnets without generating any interference. HiFiMANâ€™s advanced magnet design is acoustically transparent, dramatically reducing wave diffraction turbulence that degrades the integrity of the sound waves. The reduced distortion yields pure sonic output that is accurate and full-range.

PLANAR MAGNETIC EXCELLENCE WITH NANOMETER DIAPHRAGM

When it comes to detailed audio retrieval, no factor is more important than the diaphragm. Required to oscillate up to 20,000 times a second, most diaphragms, which are made of plastic or cardboard, canâ€™t overcome the hurdle of their inertia to reproduce lifelike details. The HiFiMAN Arya Stealth Magnet Version, on the other hand, features a diaphragm thatâ€™s only a nanometer thick. This exceptional thinness allows it to reproduce unparalleled details and lifelike imaging that you wonâ€™t find on other headphones.

ASYMMETRICAL EAR CUPS WITH PATENTED WINDOW SHADE SYSTEM

The HiFiMAN Arya Stealth Magnet Version has focused on remarkable sound due to its open-back nature. To support the remarkable sound, the Arya Stealth Magnet Version has been equipped with asymmetrical ear cups to follow the natural shape of the human ears and offer a snug fit. These headphones have also been elevated with the companyâ€™s patented window shade system, which is created to meet the need for driver protection and allows ample space for sound waves to escape, resulting in a highly durable and sonically-pure headphone.

BOLD AESTHETIC WITH METAL AND HIGH-GRADE PLASTIC CONSTRUCTION

The HiFiMAN Arya Stealth Magnet Version showcases the classic HE1000 style and shapes with its all-black exterior, glossy black headband and eye-catching matte-black cups and grill, the Arya Stealth Magnet Version is a statement of both aesthetic and sonic excellence. The materials used for the build of the headphones are of high quality and the headphone is lightweight as it is made from high-grade plastic and the headband is built with high-grade metal. This makes the headphones durable and comfortable. It perfectly complements the headphone in terms of sound as well as looks.

STURDY 3.5MM REPLACEABLE CONNECTOR AND CRYSTALLINE COPPER CABLE

The HiFiMAN Arya Stealth Magnet Version keeps things simple with a single Crystalline Copper cable. Featuring a 6.35mm plug and a jet black woven exterior finish itâ€™s the perfect complement to the sound and sight of the Arya. These headphones also come with a user-replaceable connector design allowing for easy cable swapping, offering durability and enhanced customizability.

description:

UNBOXED

Headphone Zone Certified UnboxedÂ Units
Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. Usually, the product's packaging may have gotten damaged in transit. Customers use a product once or twice and then return it with opened upÂ packaging.

WHERE DO UNBOXED PRODUCTS COME FROM?

Customer Returns Returned headphones are fully functional products that have left the warehouse and therefore can no longer be sold as new as their packaging has been opened. The product may have been used once or twice by the customer who returned it.

Transit Damages Sometimes we receive headphones in damaged packaging due to shipping accidents. These are brand new headphones with cosmetic flaws on the packaging.

Why Buy Unboxed Headphones?

Save Upto 15%
Since you won't get the original packaging, we give you a good discount compared to a new headphone.

Professionally Inspected
A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

Original Warranty
All unboxed headphones carry the same warranty period as a brand new headphone would.

Unbiased Customer Service
We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Unboxed Products or new products.

Unchanged ReplacementÂ Policy
Received a defective Unboxed unit? Return it under our Replacement Policy.

ALL Original Accessories
The unboxed headphones itself comes with all original accessories.

See More

DESCRIPTION

BETTERMENT OF THE BEST. NOW WITH HI-RES CERTIFICATION

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition has been engineered with high-quality drivers. The 50mm dual-diaphragm has inner and outer rings that prevent the bass from bleeding into the mids and highs. Thanks to its CCAW coil, it has been certified as Hi-Res by the Japan Audio Society (JAS).

PHENOMENAL SOUND, WIRED OR WIRELESS.

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition builds on the M-100's crowdsourced sound and 22 editors choice awards won by the Crossfade series. It has been created to delight audiophiles everywhere with its expansive soundstage and minimal sound leakage. Plug it in or listen wirelessly, you get almost the same quality sound either way.

14 HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYBACK WITH AAC AND APTX SUPPORT ON BLUETOOTH

Get through the day with the Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition which gives you up to 14 hours of music playtime on a single charge. If you are in a hurry, a fast charge of 30 minutes will give you 4 hours of battery life. Switch seamlessly between devices with the multi-device pairing option. Qualcomm aptX and AAC ensures high-quality sound when listening to music wirelessly.

STRONG. FLEXIBLE. PORTABLE. COMFORTABLE.

The ergonomic headband and patent-pending hexagon shape minimize the force on your head and ears for the best fit. The earcups are generously padded letting you listen to your music for hours without getting an ear-ache. The Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition also comes with a patented CliqFold hinge that can be folded to fit into the Exoskeleton carrying case that comes along with the headphone.

FAQs

What is the warranty on the V-MODA - Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition and how do I claim it?

V-MODA - Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition offers a one year warranty. If you need to claim warranty, you can contact us. We are quite friendly people, just sayin. You can read more about warranty here.

How long will the battery last when charged?

Please see the table below for estimated charging times and equivalent playback time. Please note these times are estimates, and volume level may affect battery life. Charge Time: 30 Mins: Play Time: 3 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 60 Mins: Play Time: 7 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 110 Mins: Play Time: 10 - 12 hrs

What kind of charger should I use to charge my Crossfade Wireless?

The best option is to use a 5V output charging source with the included V-MODA V-Micro USB cable. DO NOT use external chargers with output voltage above 5V (e.g. 9V, 12V etc.) as they might cause damages to the headphones.

How can I make sure the charging source/charger output I'm using is 5V and safe for my Crossfade Wireless?

All chargers with a label "Output: 5V" are safe for Crossfade Wireless. This is the standard output of USB ports on PCs/notebooks and bundled chargers from Apple products.

What is the range of the Crossfade Wireless in wireless/bluetooth mode?

The Crossfade Wireless have a wireless range of up to 33ft when paired to a bluetooth device.

Can I pair my headphones to two devices at the same time?

Yes, Crossfade Wireless are able to maintain Bluetooth connection with two devices simultaneously such as smartphone+laptop, smartphone+tablet or smartphone+smartwatch.

Can I use the headphones for Skype / VoIP communication?

Yes, Crossfade Wireless can be used for your VoIP calls if the source in charge of VoIP is Bluetooth enabled with the hands-free profile.

Why is the 1-Button SpeakEasyâ„¢ Microphone & Mic cable included in the box?

Crossfade Wireless work both in wireless mode with Bluetooth devices and in wired mode with non-Bluetooth devices. Unlike other wireless headphones, the sound will be virtually indistinguishable from wireless mode in pure analog wired mode.

Does this come with a carry case?

Yes, the V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition does come with a carrying pouch in the box.

Is the build quite durable?

Just like any other V-MODA headphones, the V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition is built like a tank.

When Buying a Custom Shield Kit, How many shields do I get?

Each custom shield kit comes with two shields in the color of your choice.

Are my memory cushions replaceable?

Yes they are, please visit our accessories section to purchase extra pairs.

Difference between Crossfade 2 wireless and Crossfade 2 wireless codex edition?

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition supports multiple cosecs like aptX, AAC & SBC were as the Crossfade 2 Wireless offers aptX support (Rose Gold variant). The Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition also, feature a new driver with Japanese CCAW coil which enables them to support Hi-Res Audio in wired mode.

Warranty & Media Reviews

Don't sweat it, this V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition (Unboxed) comes with a 1 year warranty from V-MODA that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about V-MODA's warranty in India.

What kind of charger should I use to charge my Crossfade Wireless?

Headphone Zone Certified UnboxedÂ Units
Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. Usually, the product's packaging may have gotten damaged in transit. Customers use a product once or twice and then return it with opened upÂ packaging.

WHERE DO UNBOXED PRODUCTS COME FROM?

Customer Returns Returned headphones are fully functional products that have left the warehouse and therefore can no longer be sold as new as their packaging has been opened. The product may have been used once or twice by the customer who returned it.

Transit Damages Sometimes we receive headphones in damaged packaging due to shipping accidents. These are brand new headphones with cosmetic flaws on the packaging.

Save Upto 15%

DESCRIPTION

BETTERMENT OF THE BEST. NOW WITH HI-RES CERTIFICATION

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition has been engineered with high-quality drivers. The 50mm dual-diaphragm has inner and outer rings that prevent the bass from bleeding into the mids and highs. Thanks to its CCAW coil, it has been certified as Hi-Res by the Japan Audio Society (JAS).

PHENOMENAL SOUND, WIRED OR WIRELESS.

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition builds on the M-100's crowdsourced sound and 22 editors choice awards won by the Crossfade series. It has been created to delight audiophiles everywhere with its expansive soundstage and minimal sound leakage. Plug it in or listen wirelessly, you get almost the same quality sound either way.

14 HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYBACK WITH AAC AND APTX SUPPORT ON BLUETOOTH

Get through the day with the Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition which gives you up to 14 hours of music playtime on a single charge. If you are in a hurry, a fast charge of 30 minutes will give you 4 hours of battery life. Switch seamlessly between devices with the multi-device pairing option. Qualcomm aptX and AAC ensures high-quality sound when listening to music wirelessly.

STRONG. FLEXIBLE. PORTABLE. COMFORTABLE.

The ergonomic headband and patent-pending hexagon shape minimize the force on your head and ears for the best fit. The earcups are generously padded letting you listen to your music for hours without getting an ear-ache. title: Meze - Rai Penta
description:
Designed in Romania

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Best Suited for Portable Use

Metal Build

1 Dynamic + 4 BA Drivers

Replaceable MMCX Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE PERFECT IEM FOR THE TRUE AUDIOPHILE

The Meze Rai Penta is a high-end audiophile IEM that works effortlessly with any source device due to its low impedance and high sensitivity. It has high-quality sound and the perfect build with its smart, unique and ergonomic housing. This IEM consists of 4 balanced drivers and 1 dynamic driver making it the perfect sonic combination. Enjoy detailed sound, natural tonality and consistent fit.

5 DRIVER CONFIGURATION FOR POWERFUL PERFORMANCE

The hybrid technology of the Rai Penta delivers harmonized sound frequencies without the overlay of phase issues. The sound has to pass from the housing to the nozzle and finally to the eartips to reach your eardrums. To make this seamless, the precise length of each sound tube has been created to determine the air volume in front of each driver so that the 5 drivers work smoothly and deliver pure sound.

THE PERFECT DESIGN FOR DETAILED SOUND

Most multi-driver configurations use an imperfect plastic tube and dampener system that result in interference. The Rai Penta's driver does away with this design for clean, pure sound. It delivers a balanced sound signature and also provides extreme detailing to every tune, within a frequency range from 4Hz to 45 kHz. Moreover, you can drive it with just about any and every source device.

CNC ALUMINIUM CHASSIS FOR DISTURBANCE-FREE SOUND

The finely tuned PES design in front and behind the driver assembly helps in controlling the internal chamber pressure by regulating the airflow. For the sound to be directed to your ears without any disturbance, the CNC aluminium chassis is milled from solid aluminium to create a perfect space for it. The milled logo on the high-endurance anodised surface shows the aluminium material under the anodizing.

ANATOMICAL, ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR LONG LISTENING SESSIONS

Meze has designed the Rai Penta's housings to be durable, comfortable and easy to use. The rounded edges are designed to mimic the natural curves of the human ear for a more secure and comfortable fit. It's purely made for the true audiophile to spend hours and hours listening to this beauty.

HIGH-QUALITY CABLES AND CONNECTORS

These IEMs have been designed with high-purity silver-plated copper wires and use finely crafted metal plugs shells. This ensures that the assembled cables are strong enough for a long time. Each of the 4 wires consists of 20 Litz strands. For the best connectivity and durability, the MMCX plugs are crafted from high-quality materials including a rhodium-plated plug termination.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

DRIVERS
Penta-Hybrid Drivers

4 x Customized Balanced Armature 1 x Dynamic Driver

IMPEDANCE
20 Î©

SENSITIVITY
110 dB spl/1mW Sensitivity

4 Hz - 45 kHz

DISTORTION
less than 1%

CONTROLS & CONNECTIVITY

MMCX connector

COMPATIBILITY
Universal

DESIGN & BUILD

WEARING STYLE

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS
1. In-Ear headphones

2. Hard Case: protective EVA case with Meze Audio metal logo

3. 4 pairs of soft silicone eartips XS, S, M, L

4. MMCX braided cables made of silver plated copper custom wires ending in high quality 3.5mm

5. 1 double flanged eartips

6. 2 deep insertion double flanged eartips

7. 1 pair of comply foam eartips

8. 3.5mm to 6.3mm adapter

9. Airplane 2 pin adapter

10. Cleaning tool

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Meze and how do I claim it?

The warranty period on all Meze Audio products is 2 years. Read more about Meze warranty.

What is the cable like?

These IEMs have been designed with high-purity silver-plated copper wires and use finely crafted metal plugs shells.

Does the Meze Rai Penta come with an inline microphone?

No, the Rai Penta believes in minimalism. Also, what is a remote when compared to the gorgeous sound it offers.

What is the driver configuration on Meze Rai Penta?

The Rai Penta has a 5 driver configuration. It comes with 4 Balance Armature Drivers and 1 Dynamic Driver.

Does the Rai Penta come with a carry case?

Yes, it does come with a protective hard pouch.

Does the Rai Penta come with detachable cables?

Yes, the Rai Penta comes with detachable MMCX connectors. That means you can replace the stock cable with a balanced cable to open up the sound further.

Do you need an amplifier to drive these?

It is not recommended to get an amplifier as these are sensitive earphones. However, you can pair this up with a Hi-Res Player to take your music listening experience to the next level. Check out our collection here.

BUYING GUIDE

title: Marshall - Kilburn II
description:
Designed in the UK

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Movies and TV

Best Suited for Portable Use

Bluetooth with aptX

20+ Hours of Battery Life

DESCRIPTION

Multi-Directional Stereo Sound

You will hear signature Marshall sound with the Kilburn II stereo speaker engineered to produce a larger than life multi-directional sound that will immerse you in your music, indoors or out. The well balanced audio of the compact speaker boasts a clear midrange and extended highs for a sound that is both articulate and pronounced. Bass lovers will go crazy over the insanely powerful music offered by these speakers and youâ€™d end up wanting more.

Classic Vintage Design

The Marshall Kilburn II speakers come equpped with upgraded Bluetooth 5.0 aptX technology version. You can connect any Bluetooth enabled devices at a range of up to 30 feet such as computers, mobile phones, laptops and tablets. No clumsy wires to ruin your musical time.

Lightweight & Portable

Weighing 2.5kgs, the Marshall Kilburn II can be taken anywhere you go. You can turn a small boring gathering into a musical one by simply plugging any of your devices or streaming via Bluetooth and playing everybodyâ€™s favorite songs.

Durable & Water Resistant

The Kilburn II features flush mounted corner caps and a water-resistant design, making it supremely rugged and durable. The IPX2 water-resistant rating means it is able to withstand a little water. So enjoy your favourite music outdoors as well.

Multi-Point Connectivity

Along with having Bluetooth aptX it also gives you the freedom to easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth enabled devices to enjoy taking turns playing DJ. Now everyone gets to play music and switch seamlessly.

20+ hours of Battery Life

The Marshall Kilburn II comes with built-in battery which has the capacity of running for more than 20 hours. You can enjoy listening to your favorite tracks for all most all day long. Now, plug it in and start grooving. Also you can track the speakerâ€™s battery life with the battery indicator located on the top panel of the speaker.

Customize Your Way

Kilburn IIâ€™s top panel features analogue control knobs for bass, treble and volume, allowing you to fine-tune to the exact sound you desire. You get the freedom to tune the music to what suits you the most.

Specs

DESCRIPTION

Multi-Directional Stereo Sound

You will hear signature Marshall sound with the Kilburn II stereo speaker engineered to produce a larger than life multi-directional sound that will immerse you in your music, indoors or out. The well balanced audio of the compact speaker boasts a clear midrange and extended highs for a sound that is both articulate and pronounced. Bass lovers will go crazy over the insanely powerful music offered by these speakers and youâ€™d end up wanting more.

Classic Vintage Design

The Marshall Kilburn II speakers come equpped with upgraded Bluetooth 5.0 aptX technology version. You can connect any Bluetooth enabled devices at a range of up to 30 feet such as computers, mobile phones, laptops and tablets. No clumsy wires to ruin your musical time.

Lightweight & Portable

Weighing 2.5kgs, the Marshall Kilburn II can be taken anywhere you go. You can turn a small boring gathering into a musical one by simply plugging any of your devices or streaming via Bluetooth and playing everybodyâ€™s favorite songs.

Durable & Water Resistant

The Kilburn II features flush mounted corner caps and a water-resistant design, making it supremely rugged and durable. The IPX2 water-resistant rating means it is able to withstand a little water. So enjoy your favourite music outdoors as well.

Multi-Point Connectivity

Along with having Bluetooth aptX it also gives you the freedom to easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth enabled devices to enjoy taking turns playing DJ. Now everyone gets to play music and switch seamlessly.

20+ hours of Battery Life

The Marshall Kilburn II comes with built-in battery which has the capacity of running for more than 20 hours. You can enjoy listening to your favorite tracks for all most all day long. Now, plug it in and start grooving. Also you can track the speakerâ€™s battery life with the battery indicator located on the top panel of the speaker.

Customize Your Way

Kilburn IIâ€™s top panel features analogue control knobs for bass, treble and volume, allowing you to fine-tune to the exact sound you desire. You get the freedom to tune the music to what suits you the most.

description:

DESCRIPTION

Free Custom Laser Engraving
Make your headphones truly your own. Be it a logo, your name or even a piece of artwork you've created, the stateâ€‘ofâ€‘theâ€‘art laser engraving turns the shields on your V-MODA headphones into something others will envy. *Once you've placed an order, please send your logo here Read More

BETTERMENT OF THE BEST. NOW WITH HI-RES CERTIFICATION

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition has been engineered with high-quality drivers. The 50mm dual-diaphragm has inner and outer rings that prevent the bass from bleeding into the mids and highs. Thanks to its CCAW coil, it has been certified as Hi-Res by the Japan Audio Society (JAS).

PHENOMENAL SOUND, WIRED OR WIRELESS.

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition builds on the M-100's crowdsourced sound and 22 editors choice awards won by the Crossfade series. It has been created to delight audiophiles everywhere with its expansive soundstage and minimal sound leakage. Plug it in or listen wirelessly, you get almost the same quality sound either way.

14 HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYBACK WITH AAC AND APTX SUPPORT ON BLUETOOTH

Get through the day with the Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition which gives you up to 14 hours of music playtime on a single charge. If you are in a hurry, a fast charge of 30 minutes will give you 4 hours of battery life. Switch seamlessly between devices with the multi-device pairing option. Qualcomm aptX and AAC ensures high-quality sound when listening to music wirelessly.

STRONG. FLEXIBLE. PORTABLE. COMFORTABLE.

The ergonomic headband and patent-pending hexagon shape minimize the force on your head and ears for the best fit. The earcups are generously padded letting you listen to your music for hours without getting an ear-ache. The Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition also comes with a patented CliqFold hinge that can be folded to fit into the Exoskeleton carrying case that comes along with the headphone.

FAQs

What is the warranty on the V-MODA - Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition and how do I claim it?

V-MODA - Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition offers a one year warranty. If you need to claim warranty, you can contact us. We are quite friendly people, just sayin. You can read more about warranty here.

How long will the battery last when charged?

Please see the table below for estimated charging times and equivalent playback time. Please note these times are estimates, and volume level may affect battery life. Charge Time: 30 Mins: Play Time: 3 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 60 Mins: Play Time: 7 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 110 Mins: Play Time: 10 - 12 hrs

What kind of charger should I use to charge my Crossfade Wireless?

The best option is to use a 5V output charging source with the included V-MODA V-Micro USB cable. DO NOT use external chargers with output voltage above 5V (e.g. 9V, 12V etc.) as they might cause damages to the headphones.

How can I make sure the charging source/charger output I'm using is 5V and safe for my Crossfade Wireless?

All chargers with a label "Output: 5V" are safe for Crossfade Wireless. This is the standard output of USB ports on PCs/notebooks and bundled chargers from Apple products.

What is the range of the Crossfade Wireless in wireless/bluetooth mode?

The Crossfade Wireless have a wireless range of up to 33ft when paired to a bluetooth device.

Can I pair my headphones to two devices at the same time?

Yes, Crossfade Wireless are able to maintain Bluetooth connection with two devices simultaneously such as smartphone+laptop, smartphone+tablet or smartphone+smartwatch.

Can I use the headphones for Skype / VoIP communication?

Yes, Crossfade Wireless can be used for your VoIP calls if the source in charge of VoIP is Bluetooth enabled with the hands-free profile.

Why is the 1-Button SpeakEasyâ„¢ Microphone & Mic cable included in the box?

Crossfade Wireless work both in wireless mode with Bluetooth devices and in wired mode with non-Bluetooth devices. Unlike other wireless headphones, the sound will be virtually indistinguishable from wireless mode in pure analog wired mode.

Does this come with a carry case?

Yes, the V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition does come with a carrying pouch in the box.

Is the build quite durable?

Just like any other V-MODA headphones, the V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition is built like a tank.

When Buying a Custom Shield Kit, How many shields do I get?

Each custom shield kit comes with two shields in the color of your choice.

Are my memory cushions replaceable?

Yes they are, please visit our accessories section to purchase extra pairs.

Difference between Crossfade 2 wireless and Crossfade 2 wireless codex edition?

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition supports multiple cosecs like aptX, AAC & SBC were as the Crossfade 2 Wireless offers aptX support (Rose Gold variant). The Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition also, feature a new driver with Japanese CCAW coil which enables them to support Hi-Res Audio in wired mode.

FAQs

What is the warranty on the V-MODA - Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition and how do I claim it?

V-MODA - Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition offers a one year warranty. If you need to claim warranty, you can contact us. We are quite friendly people, just sayin. You can read more about warranty here.

How long will the battery last when charged?

Please see the table below for estimated charging times and equivalent playback time. Please note these times are estimates, and volume level may affect battery life. Charge Time: 30 Mins: Play Time: 3 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 60 Mins: Play Time: 7 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 110 Mins: Play Time: 10 - 12 hrs

What kind of charger should I use to charge my Crossfade Wireless?

The best option is to use a 5V output charging source with the included V-MODA V-Micro USB cable. DO NOT use external chargers with output voltage above 5V (e.g. 9V, 12V etc.) as they might cause damages to the headphones.

How can I make sure the charging source/charger output I'm using is 5V and safe for my Crossfade Wireless?

All chargers with a label "Output: 5V" are safe for Crossfade Wireless. This is the standard output of USB ports on PCs/notebooks and bundled chargers from Apple products.

What is the range of the Crossfade Wireless in wireless/bluetooth mode?

The Crossfade Wireless have a wireless range of up to 33ft when paired to a bluetooth device.

Can I pair my headphones to two devices at the same time?

Yes, Crossfade Wireless are able to maintain Bluetooth connection with two devices simultaneously such as smartphone+laptop, smartphone+tablet or smartphone+smartwatch.

Can I use the headphones for Skype / VoIP communication?

Yes, Crossfade Wireless can be used for your VoIP calls if the source in charge of VoIP is Bluetooth enabled with the hands-free profile.

Why is the 1-Button SpeakEasyâ„¢ Microphone & Mic cable included in the box?

Crossfade Wireless work both in wireless mode with Bluetooth devices and in wired mode with non-Bluetooth devices. Unlike other wireless headphones, the sound will be virtually indistinguishable from wireless mode in pure analog wired mode.

Does this come with a carry case?

Yes, the V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition does come with a carrying pouch in the box.

Is the build quite durable?

Just like any other V-MODA headphones, the V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition is built like a tank.

When Buying a Custom Shield Kit, How many shields do I get?

Each custom shield kit comes with two shields in the color of your choice.

Are my memory cushions replaceable?

Yes they are, please visit our accessories section to purchase extra pairs.

Difference between Crossfade 2 wireless and Crossfade 2 wireless codex edition?

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition supports multiple cosecs like aptX, AAC & SBC were as the Crossfade 2 Wireless offers aptX support (Rose Gold variant). The Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition also, feature a new driver with Japanese CCAW coil which enables them to support Hi-Res Audio in wired mode.

This was my first serious headphone. I love it to death. It's got the bass to blow anyone's mind within the first few seconds of hitting play. They are also undoubtedly the best designed headphones in this segment. Absolutely unmistakable.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

Free Custom Laser Engraving
Make your headphones truly your own. Be it a logo, your name or even a piece of artwork you've created, the stateâ€‘ofâ€‘theâ€‘art laser engraving turns the shields on your V-MODA headphones into something others will envy. *Once you've placed an order, please send your logo here Read More

A BRAINCHILD OF DJS AND MUSICIANS ALIKE

V-MODA has collaborated with musicians and DJs around the world to create a headphone with a refined and vibrant bass, lifelike vocals and crisp highs in an immersive 3D soundstage. This is done with its 50mm dual-diaphragm drivers and superior materials. With this headphone, you can experience pure audio without the artificial processing of battery-powered headsets. To ensure that these are ready for use and can consistently hit all notes, the Crossfade LP2 is tested at 6 different frequencies.

FLEXIBLE. STURDY. RUGGED.

Be it a range of temperatures, salt spray, humidity or UV exposure, the Crossfade LP2 will never let you down. It is built with a steel frame and interchangeable aircraft-grade metal shields. The SteelFlex headband is so flexible, it can bend flat more than 10 times while the cable can bend over a million times. The V-MODA Crossfade LP2 is tested according to Military-Level Quality MIL-STD-810G Test Standards. You can also carry your Crossfade LP2 safely wherever you'd like. Just slip it in the Exoskeleton case & you're good to go.

ERGONOMIC FIT FOR MAXIMUM ISOLATION AND MINIMUM SOUND LEAK

More than 4 years of R&D have resulted in the ergonomic headband and hexagon-shaped earcups that does away with fatigue. The BLISS foam ear cushions take the shape of your ears for added comfort and noise isolation. Analogue sound isolation cuts out all outside noise while letting you enjoy your music without worrying about (a lot of) sound leakage.

TRUSTED BY MORE THAN 200 DJS, GRAMMY-WINNING MUSICIANS, AUDIOPHILES AND ARTISTS

V-MODA headphones are known for their blend of good looks that do not compromise on functionality. The Hex design, CliqFold, SharePlay, and V-CORK are a few of their patented or yet to be patented innovations. Each and every headphone from the Crossfade series has been created after developing over 100 prototypes and consulting more than 200 DJs, Grammy-winning musicians, audiophiles and artists.

Is the laser engraving done for free or it have some charges?

No, there are no extra charges for laser engraving. The laser engraving is done for free for each pair of V-MODA shields.

Can the engraving be done in color?

No, the laser engraving is not done in color. The outer layer of the shield is scraped off and hence, the natural color of the metal is seen.

title: Audeze - LCD-4z
description:
Designed & Made in USA

Flat Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

3 Years Warranty On Drivers

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Mini XLR Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE ULTIMATE PLANAR MAGNETIC HEADPHONE

Get the Audeze flagship sound without needing an amplifier. The LCD-4z features the planar magnetic drivers of the LCD-4, but with a 15Î© impedance. This means that it can be directly driven with just about any device, and it still sounds awesome with its robust and musically engaging sound signature. The lightweight cast-magnesium housing has been designed in Audeze's U.S. headquarters for long listening sessions.

POWERFUL DOUBLE FLUXORâ„¢ MAGNETIC ARRAY

Audeze spent decades of R&D to ensure that its Double Fluxorâ„¢ Magnetic Array is the most powerful open magnetic circuit ever created. It can generate a magnetic flux of 1.5 Tesla that delivers an unrivalled amount of power for true-to-life and accurate sound with immense depth.

THE THINNEST DIAPHRAMS IN THE WORLD FOR FLAWLESS SOUND

At just one-tenth the thickness of a red blood cell, the nano-scale diaphragms are some of the thinnest in the world. This offers an extremely fast and accurate transient response with almost no distortion. Furthermore, the diaphragms are laser-etched with the patented Uniforceâ„¢ voice coils for a flawless sound that captures every detail in your music.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Audeze - LCD 4z and how do I claim it?

The warranty period of the Audeze LCD-4z is of 3 years for the drivers and 1 year for the rest of the parts. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Audeze warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

Where are these headphones made?

Audeze headphones are engineered and handcrafted in the USA to our exacting quality standards.

How does the Audeze LCD 4z sound?

The LCD 4z is a reference sounding headphones. No other headphone in the world features such a robust and musically engaging sound signature in such an efficient package.

Does the LCD 4z require amplification?

No, it does not require amplification. These headphones come with an impedance level of 15 ohms and hence it can be straight driven from the Aux port of your favorite listening device.

Does the LCD 4z come with a travel case?

Yes, it does come with a Professional travel case.

Can these headphones be used for Studio purposes?

Yes, they are reference sounding headphones that are suitable for long listening sessions.

Can the LCD 4z be used in a 3.5mm headphone output?

Yes, you will simply need the 6.5mm to 3.5mm adapter..

Take an iconic V-MODA flagship headphone, and make it even better for the wireless age. Thats basically the Crossfade 2 wireless. They're truly magnificant. And they sound objectively better than every other wireless headphone for under Rs. 30,000.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

Free Custom Laser Engraving
Make your headphones truly your own. Be it a logo, your name or even a piece of artwork you've created, the stateâ€‘ofâ€‘theâ€‘art laser engraving turns the shields on your V-MODA headphones into something others will envy. *Once you've placed an order, please send your logo here Read More

PHENOMENAL SOUND, WITH OR WITHOUT WIRES

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless builds on the M-100's crowdsourced sound and 22 editors choice awards won by the Crossfade series. It has been engineered with high-quality drivers. The 50mm dual-diaphragm has inner and outer rings that prevent the bass from bleeding into the mids and highs. The headphones have been certified Hi-Res by the Japan Audio Society (JAS).

14 HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYBACK. LATEST BLUETOOTH WITH MULTI-DEVICE PAIRING

Experience the best of Bluetooth with the industry-leading seamless connectivity. Switch between source devices with multi-device pairing. With the V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless, enjoy 14 hours of music playtime on a single charge. If you are in a time crunch, you can fast charge the headphone for 30 minutes to get around 4 hours of battery life. Even if the battery dies, you can still continue listening to music in wired mode.

STRONG. FLEXIBLE. PORTABLE. COMFORTABLE.

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless has been inspired by the stylish Milano design. It comes with a patented CliqFold hinge and can be folded to fit into the Exoskeleton carrying case. The ergonomic and patent-pending hexagon-shaped headband minimises the force on your head and ears for the best fit. The earcups are generously padded. You can listen to your music for hours without feeling any fatigue or ear-ache.

HOST OF CABLE OPTIONS TO USE YOUR V-MODA TO THE FULLEST

Experience excellent communication with the SpeakEasy 1-button mic cable. This headphone can also be paired with other cables of different functionalities (sold separately). The BoomPro mic offers crystal-clear communication. The DAC/AMP lightning cable is perfect for recording studio-like audio on iOS devices. The audio-only cable delivers pure analogue sound.

FAQs

How long will the battery last when charged?

Please see the table below for estimated charging times and equivalent playback time. Please note these times are estimates, and volume level may affect battery life. Charge Time: 30 Mins: Play Time: 3 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 60 Mins: Play Time: 7 hrs 30 mins Charge Time: 110 Mins: Play Time: 10 - 12 hrs

What kind of charger should I use to charge my Crossfade 2 Wireless Edition?

The best option is to use a 5V output charging source with the included V-MODA V-Micro USB cable. DO NOT use external chargers with output voltage above 5V (e.g. 9V, 12V etc.) as they might cause damages to the headphones.

How can I make sure the charging source/charger output I'm using is 5V and safe for my Crossfade 2 Wireless?

All chargers with a label "Output: 5V" are safe for Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition. This is the standard output of USB ports on PCs/notebooks and bundled chargers from Apple products.

What is the range of the Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition in wireless/bluetooth mode?

The Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition have a wireless range of up to 33ft when paired to a bluetooth device.

Can I pair my headphones to two devices at the same time?

Yes, Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition are able to maintain Bluetooth connection with two devices simultaneously such as smartphone+laptop, smartphone+tablet or smartphone+smartwatch.

Can I use the headphones for Skype / VoIP communication?

Yes, Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition can be used for your VoIP calls if the source in charge of VoIP is Bluetooth enabled with the hands-free profile.

Why is the 1-Button SpeakEasyâ„¢ Microphone & Mic cable included in the box?

Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition work both in wireless mode with Bluetooth devices and in wired mode with non-Bluetooth devices. Unlike other wireless headphones, the sound will be virtually indistinguishable from wireless mode in pure analog wired mode.

Difference between Crossfade 2 wireless and Crossfade 2 wireless codex edition?

The V-MODA Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition supports multiple cosecs like aptX, AAC & SBC were as the Crossfade 2 Wireless offers aptX support (Rose Gold variant). The Crossfade 2 Wireless Codex Edition also, feature a new driver with Japanese CCAW coil which enables them to support Hi-Res Audio in wired mode.

PRAVEEN KAMATH

UNBOXED

Headphone Zone Certified UnboxedÂ Units

An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

FOR HIGH PERFORMANCE WORKOUTS

The V-MODA BassFitâ€™s acoustics have been designed for maximum impact. Enjoy unparalleled clarity along with vivid mids and vivacious stress-free highs. Research shows that bass levels can increase adrenaline and make the body around 7% more energy efficient and V-MODA ensures this with its powerful 10mm drivers. A vast 3D soundstage is what completes the immersive experience that helps forget tiredness, pushing you ahead.

Charge the V-MODA BassFit Wireless once and you are good to go for 11 hours. When in a hurry, charge it for just 15 minutes and it will last for around 2.5 hours. The BassFit Wireless is designed to last long & stand through tough weather conditions as it comes with dual-layered sweat and weather resistant nano-coating.

TRIFIT DESIGN FOR A SECURE FIT

The patent-pending TriFit Design has been created for an extra secure and snug fit. The BassFit also comes with 4 pairs of BLISS (Bass Level Isolating Soft Silicone) 3.0 ear tips of different sizes. These offer superior noise isolation and comfort. You can wear these in-ears in three different ways: TriFit Option 1 (Ear Hooks) - ActiveFlexâ„¢ ear hooks crafted from memory metal are shaped to bend around and behind the outer part of the ear. This design keeps the BassFit securely in place, even during rigorous workouts. TriFit Option 2 (Sports Fins) - The Sport Ear Fins are ergonomically designed to fit the natural shape of the ear. The soft material mimics the natural skin and the different sized fins ensure superior comfort. TriFit Option 3 (Combo) - This option features both â€” the Ear Hooks and the Sports Fins for an even better and secure fit.

SEAMLESS CONTROLS WITHOUT BREAKING PACE

The specially-tuned SpeakEasy microphone on the cable offers crystal-clear voice calls. Want to know more about that new workouts or turn the volume up? Simply use the inline 3-button remote or ask Siri/ Ok Google on your smart device to do it for you.

title: Meze - Empyrean
description:
Designed in Romania

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Drivers

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE FLAGSHIP THAT'S MADE FROM PASSION

The Empyrean is the result of two passionate companies coming together to give you an audiophile-level headphone. The powerful drivers are made by Rinaro, an audio company that has been at the forefront in the development of planar magnets since the 1980s. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

The warranty period on all Meze Audio products is 2 years. Read more about Meze warranty.

The Meze - Empyrean is loaded with Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Array drivers. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine.

The skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminium. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you a natural transparency in the sound.

title: Meze - Empyrean
description:
Designed in Romania

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Drivers

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE FLAGSHIP THAT'S MADE FROM PASSION

The Empyrean is the result of two passionate companies coming together to give you an audiophile-level headphone. The powerful drivers are made by Rinaro, an audio company that has been at the forefront in the development of planar magnets since the 1980s. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

4 - 110,000 Hz

1. 2.5m OFC cable, 4pin mini XLR plugs ending with 6.3 jack connector or

2. 1.2m OFC cable, 4pin mini XLR plugs ending with 3.5 jack connector or

3. 2.5m OFC cable, 4pin mini XLR plugs ending with 4 pin XLR connector

*Vegan option available upon request.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Meze Empyrean?

The warranty period on all Meze Audio products is 2 years. Read more about Meze warranty.

Which drivers are used in Meze - Empyrean?

The Meze - Empyrean is loaded with Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Array drivers. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine.

What are the Meze - Empyrean made of?

The skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminium. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you a natural transparency in the sound.

Does the Meze - Empyrean require an amp?

Yes, it does require amplification. You can check out our collection of amplifiers and DACs here.

Does the Meze - Empyrean come with a travel case?

Yes, it does come with a Professional travel case.

Can the Meze - Empyrean be used for gaming?

No, these headphones are not meant for gaming.

title: Meze - Empyrean
description:
Designed in Romania

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Drivers

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE FLAGSHIP THAT'S MADE FROM PASSION

The Empyrean is the result of two passionate companies coming together to give you an audiophile-level headphone. The powerful drivers are made by Rinaro, an audio company that has been at the forefront in the development of planar magnets since the 1980s. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Array

4 - 110,000 Hz

IMPEDANCE

100 dB (1 mW / 1 kHz)

MAXIMUM SPL
130 dB

130 dB

Ovoid

102 mm x 73 mm

82 g

CASING
Fiberglass Infused ABS

DIAPHRAGM TYPE
Rinaro ISOPLANARÂ®

What are the Meze - Empyrean made of?

The skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminium. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you a natural transparency in the sound.

Yes, it does require amplification. You can check out our collection of amplifiers and DACs here.

Does the Meze - Empyrean come with a travel case?

Yes, it does come with a Professional travel case.

Can the Meze - Empyrean be used for gaming?

No, these headphones are not meant for gaming.

title: Meze - Empyrean
description:
Designed in Romania

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Drivers

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE FLAGSHIP THAT'S MADE FROM PASSION

The Empyrean is the result of two passionate companies coming together to give you an audiophile-level headphone. The powerful drivers are made by Rinaro, an audio company that has been at the forefront in the development of planar magnets since the 1980s. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

4 - 110,000 Hz

130 dB

130 dB

Ovoid

82 g

CASING
Fiberglass Infused ABS

Rinaro ISOPLANARÂ®

title: Meze - Empyrean
description:
Designed in Romania

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Drivers

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE FLAGSHIP THAT'S MADE FROM PASSION

The Empyrean is the result of two passionate companies coming together to give you an audiophile-level headphone. The powerful drivers are made by Rinaro, an audio company that has been at the forefront in the development of planar magnets since the 1980s. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

DESCRIPTION

THE FLAGSHIP THAT'S MADE FROM PASSION

The Empyrean is the result of two passionate companies coming together to give you an audiophile-level headphone. The powerful drivers are made by Rinaro, an audio company that has been at the forefront in the development of planar magnets since the 1980s. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

What are the Meze - Empyrean made of?

The skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminium. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you a natural transparency in the sound.

description:
Designed in Romania

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Rinaro Isodynamic Hybrid Drivers

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE FLAGSHIP THAT'S MADE FROM PASSION

The Empyrean is the result of two passionate companies coming together to give you an audiophile-level headphone. The powerful drivers are made by Rinaro, an audio company that has been at the forefront in the development of planar magnets since the 1980s. The drivers have been hand-assembled and tested in the Rinaro industrial facility in Ukraine. The rest of the headphone has been crafted using Mezeâ€™s gorgeous aesthetics and user-centric design.

ULTRALIGHT, HIGH-QUALITY NEODYMIUM MAGNETS

Neodymium magnets are placed on either side of the ultralight diaphragm (Weighing only 0.16 g while having a 4650 mmÂ² of active area). These magnets are placed in a hybrid array which creates an efficient Isodynamic magnetic field. This ensures uniform activation across the whole diaphragm surface.

COMFORTABLE AND GORGEOUS TO LOOK AT

To reduce the amount of pressure on your head, the Empyrean features patented suspension wings which increase the contact of the leather headband with your head. The remaining skeleton of the headphone is made of light and durable carbon fibre as well as aluminum. The chassis is sculpted from one solid piece of aluminium to look gorgeous as well as control the airflow between the chassis and driver. This gives you natural transparency in the sound.

DRIVERS THAT ARE MEANT TO MATCH YOUR EAR

In order to create a powerful driver while keeping the weight at a minimum, Meze has created the drivers in ovoid shape, based on the anatomy of the human ear. The Empyrean uses a unique processing method that creates an ultralight yet rigid diaphragm. A custom-developed isotropic thermally stabilized polymer is used along with a conductive layer which is then enclosed in a fibre-glass infused ABS casing.

A UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR BETTER IMAGING

The power output has been increased by using the magnet array design as well as two coils â€” Switchback and Spiral. This unique combination generates an increased exposure of direct sound wave frequencies over the 110kHz range and improves imaging and localization by reducing the impact of shortwave time delays caused by diffused field reflections.

SWITCHBACK & SPIRAL VOICE COILS FOR DETAILED SOUND

The Switchback coil is placed on the upper part of the driver and reproduces the lower frequencies effectively while the Spiral coil is positioned on the driver directly over the ear canal and effectively avoids time delays by allowing the sound waves to directly enter into the ear. It effectively reproduces the mid and high frequencies at their best.

KEEPS MAGNETIC FIELDS AWAY FROM YOU

All drivers create a magnetic field. The Empyrean has special ferromagnetic ear pads that reduce the magnetic field while the ferromagnetic plates channel 12% of the magnetic field back into the driver improving its efficiency. It deflects an additional 95% of stray fields away from the head. An IsomagneticÂ® ear cup uses this magnetic field to hold the earcups in place.

title: SoundMAGIC - E11C
description:
Chi-Fi Excellence

V-Shaped Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Commuting

Ideal for the workplace

Ideal for Taking Calls

Metal Build

Tangle-Free Cables

Volume Controls

Being the prodigal son or the immediate successor to the yesteryear favourite and award-winner E10 was never going to be easy. The SoundMAGIC E11C however checks off all the boxes and adds in a couple of them too ensuring a betterment of the best.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

10MM FINE-TUNED DRIVERS

Experience a balanced sound in your music with the SoundMAGIC E11C. It features 10mm dynamic drivers that give you a detailed sound along with a warm, textured bass. A successor to the immensely popular and award-winning E10, the E11C is a more than worthy successor.

ALUMINIUM LIGHTWEIGHT BUILD

Step out in style with the SoundMAGIC E11C. The durable aluminium housings are made using a special high-precision cutting process. Each earphone is painted by hand. The result: A robust, lightweight and elegant in-ear.

SILVER PLATED COPPER CABLES WITH IN-LINE 3-BUTTON REMOTE AND MIC

Answer calls or control your music easily without reaching out for your phone. The SoundMAGIC E11C has a 3-button remote and mic that works with just about every smartphone. The SoundMAGIC E11C has cables that are made of silver-plated copper wires. This reduces the loss of signal quality giving you high-resolution sound and clarity more than you ever expected.

DOMED SILICONE EARTIPS FOR FIT AND SUPERIOR NOISE ISOLATION

Listen to your music without the disturbance of outside noise. The E11C uses ergonomically angled sound tubes. Its silicone eartips add up well for ample noise isolation. The SoundMAGIC E11C comes with soft silicone eartips which seal your ear canals completely. You get a secure fit and a comfort level you wish for.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on SoundMAGIC E11C?

SoundMAGIC comes with a 1-year warranty. Read more on warranty claim here.

Is the SoundMAGIC E11C compatible with all devices?

SoundMAGIC E11C works with all Android and iOS devices that support a 3.5mm jack. *Naught Jack*

Can I use the SoundMAGIC E11C wirelessly?

No! Since you were looking for wireless earphones I would highly recommend you to check the SoundMAGIC E11BT.

What is the sound signature of SoundMAGIC E11C?

The SoundMAGIC E11C comes with a v-shaped sound signature, it tends to deliver an equal amount of bass and trebles that adds excitement and is enjoyable.

Does the SoundMAGIC E11C have noise cancellation?

Nope, it doesnâ€™t, most earphones will have noise isolation based on their in-ear fit and the E11C has a pretty good comfortable ergonomic design. You could still hear that loud commuter screaming at his phone, but a bit reduced.

Does the SoundMAGIC E11C come with a mic?

The SoundMAGIC E11C comes with a three-button mic and remote for a on the go control.

Which Comply series will work with my SoundMAGIC E11C?

The Comply Audio Pro is compatible with your SoundMAGIC E11C

Does the SoundMAGIC E11C require an Amp?

As it has a high impedance of 42 Ohms so it will work perfectly fine with your smartphones and laptops. A little amplifications hasnâ€™t hurt anyone, though. Would recommend you to get the Shanling - UP2 for your SoundMAGIC E11C

Will the SoundMAGIC E11C get tangled?

The cables are made of Twisted-Pair Hifi Cable which makes it tangle-free. One less thing to worry about.

title: Audeze - LCD-XC (Music Creator Special)
description:
Designed & Made in USA

Flat Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

For Studio & Professionals

3 Year Warranty On Drivers

Closed-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Mini XLR Cables

DESCRIPTION

ENGINEERED TO PERFECTION

The LCD-XC (Music Creator's Special) is thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built using the finest, most luxurious materials combined with cutting-edge planar magnetic technology in California, U.S.A. It features the very same drivers as the LCD-X (Music Creator's Special), but in a closed-back design. This allows for better noise isolation and minimal sound leakage.

MADE FOR AUDIO PROFESSIONALS

Audeze headphones are trusted by professional engineers and music producers as their new reference. The LCD-XC (Music Creator's Special's) best-in-class accuracy & microscopic clarity makes them an irreplaceable tool for those requiring the most transparent audio reproduction available. The wide frequency range from 10Hz to 50kHz allows experts to easily pinpoint each element in a track, making mixing more accurate.

EXTENDED FREQUENCIES & LOWER DISTORTION WITH FAZORS

Fazors are special acoustical elements positioned on either side of the magnetic structure. They enhance transparency by affecting the sound waves generated by large planar diaphragms. A few of the benefits include extended frequency response, improved high-frequency extension and lowered distortion, with better imaging.

AUDEZE'S INNOVATIVE PLANAR MAGNETS

Acoustically engineered for accuracy Audezeâ€™s innovative planar magnetic technology delivers a clear and accurate sound that reveals everything on the recording. The LCD-XC (Music Creator's Special) has an efficient push-pull magnetic structure that is specially designed and self-closing. This ensures an acoustically transparent music listening experience. The double-sided Neodymium magnet arrays deliver a uniform driving force across the entire diaphragm for a near-zero distortion.

PROPRIETARY LOTUS DIAPHRAGM FOR A SMOOTH SOUND

Audeze's proprietary Lotus diaphragm has a printed circuit across most of its surface and is capable of handling maximum continuous operating temperatures of over 400Â° F. This gives the drivers a smooth, resonance-free frequency response, excellent internal damping, edge damping, very low distortion and an extremely fast transient response.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

What is the warranty period on Audeze LCD XC (Music Creator Special) and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period of the Audeze LCD XC (Music Creator Special) is of 3 years. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Audeze warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

The sound is Neutral yet dark.

Which devices are compatible with the product?

Audeze LCD XC (Music Creator Special) can be used with smartphones and amplifiers as it can drive sound from low powered devices.

Will these leak sound?

No, Since it an Closed back headphone it will not leak sound. So people next to you will not be able to listen to your music. Mind your own business.

Will it need an Amp?

Yes, to bring the best of these headphone an Amp is recommended. You could have a look at our collection of DAC/Amps here

Do I really need an Amp though?

We have an article that should help understand why an Amp is important. Read about it here

Is the carry case provided with the product?

No, it does come with a Professional travel case for protection and portability.

What is the difference between LCD 'X' Music Creator Special and LCD 'XC'Music Creator Special?

The LCD-XC shares the same drivers as the LCD-X, meaning that it offers the same level of detail and transparency. The only difference between the two is LCD 'XC' is a closed-back headphone whereas LCD 'X' is an open-back. Isolation VS Wide Sound Signature.

description:
Designed in Germany

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles
