DESCRIPTION

OPEN TO YOUR EARS, CLOSED TO YOUR EYES

Experience every nuance in your music with the HD 800 successor, Sennheiser HD 820. It gives you reference-quality audio that is very spacious thanks to the custom engineering drivers from Sennheiser. Every note sounds vivid and life-like, just the way the sound engineer intended it to be. The Sennheiser HD 820s sport a closed, circum-aural dynamic stereo headphone design that makes you feel directly connected to the music. Music emerges from silence and sounds so profound that would travel into a soundstage of amazement.

OPEN SOUND IN A CLOSED FORM FACTOR

Most audiophiles feel that music can truly be enjoyed only with the wide spaciousness of an open-back headphone. But, the Sennheiser HD 820 is here to change that with its special Ring Radiator transducers and unique glass covers. These covers are concave in shape and reflect the sound waves from the drivers to an absorber, thus giving you a similar open sound. Soundstage refers to being able to sense the spatial surroundings of a recording.

INGENIOUS KEVLAR-REINFORCED CABLES FOR MINIMAL LOSS

Each and every part of the HD 820 has been crafted by experts to give you the best performance. The impedance-matching cable is specially tuned and symmetrical to reduce capacitance. It has silver-wrapped OFC wires and ends with a balanced 4.4mm gold-plated jack. This offers superior contact resistance.

COMFORTABLE CIRCUMAURAL DESIGN WITH ALCANTARA EARCUPS

The Japanese Alcantra Earcups boast of suede-like fabric material that youâ€™ll find used for the interior of many high end automobiles and racecars. It definitely feels like an airy version of suede, as it doesn't have the heft of most leather materials. Also the fabric breathes, which is great for long listening sessions when you donâ€™t want to have to air out your ears. Handcrafted ear pads made of high-quality microfiber fabric and the ear cups are covered with a thin metallic mesh.

CRAFTED WITH THE BEST, FOR THE BEST

Only high-quality materials are used to make this headphone. This includes the comfortable handcrafted earpads as well as the robust metal headband. The HD 820 also looks great with its glass covers that let you view the inside components of the headphone.

description:
Designed in Japan

Flat Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Open-Back Design

Electrostatic Drivers

Needs Amplification

DESCRIPTION

YOUR VERY OWN CONCERT HALL, SOUNDS FOLD & CRAFTED TO PERFECTION

The SR-009S uses a diaphragm which consists of an ultra-thin plastic film. This film has a mass thatâ€™s close to zero and offers a high transient characteristic throughout the entire audio spectrum. The STAX SR-009S uses an evolved version of the Multilayer fixed electrode MLER (Multi-Layer-Elect-Rords) used in the SR-009. The edge of the electrode opening has been smoothened to reduce air resistance and improve sound permeability. To avoid resonance and the muddying of sound by such a thin electrode, it has been gold-plated with high specific gravity. This also gives you high speed, clarity, silky details and powerful texture. The guard mesh on the outer part of the headphone has been curved to increase sound intensity, improve resolution and lower the influence of sound reflection. The arc-shaped headband has a 10-step slider making it easier to adjust it to just about any head size.

HIGH PURITY, NOTHING ELSE, LIGHTWEIGHT BUT DURABLE & SUPERIOR COMFORT

The cables used in the SR-009S are similar to those used in the wiring of large-scale integration circuits or high-end audio cables. The copper wire has a purity of 99.9999% (6Nines). This is further silver-coated and finished for a better structure. Just about every part of the SR-009S is made of precise machine processed aluminium. This ensures that it is lightweight as well as durable. The thickness of the case has been reduced as much as possible to make the flow of condensation-and-rarefaction airwave from the sound element more smooth and to reduce resonance. The SR-009S has been crafted by experts. The soft earpads are made using the perfect blend of genuine lambskin leather and high-quality synthetic leather. This avoids sweaty ears and ensures long and comfortable listening sessions.

Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. PERFECT COMBO: ACCURATE SOUND + NOISE ISOLATION

The LCD-2 is the legendary headphone that made Audeze an industry leader. The brand has transferred this award-winning sound into a closed-back design. This reduces ambient sound, isolating you from the rest of the world. This is the perfect blend between audiophile-grade sound and superior noise isolation.

DEEP & CONTROLLED BASS WITH PLANAR MAGNETIC DRIVERS

Experience Audezeâ€™s proprietary planar magnetic technology. You get a powerful bass thatâ€™s deep and controlled. The ultra thin-film diaphragm ensures super-low distortion that brings out every delicate nuance in your music. The LCD2 Closed-Back delivers a rich as well as accurate sound.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

HANDCRAFTED WITH PREMIUM MATERIALS

Made in the USA, the Audeze LCD-2 Closed-Back are handcrafted using high-quality luxurious materials. It features Audeze's tonal balance and powerful bass that beautifully articulates the power and nuance of your favourite music. title: Audio-Technica - ATH-M50x
description:
Designed in Japan

Flat Sound Signature

3 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Drivers

Closed-Back Design

Replaceable Cables

The Audio-Technica ATH-M50x isnâ€™t going anywhere; the style, comfort and great sound are what makes these headphones a great buy. If you're looking for an all-around solid pair of headphones you can use for mixing, recording and monitoring, ATH-M50x is a great pick.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

THE OVERACHIEVER AMONGST ALL ITS M-SERIES SIBLING

As the most critically acclaimed model in the M-Series line, THE M50x hits the right spot when it comes to delivering a balanced sound. It seals your music in tightly with their contoured earcups, isolating all the ambient noise with no sound leakage, with minimal bleed. One of the top picks of online reviewers, top audio engineers, and cult followers agree, the M50x is an unmatched combination of audio and build-quality that gets the job done. Hour after hour, year after year.

HANDLES ANYTHING YOU THROW AT IT

The M50x produces stupendously clear, clean and most of all, accurately balanced and rich throughout the frequency spectrum making them an ideal studio headphones for listening to all types of genres. You can distinctly hear bright sounding vocals and instrumentals in one single track.

SUPERIOR SONIC PERFORMANCE BY 45MM CUSTOM TUNED DRIVERS

The drivers used in the Audio Technica ATH-M50x are 45mm large and custom made drivers with copper-coated aluminum voice coils and rare-earth magnets. M50x creates a large sense of scale thatâ€™s obviously the exact opposite of cluttered and muddy-sounding audio.

CUTTING-EDGE ENGINEERING AND ROBUST CONSTRUCTION

The M50x, even though made of plastic, is known for its use of high quality textured matte construction and overall solid durability. The Pro grade material has been used for the ear cups as well as the headband.

90Â° SWIVELING CLOSED-BACK EARCUPS FOR ONE-EAR MONITORING

Circumaural design contours around the ears for excellent sound isolation in loud environments. 90Â° rotating ear cups ensure you can do some critical listening, one ear at a time.

STRAIGHT AND COILED SINGLE SIDED CABLE OPTIONS TO CHOOSE FROM

The M50x includes three cable options: 1.2m - 3.0m coiled cable, 1.2m straight and 3.0 m straight cable. The 3m straight single-side cable is designed to make these studio headphones convenient for studio tracking, mixing and field recording. They are very convenient in terms of usage and make life simple. Making them the top choice for studio tracking and mixing, as well as DJ monitoring and personal listening.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Audio-Technica ATH-M50x and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period is 3 Years from the date of invoice for all M-Series and E-Series (Pro Products). In order to claim warranty, please visit our Audio-Technica warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

The sound signature of the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x is?

Very flat. Essentially made for professional studio monitoring, you can expect a neutral sound from the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x. Bassheads, leave now before you set yourself up for disappointment.

Is the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x ideal for DJs?

No, they are not. You can have a look at the V-MODA Crossfade LP2 as it is ideal for DJ and live shows.

Does the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x come with an open-back design?

No, it doesnâ€™t. If you are looking for a wide soundstage our top recommendation will be the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro. It features an open-back design with much more detailing as compared to the ATH-M50x.

Will Audio-Technica ATH-M50x require an Amp?

Although your smartphone and laptop will be able to drive it, an amplifier would certainly bring out the true potential of the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x. Read more about amplification and why it's important here.

What is the difference between the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x and the Beyerdynamic DT770 Pro?

The Beyerdynamic DT770 Pro will have a flatter response, as accurate to the source as possible. The Audio-Technica ATH-M50x will have relatively extended low end in comparison.

Does detachable cable mean I can use it without the wire as well?

No, they canâ€™t. Detachable cables mean they can be replaced when they go south!

Are Audio-Technica ATH-M50x built to last? Could I use it when travelling?

Yes, they are durable and are travel friendly since they fold and a travel carry pouch is also included with the product.

Could I change the parts if they wear out?

Yes, we provide high quality replacement parts for the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x. You can replace the headband and the earpads from Headphone Zone directly.

How many cables does the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x come with?

The product comes with 3 cables: 3.9 to 9.8' (1.2 to 3 m) Coiled Cable, 9.8' (3 m) Straight Cable and 3.9' (1.2 m) Straight Cable. Who doesn't like options?

What devices is the Audio-Technica ATH-M50x compatible with?

These headphones are mostly used by studio professionals and come with a 6.3mm adaptor for use with consoles. You can also use the 3.5mm jack with your laptop or smartphone.

Is Audio-Technica ATH-M50x an ideal product for everyday casual use?

Ideally no. Because these require a dedicated amp for the best quality and because they're quite flat sounding, we wouldn't recommend these to casual music listeners.

How do Audio-Technica ATH-M50x stack up against Ultrasone Performance 820?

Both these headphones are flagship products under the 10k range having their strenghts and usability. To help understand better we have an easy to understand blog comparing the Audio Technica M50x vs Ultrasone Performance 820 here.

What is the impedance on the HiFiMAN Sundara?

The HiFiMAN Sundara comes with an impedance of 37Î©.

What do â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î©.

title: HiFiMAN - Shangri-La
description:
Chi-Fi Excellence

Flat Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Open-Back Design

Electrostatic Drivers

Needs Amplification

DESCRIPTION

THE ULTIMATE FLAGSHIP EXPERIENCE

The Shangri-La is not just a headphone. It is a combination of an over-ear with a special tube amplifier that offers a sound worthy of it. This custom-made amp features the finest 300B tubes for an audio quality like none other.

24-SETUP LEVEL OF VOLUME CONTROL

Say goodbye to noise, even during the slightest change in volume. The 24-step level of volume control uses 23 separate resistors. This makes each volume level independent of the others.

HIGHLY OPTIMIZED THIN DIAPHRAGM FOR CLEAR SOUND

For the best sound experience, the Shangri-La comes with a diaphragm that is so fine (0.001mm), it is thinner than a strand of human hair. It has a nanoparticle coating which enables it to move extremely fast and gives you an unsurpassed high-frequency response.

DISTORTION FREE SUPERIOR SONIC EXPERIENCE

Enjoy music that flows through a range of frequencies from 7Hz to 120KHz. Like the diaphragm, even the metal mesh stators have a super-fine grating that let sound waves lower than 1 million hertz pass through without any distortion. The stators are crafted using a specialised metallic alloy. This gives you sonic stability with acoustically transparent audio.

EXPERIENCE 300B FOR REAL

Most headphones/amps come with transformers and capacitors to increase the voltage and drive the diaphragm. The Shangri-La has neither. Thus, nothing comes between the headphone and amp and you can directly listen to the four 300B vacuum tubes.

FLAGSHIP LEVEL COMFORT WITH SOFT HEADBAND, SPACIOUS EARPADS

The Shangri-La has been designed keeping in mind long music-listening sessions. The headphone is lightweight while the soft head pad is adjustable and ensures supreme comfort. The open-backed design gives you a view of the driver hard at work. Visitors are certainly going to come over for a second look.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

DRIVER TYPE
Nanotech Driver

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
7Hz - 12kHz

550-650V

CONTROLS & CONNECTIVITY

2. HiFiMan Shangri-La Electrostatic Amp

3. HiFiMan booklet

FAQs

What is the warranty period for this product?

The warranty period on all HiFiMAN comes with a 1 year warranty. To claim warranty read more here.

What sort of headphone is this?

The Shangri-La is an electrostatic headphone. It uses a diaphragm that is statically charged and is repelled/attracted to the stators nearby. You can read more about it here.

Electrostatic...hmmm...is there any danger of getting a shock?

No, these headphones are absolutely safe and you do not need to worry about getting a shock. There are many resistors to keep the current low. There is also a relay-based system that cuts off the output if there is any problem in the amp.

What is the difference between the Shangri-La and Shangri-La jr?

In a nutshell: The Shangri-La has a 300B vacuum tube amp while the Shangri-La jr has a 6SN7N vacuum tube amp. An important decision. Choose wisely.

Is there any risk of arcing?

Arcing is a situation when the voltage passing through the headphone increases suddenly and is transferred from one electrode to the diaphragm/ other electrode. This can cause heavy damage to the driver unit. Fortunately, the Shangri-La comes with a nanometer-thick dust cover that prevents arcing.

The soft lambskin earpads are adjustable so that they fit your head perfectly. For a great sound, the SR-007MK2 uses a Pure Crystal Ohno Continuous Casting (PC-OCC) cable. description:
Designed & Made in USA

Warm & Smooth Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

3 Year Warranty on Drivers

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

The Audeze LCD2C is still the greatest Planar Magnetic Headphones in this segment. The bass and warmth that you'd expect from an Audeze make them ideal for anyone starting their journey and looking for serious high-end headphones. Pair it with a good desktop Amp to make them sing.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

NEW HEADPHONE, SAME SOUND

What do you get when you take the LCD-2's drivers and remove the Fazor elements? The warm and energetic sound of the Audeze LCD-2 Classic. Seeing the popularity of the original LCD-2, Audeze decided to bring it back in a new & improved version â€” the LCD-2 Classic.

AUDEZE'S PLANAR MAGNETIC MAGIC

Unlike a dynamic driver with a cone or dome attached to a round voice coil, Audeze's flat, thin-film diaphragm has a printed circuit across most of its surface. When the circuit is energized with an audio signal it interacts with the magnets that move the diaphragm back and forth, creating a larger than life sound. Further, the double-sided magnet arrays deliver a uniform driving force across the entire diaphragm for a near-zero distortion.

HANDCRAFTED WITH PREMIUM MATERIALS

Made in the USA, the Audeze LCD-2 Classic are handcrafted using high-quality luxurious materials. It features Audeze's tonal balance and powerful bass that beautifully articulates the power and nuance of your favourite music. The gorgeous wooden rings are designed for the audiophile with a discerning ear & style.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

Audeze headphones are engineered and handcrafted in the USA to our exacting quality standards.

Will these leak sound?

Yes, Since it an open back headphone it will leak sound. So people next to you will be able to listen to the music you listen. Sharing is Caring.

Yes, to bring the best of this headphone an Amp is recommended. You could have a look at our collection of DAC/Amps here.

Do I really need an Amp though?

Can the LCD 2 Classics be used in a 3.5mm headphone output?

Yes, you will simply need the 6.5mm to 3.5mm adapter.

Audeze have taken the current generation LCD-2 drivers and removed the Fazor elements, aligning the sound of the LCD-2 Classic with that of the original LCD-2 launched in 2008.

DESCRIPTION

WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF EAR SPEAKERS, HI-CLASS SOUND

The innovative SR-L300 is, like all the others in Staxâ€™s Lambra series, an ultra-high fidelity device due to its electrostatic technology. It produces a sound that would only be comparable to other loudspeakers (& not headphones). Hence, it is only fair that this headset be called an Earspeaker. Keeping in line with its predecessors, the SR-L300 has top notch sound quality. Stainless photo etched electrodes are fixed securely for a clear transparent audio. The headphone gives a balanced sound with delicate highs, soothing mids and a deep bass.

WHY ELECTROSTATIC HEADPHONES?, LET YOUR MUSIC SOUND ITS BEST

Electrostatic designed have been pioneered by Stax and they are clearly at the top of the game. The electrostatic headphones operate on a an unconventional level unlike other headphones that feature dynamic and moving coil designs. In most headphones, the drivers are heavier, making it difficult to recreate detail in playback due to mass. To keep the quality of music from deteriorating, the Stax SR-L300 uses an Oxygen Free Copper (OFC). This cable uses a wide flat structure to reduce the capacitance between wires and to drive it effectively so that your music always sounds its best.

ARTIFICIAL LEATHER EARPADS, EXTREME COMFORT

Everything about the SR-L300 is made to enhance the sound and your listening experience. This also includes the artificial leather earpads. The flexibility of these earpads provides added comfort while letting you feel the freshness of your music. The SR-L300 is made for comfortable listening. The stepless slider mechanism, lets you adjust the soft headpad for a better fit. This avoids fatigue and enables you to entirely immerse yourself in the music.

DESCRIPTION

BETTERMENT OF THE BEST: THE E10C

The SoundMAGIC E10C has been designed and modelled on its predecessor the award-winning E10. Retaining everything from sound, to build and quality. The E10C offers an in-line microphone and remote that offers universal compatibility and works with Apple and Android alike.

10MM DYNAMIC DRIVERS FOR AWARD-WINNING SOUND QUALITY

Experience detailed high-quality sound with the SoundMAGIC E10C's 10mm dynamic drivers. With a powerful, precise and natural sounding bass, these in-ears sound exceptional with any music genre. Choose the right fitting eartip to experience sound output.

UNIVERSALLY COMPATIBLE 3-BUTTON REMOTE AND MIC

A chip added in the volume control panel automatically switches between Android and iOS operating systems so you can control your music and volume controls according to the device you use.

title: Audeze - LCD-MX4
description:
Designed & Made in USA

Flat Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

3 Years Warranty On Drivers

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Mini XLR Cables

DESCRIPTION

TRUSTED BY AUDIO PROFESSIONALS WORLD-WIDE

The LCD Reference Series is trusted by audio professionals all over the world for its neutral and accurate sound. The Audeze LCD-MX4 is one such headphone that allows you to mix and master with its transparency and studio-quality sound. It's engineered using premium materials at Audeze's factory in California, USA.

ACCURATE SOUND REPRODUCTION WITH ADVANCED PLANAR MAGNETIC DRIVERS

Hear every detail with microscopic clarity and transparency thanks to the LCD-MX4's planar magnetic drivers. The ultra-thin diaphragms and powerful Neodymium magnets deliver a magnetic force of 1.5 Tesla resulting in fast transient responses as well as a frequency range of 10Hz and 50kHz. You'll be able to identify and localize each & every element in the track with ease.

DESIGNED FOR LONG USE IN THE STUDIO

The LCD-MX4 is designed to be used for long hours in the studio. Hence, it is significantly lighter than the other LCD models. It is crafted from carbon fibre and lightweight magnesium. Soft memory foam earpads add to the comfort.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Audeze - LCD MX4 and how do I claim it?

The warranty period of the Audeze LCD MX4 is of 3 years. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Audeze warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

Where are these headphones made?

Audeze headphones are engineered and handcrafted in the USA to our exacting quality standards.

How does the Audeze LCD MX4 sound?

The LCD-MX4 represents the fusion of the Flagship series and Reference lines. Analytical and Musical.

Does the LCD MX4 require amplification?

Yes, it does require amplification. You can check out our collection of amplifiers and DACs here.

Does the LCD MX4 come with a travel case?

Yes, it does come with a Professional travel case.

Can these headphones be used for Gaming?

No, these headphones are not meant for gaming.

Can the LCD MX4 be used in a 3.5mm headphone output?

Yes, you will simply need the 6.5mm to 3.5mm adapter.

Warranty & Media Reviews

3 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Audeze LCD-MX4 comes with a 3 year warranty on the driver and a 1 year warranty on the rest of the parts. Audeze's warranty covers all manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Audeze's warranty in India.

The Sony MDR-XB55AP has been made keeping only and only one thing in mind - to give people the biggest and deepest bass possible in a earphone below Rs. 2000/- Highly recommended for EDM, Bollywood and Hip-Hop lovers.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

12mm NEODYMIUM DRIVERS WITH BASS DUCTS

The MDR-XB55AP is built with 12mm Neodymium magnets that give you an exceptionally powerful sound. Its powered bass ducts have also been specially designed for extra deep bass.

STYLISH DESIGN. SNUG FIT. SUPERIOR COMFORT.

The MDR-XB55AP metallic colored earpieces give them a modern look and feel. The earbuds have been designed to snugly fit inside your ear canal. They stay put and lend you added comfort even during long hours of music listening.

UNIVERSALLY COMPATIBLE REMOTE

The in-line mic and remote control let you navigate quickly with the multi-function button. With this, you can switch between your music and calls with ease on both iOS and Android devices.

ONE LESS THING TO WORRY ABOUT

Immerse yourself directly in your music without wasting time untangling cable knots. The MDR-XB55AP's cables have a serrated flat design. This makes them tangle-free and ready to use whenever you need it.

SMARTKEY APP FOR CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION

Life just got simple with the Smart Key App. You can personalize these Sony Earphones with this by configuring your mic button to choose from Volume control or track control functions. The app is available on Play Store and is compatible with Android 4.0 and above.

Everything that I love about the Meze 99 Classics, but at a more affordable price point. Thats the 99 Neo. And I absolutely love them. Its also tuned with a more laidback and warmer sound for a more modern signature.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

A HEADPHONE THAT'S JUST AS SPECIAL AS YOU

The Meze 99 Neo is beautiful. Made from cast zinc alloy with a coal-black electroplated coating, it combines a contemporary black look with the best of the materials. The thickly padded memory earcups make a product that not only looks luxurious but also makes you feel special.

40MM NEODYMIUM MAGNETS FOR A RICH, BALANCED SOUND

A 40mm Neodymium magnet is placed on the side of each earcup and is designed to resonate in harmony providing a nice and wide soundstage. Rather than resorting to artificially tuned frequencies, the drivers provide dynamic contrast for a more natural listening experience.

COMFORTABLE FOR LONG LISTENING SESSIONS

Meze has done exhaustive research in order to find the right material and technology for each component of the 99 Neo. To combat discomfort of any kind, the manganese spring steel headband delivers even pressure for any head size. The earcups consist of memory foam earpads and soft PU leather making these perfect for long listening sessions.

BUILT TO BE STYLISH AND DURABLE

The headphones have cast zinc alloy hardware with an electroplated coating, stamped manganese spring steel headband and internal components are made of durable ABS and silicone parts. Construction uses no glue, just nuts and bolts. The cables are made with kevlar fibres, thereby combining the best of craftsmanship and sturdiness.

SERVICEABLE IN EVERY PART

The Meze 99 Neo is built to last you generations with its replaceable parts and sturdy build. Besides the usual warranty that every brand offers, the 99 Neo's parts are endlessly serviceable. Each component can be easily substituted for another. So, if any part of the headphone is damaged you can simply replace it instead of going for a new pair of headphones.

UNBOXED

Headphone Zone Certified UnboxedÂ Units
Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. Usually, the product's packaging may have gotten damaged in transit. Customers use a product once or twice and then return it with opened upÂ packaging.

WHERE DO UNBOXED PRODUCTS COME FROM?

Customer Returns Returned headphones are fully functional products that have left the warehouse and therefore can no longer be sold as new as their packaging has been opened. The product may have been used once or twice by the customer who returned it.

Transit Damages Sometimes we receive headphones in damaged packaging due to shipping accidents. These are brand new headphones with cosmetic flaws on the packaging.

Why Buy Unboxed Headphones?

Save Upto 15%
Since you won't get the original packaging, we give you a good discount compared to a new headphone.

Professionally Inspected
A thorough inspection means you receive a 100% working headphone with no sound output issues.

Original Warranty
All unboxed headphones carry the same warranty period as a brand new headphone would.

Unbiased Customer Service
We have the same Headphone Zone customer support experience for Unboxed Products or new products.

Unchanged ReplacementÂ Policy
Received a defective Unboxed unit? Return it under our Replacement Policy.

ALL Original Accessories
The unboxed headphones itself comes with all original accessories.

See More

DESCRIPTION

A HEADPHONE AS UNIQUE AND AWESOME AS YOU!

Experience pure luxury in terms of looks and sound with the Meze 99 Classics. This headphone has been lovingly handcrafted from wood and the satin-finished wood grain makes each headphone unique, just like your fingerprint. With these, Meze has worked to change the perception of headphones from being seen as technical devices or cheap plastic accessories to a mature product that you'll fall in love with.

A RICH NATURAL SOUND

Enjoy a crisp, balanced sound with the Meze 99 Classics. The 40mm neodymium drivers offer a clear, undistorted sound. Just sit back and put these on to enjoy the gorgeous sound of plucked strings, upbeat grooves or thumping beats that's natural and lifelike. In addition, the snug medium density memory foam keeps away noise while offering superior noise isolation.

HIGH-QUALITY AND LUXURY IN EVERY ELEMENT

title: Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO
description:
Designed & Made in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Tesla Drivers

The DT 1990 PRO were made to be an open back reference for the very best studios in the world. But they're so good that audiophiles can't get enough of them for their home listening! They certainly sound way better than their price would indicate.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

BRINGING THE TESLA TO THE STUDIO

The DT 1990 PRO is perfect for mixing and mastering in the studio. Professional users all around the world have placed their trust in Beyerdynamic studio headphones. They remain the number one choice for music producers, sound technicians and broadcast users and are a firmly established piece of equipment in studios worldwide.

OPEN-BACK DESIGN FOR AN EFFORTLESS SOUND

Natural and exceptionally spatial sound is achieved thanks to the open-back circumaural design. The optimized spatial sound reproduction makes the DT 1990 PRO headphones a reliable reference for mixing and mastering applications as well as for critical listening. Power and precision are critical requirements when it comes to sound reproduction. Brilliant highs, a richly detailed mid-range and precise bass combine to ensure sublime sound quality that is second to none.

MAXIMUM COMFORT, MINIMUM DISTORTION

The perfected design of the DT 1990 PRO combines innovation with decades of expertise in headphone technology. High-tech textiles and memory foam filled ear pads ensure exceptional wearing comfort. Headphones are so comfortable you almost forget you are wearing them.

45mm DYNAMIC NEODYMIUM TESLA DRIVERS

The DT 1990 PRO has Beyerdynamic's exclusive Tesla technology to thank for its balanced sound profile â€“ combining high levels of efficiency with distortion-free sound reproduction across all signal levels. The titanium-coated acoustic fabric means that every knob movement on the mixing desk is audible. Subtle variations can be picked up like an acoustic magnifying glass.

RUGGED BUILD AND REPLACEABLE COMPONENTS

The DT 1990 PRO is very durable. The headband has been constructed from steel and replaceable headband pads that are high on comfort for long listening sessions. All components are replaceable and ensure a long lifetime of the headphone.

TWO PAIRS OF EARPADS, TWO SOUNDS

Two pairs of ear pads are included in order to achieve the ideal sound characteristic depending on the use case. Velour ear pads provide an open sound and are perfect for mixing and mastering. A pair of leatherette ear pads provide a more closed sound making the headphones more well suited to monitoring applications.

A PLETHORA OF ACCESSORIES

The headphones come with two detachable cables, one straight and one coiled; a premium protective carry case, two sets of velour & leatherette earpads and two gold-plated Â¼-inch headphone jack adapters.

Specs

IN THE BOX

2. Two pairs of velour ear pads

3. Two pairs of cables(3 m straight and coiled cable)

4. Jack Adapter 6.35mm

5. Premium hard case

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

What is the difference between DT 1990 Pro and Amiron Home?

As a reference headphone for studio applications, the DT 1990 PRO features an accurate resolution and a differentiated stereo image. With a detailed reproduction of highs, it is the ideal tool for a precise analysis of the audio material to be processed. The Amiron home unfolds its full potential mainly at home. It combines a very precise bass with transparent mids and pleasantly clear highs. Its warm, laid-back sound with a fascinating spaciousness is excellently suitable for a relaxed listening to the music and provides a top-class audiophile listening experience..

Which plug is used for the detachable cable of DT 1770 / 1990 Pro?

This is a three-pin mini-XLR connection, the male part in the left earcup, the female one on the cable. Pressing the small button on the female plug unlocks the connection. The pin assignment is as follows: (3) - left hot, (2) - right hot, (1) - common return. The other end of the cable is equipped with a stereo minijack (1/8") with a screwable 1/4" adapter.

What's the difference between the DT 770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 PRO is made for musicians, sound engineers, producers as well as beginners looking for a reliable, sturdy and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 PRO was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

What do "Impedance" and "Ohms" mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î© like the T 1.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 1990 Pro model gives a warm and smooth sound.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 1990 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a open-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music better since it gives that natural sound output.

How is the overall fit of Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO?

Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 Pro fits over the ear and has plush earpads, making it a comfortable headphone to wear for long hours at a stretch.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO have detachable cables?

Yes, the cables are indeed detachable. Making for easy storage and convenient for whenever you want replace or upgrade cables.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO work well and loud enough with mobile phones ?

It gives enough output to be loud but then it also depends on your phone's internal amp and DAC

Are the DT 1990 PRO good for long useage?

Yes, you can use the DT 1990 Pro for a long time as it comes with high-tech textiles, and memory foam filled ear pads ensure exceptional wearing comfort.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO need an Amplifier?

Yes, since it has a high impedence which cannot be driven by a smartphone an Amp gives it the extra boost to the sound.

WARRANTY AND MEDIA REVIEWS

2 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Beyerdynamic DT 1990 PRO comes with a 2 year warranty from Beyerdynamic that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Beyerdynamic's warranty in India.

Read More

Read More

"Another terrific over-the-ear headphone from Beyerdynamic, the DT1990 Pro. I enjoyed my time, they're definitely worth an audition by anyone seeking a high-end home 'phone."
Read More

Read More

Read More

"Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO's sparkling highs, tight bass and detail retrieval make it great value for money for those looking for audiophile headphones that sound great with all types of music."
Read More

"Beyerdynamicâ€™s implementation of their Tesla design also shows technical prowess. The DT1990 PRO kick fast, woo with speed and attack and top it off with great separation and fine details."
Read More

"Like an absolute tank: Hand built in Germany at the Heilbronn factory. The 1990s are among the three newest 600-dollar, 250-ohm full-size Tesla headphones."

DESCRIPTION

A BRAINCHILD OF DJS AND MUSICIANS ALIKE

V-MODA has collaborated with musicians and DJs around the world to create a headphone with a refined and vibrant bass, lifelike vocals and crisp highs in an immersive 3D soundstage. This is done with its 50mm dual-diaphragm drivers and superior materials. With this headphone, you can experience pure audio without the artificial processing of battery-powered headsets. To ensure that these are ready for use and can consistently hit all notes, the Crossfade LP2 is tested at 6 different frequencies.

FLEXIBLE. STURDY. RUGGED.

Be it a range of temperatures, salt spray, humidity or UV exposure, the Crossfade LP2 will never let you down. It is built with a steel frame and interchangeable aircraft-grade metal shields. The SteelFlex headband is so flexible, it can bend flat more than 10 times while the cable can bend over a million times. The V-MODA Crossfade LP2 is tested according to Military-Level Quality MIL-STD-810G Test Standards. You can also carry your Crossfade LP2 safely wherever you'd like. The BLISS foam ear cushions take the shape of your ears for added comfort and noise isolation. Analogue sound isolation cuts out all outside noise while letting you enjoy your music without worrying about (a lot of) sound leakage.

TRUSTED BY MORE THAN 200 DJS, GRAMMY-WINNING MUSICIANS, AUDIOPHILES AND ARTISTS

V-MODA headphones are known for their blend of good looks that do not compromise on functionality. The Hex design, CliqFold, SharePlay, and V-CORK are a few of their patented or yet to be patented innovations. Each and every headphone from the Crossfade series has been created after developing over 100 prototypes and consulting more than 200 DJs, Grammy-winning musicians, audiophiles and artists.

THE SOUND OF KOSS: EXPERIENCE THE EXCITEMENT OF LIVE PERFORMANCE WITH KOSS PORTA PRO

Redefining the standards of personal listening around the world, the Koss Porta Pro provides the best of sonic performance and listening comfort. Whether you are in the comfort of your home or on the move, the Porta Pro will always offer accurate sound reproduction. Experience the excitement of a live performance with 'The Sound of Koss'.

HEAR-THROUGH CUSHIONS AND A COLLAPSIBLE HEADBAND FOR ALL-ROUND CONVENIENCE

Designed for total comfort, the Koss Porta Pro features open-air cushions and a collapsible headband. The hear-through cushions let you hear the ambient noise while the collapsible headband makes the headphone easily storable. You also get a protective carrying case with the Prota Pro for easy portability and secure storage.

PRESSURE RELIEVING ADJUSTABLE EARPADS FOR OPTIMAL COMFORT

Comfort is a must when you are listening to music. With adjustable temporal earpads on the Koss Porta Pro, you get the best possible wearing comfort. These earpads are designed to relieve pressure on the ears making these headphones perfect for long hours of music listening.

OXYGEN-FREE COPPER VOICE CABLES FOR A DETAILED AND CLEAR SOUND

With oxygen-free copper voice coils and dynamic components used in the Koss Porta Pro, you get to enjoy an exceptional sound that brings your favourite music to life. From a rich bass response to a remarkably wide frequency range never miss the intricacies of music with the Koss Porta Pro.

Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. CUSTOM-TUNED 8.5MM TITANIUM-COATED DRIVERS

While most companies selling in-ear headphones buy their drivers from outside suppliers, the RE-400's 8.5mm titanium-coated drivers were designed by HiFiMan engineers and are the company's own creation. Thus, making sure that everything is on par with their company standards. Impedance is rated at 32 ohms hence allowing easier connectivity. These custom drivers deliver the best in class audio performance and extended frequency response.

ERGONOMIC DESIGNED ALUMINIUM EARPIECES WITH HIGH QUALITY COPPER CABLES

Ergonomically designed, these earphones deliver the most comfortable fit for extended listening hours without causing fatigue. These earphones have an attractive, understated design with machined-aluminum earpieces. The 50-inch-long, neodymium magnets and premium cabling of oxygen free copper cable which ensures that your music is transmitted in its true form without causing any kind of distortion. The wires can either hang straight down or loop back over your ears.

CLASSY MONOCHROME DESIGN AND LIGHTWEIGHT BUILD

The earphones come in an extremely stylish looking design with a black body and silver accents. Convenient hands-free design allows you to talk on the phone clearly and safely at your home, office or on the road. The cable is wrapped up in rubber from the earbuds to the Y-splitter, thus making them very sturdy. The light weight design makes these IEMâ€™s highly portable.

10MM DYNAMIC DRIVERS FOR AWARD-WINNING SOUND QUALITY

The cable is covered in a high-quality plastic coating and is braided. This ensures that it has a strong tensile strength and your earphones last a long time. The twisted design prevents the earphones from getting tangled.

title: Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO
description:
Designed & Made in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Closed-Back Design

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Tesla Drivers

Replaceable Cables

They are very best in studio monitoring from Beyerdynamic. The DT 1770 PRO is a closed-back that serves as a reference in the best studios in the world.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

BRINGING THE TESLA TO THE STUDIO

Taking the Tesla Technology to a studio reference headphone for mixing, mastering and monitoring: the DT 1770 Pro features a modern and elegant design with components including end pieces, yokes, ear cups and headband that are very durable.

DESIGNED FOR STUDIO PROFESSIONALS AND AUDIO ENGINEERS

The DT 1770 PRO is a perfect circumaural headphone for high-end studio use of mixing and mastering. Due to its closed design with a high ambient noise attenuation, it is perfect for users in loud environments such as sound engineers when listening to PA systems or musicians.

MAXIMUM PRECISION, MINIMUM LEAKAGE

The closed-back design offers a wide soundstage and excellent resolution together with a precise, natural bass output making these headphones the top pick for professional studio use. Background noise is effectively suppressed, and leakage minimized thanks to the closed-back design. The DT 1770 Pro walks the fine line between pure flat response and slight boosting in certain frequency ranges to allow for clarity, richness, and depth. The clean highs are balanced with full-bodied, deep bass.

45MM DYNAMIC TESLA DRIVERS

Employing Beyerdynamic's Tesla 2.0 technology for the first time in professional headphones, the drivers utilize a triple layer composite diaphragm to reduce "partial oscillations," which results in a more detailed audio performance.

RUGGED BUILD AND REPLACEABLE COMPONENTS

The DT 1770 PRO is very durable. The headband has been constructed from steel and replaceable headband pads that are high on comfort for long listening sessions. All components are replaceable and ensure a long lifetime of the headphone.

TWO PAIRS OF EARPADS, TWO SOUNDS

Two pairs of ear pads are included in order to achieve the ideal sound characteristic depending on the use case. Velour ear pads provide an open sound and are perfect for mixing and mastering. A pair of leatherette ear pads provide a more closed sound making the headphones more well suited to monitoring applications.

A PLETHORA OF ACCESSORIES

The headphones come with two detachable cables, one straight and one coiled; a premium protective carry case, two sets of velour & leatherette earpads and two gold-plated Â¼-inch headphone jack adapters.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

DRIVERS
45 mm

DRIVER TYPE
Tesla Driver

MAGNET
Neodymium

IMPEDANCE
250Î©

SENSITIVITY
102 dB @ 1 kHz

5Hz - 40,000Hz

MAX INPUT POWER
200 mW

No

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS

1. Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO Headphones

2. 2 pairs of Velour ear pads

3. 2 Detachable cables

4. 2 gold-plated Â¼-inch headphone jack adapters

5. Premium hard case

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 1770 Pro model gives clean highs along with a deep bass sound.

Will the DT 1770 Pro replace the DT 770 Pro?

Yes, the DT 1770 PRO is an advanced version of the DT 770 PRO, made for audio engineers, producers and musicians who need a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

Which plug is used for the detachable cable of DT 1770 / 1990 Pro?

This is a three-pin mini-XLR connection, the male part in the left earcup, the female one on the cable. Pressing the small button on the female plug unlocks the connection. The pin assignment is as follows: (3) - left hot, (2) - right hot, (1) - common return. The other end of the cable is equipped with a stereo minijack (1/8") with a screwable 1/4" adapter.

What's the difference between the DT 770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 PRO is made for musicians, sound engineers, producers as well as beginners looking for a reliable, sturdy and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 PRO was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

What do "Impedance" and "Ohms" mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î© like the T 1.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 1770 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a closed-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music even better thanks to its natural noise isolation.

How is the overall fit of Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO?

Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 Pro fits over the ear and comes with plush pads, which make it plenty comfortable for the majority of users.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO have detachable cables?

The cables are indeed detachable.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO work well and loud enough with mobile phones ?

It will work, but not well enough to do justice to the product. You would better off using these with a good DAC and Amplifier.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO need an Amplifier?

Yes, since it has a high impedence which cannot be driven by a smartphone an Amp gives it the extra boost to the sound

Works with Android & iOS

Replaceable Cables

These were my first pair of serious Headphones. I would listen to every genre track on them. It's gorgeous to look at, and sounds better than anything else in the segment. They're timeliness. I hope to hand them to my kids someday.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

A HEADPHONE AS UNIQUE AND AWESOME AS YOU!

Experience pure luxury in terms of looks and sound with the Meze 99 Classics. This headphone has been lovingly handcrafted from wood and the satin-finished wood grain makes each headphone unique, just like your fingerprint. With these, Meze has worked to change the perception of headphones from being seen as technical devices or cheap plastic accessories to a mature product that you'll fall in love with.

A RICH NATURAL SOUND

Enjoy a crisp, balanced sound with the Meze 99 Classics. The 40mm neodymium drivers offer a clear, undistorted sound. Just sit back and put these on to enjoy the gorgeous sound of plucked strings, upbeat grooves or thumping beats that's natural and lifelike. In addition, the snug medium density memory foam keeps away noise while offering superior noise isolation.

HIGH-QUALITY AND LUXURY IN EVERY ELEMENT

Apart from wood, the 99 Classics also use cast zinc and manganese spring steel. The headband ensures even pressure for long listening sessions. The headpad and earpads are made from PU leather. Everything is then put together using nuts and bolts. This makes the headphone fully serviceable. The entire headphone is made from only premium materials, no glue or plastic.

MADE WITH CARE USING AN EXTENSIVE PROCESS

Each Meze 99 Classics takes almost 45 days to be made. The wood used is harvested from mature trees that have reached the end of their life cycle. This ensures that there is no harm done to the environment while giving you that rich, natural sound. To further enhance the colours, the wood goes through extensive air drying and shaping by hand and CNC machines, a process that takes almost 8 hours. It then goes through sanding, lacquering, finishing, careful inspection and is finally assembled.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Meze 99 Classics?

The warranty period on all Meze Audio products is 1 year. Read more about Meze warranty.

Is the Meze - 99 Classics foldable?

No, you cannot fold the headphones but you could definitely detach the cable for portability.

Which devices are compatible with the Meze 99 Classics?

The Meze 99 Classics are compatible with all Android and iOS devices that has a 3.5mm audio jack slot.

Does Meze 99 Classics have Noise cancellation?

No, it has a noise isolation feature thanks to itâ€™s closed back on ear design and fit. Noise isolation just minimilizes the sound to a certain extent while still being able to hear the surrounding commotions of life.

I love bass. Will I be happy with how these sound?

It is not bass heavy but rather a very warm sound signature that means it will have good clarity and a bit enhanced bass.

Will the Meze - 99 Classics need an Amp?

The Meze 99 Classics will not usually need an amp, but if you are a bass lover then you will love the extra oomph the amp will add.

Is the carry case provided with the Meze - 99 Classics?

Yes it does come with a EVA carry case for comfortable portability and protection from damaging the headphones.

How does Meze 99 Classics being made of wood make a difference?

The 99 Classic come with a wooden finish that add more warmth to the overall sound.

What is the difference between Meze - 99 Classics and Meze - 99 Neo?

To understand the difference between these two headphones I would highly recommend you to check this blog out; Meze 99 Classics vs Meze 99 Neo.

How do I know I'm making the right choice?

We understand that choosing a headphone can be a tough job having being given so many variations so this blog should help simplfy your doubts on the right choice on headphones

title: Audeze - LCD-3
description:
Designed & Made in USA

Balanced Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

3 Years Warranty On Drivers

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Mini XLR Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE MOST TRUSTED HEADPHONE BY AUDEZE

The Audeze LCD-3 is a thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built headphone. Its best-in-class accuracy makes it an irreplaceable tool for those requiring the most transparent audio reproduction available. Step into a new world of music, full of rich detail, low-end clarity and overall accuracy.

ENJOY EXTENDED FREQUENCIES & LOWER DISTORTION

The LCD-3 uses Fazors, special acoustical elements positioned on either side of the magnetic structure. They enhance transparency by affecting the sound waves generated by large planar diaphragms. A few of the benefits include extended frequency response, improved high-frequency extension and lowered distortion, with better imaging.

EXPERIENCE AUDEZE'S PROPRIETARY PLANAR MAGNETIC DRIVERS

Rather than use standard headphone drivers that operate like miniature woofers or tweeters, the LCD-3 uses a large, 6.17-square-inch thin-film planar magnetic driver that's embedded with Audeze's proprietary Lotus diaphragm that's thinner than a human hair for fast response times. This gives a smooth, resonance-free frequency response, excellent internal damping, edge damping, very low distortion and extremely fast transient response.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

HANDCRAFTED WITH PREMIUM MATERIALS

Made in the USA, the Audeze LCD-3 are handcrafted using high-quality luxurious materials. It features Audeze's tonal balance and powerful bass that beautifully articulates the power and nuance of your favourite music. The gorgeous wooden rings are designed for the audiophile with a discerning ear & style. The real lambskin leather or Microsuede earpads and headband use acoustical foam for the best fit and sound.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

MAX INPUT POWER
15W (for 200ms)

IMPEDANCE
110 Ohms

SENSITIVITY
102dB

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
5Hz â€“ 20kHz extended out to 50kHz

MAGNET TYPE
Neodymium

CONTROLS & CONNECTIVITY

WIRED CONNECTIVITY
3.5mm to 1/4in stereo adaptor

MICROPHONE
No

DESIGN & BUILD

WEARING STYLE
Over-Ear

CABLE TYPE
2.5m 1/4in to dual 4-pin mini-XLR cable, 2.5m 4-pin XLR to dual 4-pin, Mini-XLR cable

WEIGHT
543g

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS
1. Audeze - LCD-3 Headphones

2. 2.5m 1/4in to dual 4-pin mini-XLR cable

3. 3.5mm to 1/4in stereo adapter

4. Ruggedized travel case

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Audeze - LCD 3 and how do I claim it?

The warranty period of the Audeze LCD 3 is of 3 years. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Audeze warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

Where are these headphones made?

Audeze headphones are engineered and handcrafted in the USA to our exacting quality standards.

How is the sound signature of Audeze LCD 3?

It is very hard to describe in words but I can say these headphones still retain the iconic warmth and vibrant presentation that have captivated listeners for more than a decade.

Does the LCD 3 require amplification?

Yes, it does require amplification. You can check out our collection of amplifiers and DACs here and desktop Amps here

Do the LCD 3 come with a travel case?

Yes, it does come with a Ruggedized travel case.

How would you describe the sound of LCD 3?

Luxuriously spacious with warm tonal balance and powerful bass.

Can these headphones be used for Studio purposes?

Yes, they can be used for Mixing & Mastering.

Can the LCD 3 be used in a 3.5mm headphone output?

Yes, you will simply need the 6.5mm to 3.5mm adapter.

Warranty & Media Reviews

3 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Audeze LCD-3 comes with a 3 year warranty on the driver and a 1 year warranty on the rest of the parts. Audeze's warranty covers all manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Audeze's warranty in India.

title: Shure - SRH1540
description:
Designed in the USA

Balanced Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Closed-Back Design

40mm Dynamic Drivers

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

40MM NEODYMIUM DRIVERS TUNED TO PERFECTION

SRH1540 is a pair of premium headphones from Shure which are designed for professionals and personal audio requirements. These closed-back headphones offer excellent acoustic performance, comfort and high-end durability. It features 40 mm neodymium drivers which allows the headphone to deliver an extensive soundstage with extreme clarity in high frequencies and rich low end frequencies.

CIRCUMAURAL CLOSED-BACK DESIGN FOR LONGER LISTENING

SRH1540 consists of Steel driver frame along with a vented center pole piece which not only helps to enhance linearity but also reduces internal resonance so that you can enjoy top class performance at all listening levels. The diaphragm which is used in these headphones is made of APTIV Film that improves linearity and lowers Total Harmonic Distortion (THD).

DETACHABLE KEVLARâ„¢ REINFORCED CABLES

The dual exit oxygen-free copper cable has a Kevlarâ„¢ reinforced jacket for superior performance and durability. The gold-plated MMCX connectors also ensure secure connection and detachability for easy storage or replacement.

DURABLE. PORTABLE. SUPREMELY STURDY.

The 2.1m detachable cable provides plenty of length, the replaceable velour ear pads ensure long product life and Shure's promise of excellent quality withstands all the tribulations of day-to-day lives. These headphones come with a hard zippered case that provides protection from the elements and portability.The lightweight construction featuring aircraft-grade aluminum alloy yoke and stainless steel grilles also enhances portability along with durability.

DESIGNED FOR LONGER LISTENING SESSIONS KEEPING YOUR COMFORT IN MIND

These headphones are super light in weight as well as highly durable owing to its aluminum alloy and carbon fiber body. Moreover these headphones come with replaceable Alcantara ear pads which have slow-recovery foam making the headphones uber comfortable to wear. This also leads to effective noise isolation. The adjustable headband is highly padded and is ergonomically designed for comfortable music listening experience.

TWO CABLES OPTIONS AND ACCESSORIES TO CHOOSE FROM

SRH1540 is supplied with a storage case, replacement set of velour ear pads, replacement cable, and threaded adapter ensure years of uninterrupted listening enjoyment. The Kevlarâ„¢ reinforced cable provides plenty of length, the replaceable earcup pads ensure long product life and Shure's promise of excellent quality. The standard straight cable can be used for all the tribulations of day-to-day lives. Also, the headphones include a hard zippered travel case and a threaded 1/4" (6.3) mm gold-plated adapter.

SPECS

40 mm

2. a threaded 1/4â€ (6.3 mm) gold-plated adapter

3. zippered storage case

4. two detachable cables

Does the Shure - SRH1540 have detachable cables?

Does the Shure - SRH1540 need and amp?

Can I use the Shure - SRH1540 for long hours?

The SRH1540 headphones are packed with features that will enhance your mastering and critical listening.

Can the earpads be replaced?

Yes, they can be removed and cleaned so you have a clean and comfortable headset everyday.

What do â€œImpedanceâ€ and â€œOhmsâ€ mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Î©, 32 Î©, and 80 Î© are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Î© are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Î©.

description:
Designed & Made in USA

DESCRIPTION

MADE FOR AUDIO PROFESSIONALS

The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) is thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built using the finest, most luxurious materials combined with cutting-edge planar magnetic technology in California, U.S.A. Audeze made sure that they closely match transducers and even the earpads by leather texture and colour. All the earpads are filled with carefully chosen acoustical foam for the best fit and sound.

EXTENDED FREQUENCIES & LOWER DISTORTION WITH FAZORS

Fazors are special acoustical elements positioned on either side of the magnetic structure. They enhance transparency by affecting the sound waves generated by large planar diaphragms. A few of the benefits include extended frequency response, improved high-frequency extension, and lowered distortion, with better imaging.

AUDEZE'S INNOVATIVE PLANAR MAGNETS

Acoustically engineered for accuracy Audezeâ€™s innovative planar magnetic technology delivers a clear and accurate sound that reveals everything on the recording. The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) has an efficient push-pull magnetic structure that is specially designed and self-closing. This ensures an acoustically transparent music listening experience. The Double-sided Neodymium magnet arrays deliver a uniform driving force across the entire diaphragm for a near-zero distortion.

PROPRIETARY LOTUS DIAPHRAGM FOR A SMOOTH SOUND

Audeze's proprietary Lotus diaphragm has a printed circuit across most of its surface and is capable of handling maximum continuous operating temperatures of over 400Â° F. This gives the drivers a smooth, resonance-free frequency response, excellent internal damping, edge damping, very low distortion and an extremely fast transient response.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

ENGINEERED TO PERFECTION

The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) is thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built using the finest, most luxurious materials combined with cutting-edge planar magnetic technology in California, U.S.A. Audeze made sure that they closely match transducers and even the earpads by leather texture and colour. All the earpads are filled with carefully chosen acoustical foam for the best fit and sound.

description:

DESCRIPTION

PURE. PROFESSIONAL. PERFORMANCE.

The M-Series ATH-M40x professional monitor headphones are tuned flat for incredibly accurate audio monitoring across an extended frequency range. Now enhance your studio experience with superior sound isolation and swiveling earcups for convenient one-ear monitoring.

40MM DRIVERS WITH RARE EARTH MAGNETS AND COPPER-CLAD ALUMINIUM WIRE VOICE COILS

The drivers used in the ATH-M40x are 40mm large and custom made drivers with copper-coated aluminum voice coils and rare-earth magnets. They're fine tuned to deliver a superior sonic experience!

HITS THAT SWEET SPOT FOR BASS

The M40x is tuned flat for incredibly accurate sound monitoring across the entire frequency range spectrum to produce stupendously clear, clean and most of all, balanced. You can distinctly hear bright sounding vocals and instrumentals in a single track - which creates a large sense of scale thatâ€™s obviously the exact opposite of cluttered and muddy-sounding audio.

CUTTING-EDGE ENGINEERING AND ROBUST CONSTRUCTION

The M40x, even though made of plastic, is known for its use of high quality textured matte construction and overall solid durability. The Pro grade material has been used for the ear cups as well as the headband.

90Â° SWIVELING CLOSED-BACK EARCUPS FOR ONE-EAR MONITORING

The cups literally contour your ears and place them inside an air-tight enclosure that feels plush and comfortable. There is no pressure being placed against your ears as a roomy interior is provided. Circumaural design contours around the ears for excellent sound isolation in loud environments.

STRAIGHT AND COILED SINGLE SIDED CABLE OPTIONS

The M40x includes two cable options: 1.2 m - 3.0 m coiled cable and 3.0 m straight cable. The 3m straight single-side cable is designed to make the headphones convenient for studio tracking, mixing and field recording. They are very convenient in terms of usage and make life simple.

title: Beyerdynamic - DT 880 Pro
description:
Designed & Made in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

Semi Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Drivers

Deliver astounding accuracy with ease and grace, the DT 880 offer a wide, airy, open, spacious sound suited for production, mixing and mastering.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

EARMARKED AS 'THE STUDIO LEGEND'

Beyerdynamic developed The DT series in order to deliver optimal sound in a wide variety of applications and situations. They're dynamic with their headphone designs well suited for a broad range of environments. The DT 880 PRO are ideal for mixing, editing and mastering purposes. The unaltered neutral sound, top-notch stereo imaging, and the extremely high resolution make the Beyerdynamic DT 880 PRO studio headphones a top pick studio use. With the detailed stereo imaging, they help professionals pick up on errors immediately making them ideal for mixing and mastering.

ADJUSTABLE HEADBAND, VELOUR EARPADS FOR ADDED COMFORT

Soft earpads and adjustable, sliding, earpieces together with a single sided connecting cable ensure listening comfort during extended periods of use. Durability of the DT 880 Pro is unquestionable thanks to its spring steel headband. They are built to withstand the long hours at the studio and tantrums on the stage.

NATURAL SOUND AND SUPERIOR SONIC EXPERIENCE

The semi-open back design allows the studio headphones to create natural sounding music.The diaphragm has been made extremely light for better impulse performance. An extremely strong neodymium magnet system offers the DT 8800 highly detailed sound reproduction quality, and is mechanically very robust. This increased efficiency also leaves the DT 880 with greater power reserves for succinct linear response that is especially suited for high-achieving audio applications where appropriate sonic reproduction is of utmost importance, and dedicated equipment is available such as a headphone amplifier.

SEMI-OPEN, SPACIOUS AND TRANSPARENT SOUNDSTAGE

The DT 880's semi-open, over-the-ear design offers slightly increased sound isolation and reduced noise leakage, while retaining the high fidelity normally associated with open-back studio headphones. The semi open back also lets the studio headphones breathe which make the sound reproduced natural sounding and enhance it to a great extent.

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic DT 880 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic DT 880 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 880 Pro model gives a neutral and clear sound.

Does Beyerdynamic - DT 880 Pro come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 880 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is Beyerdynamic - DT 880 Pro an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a semi open over-the-ear headphone which gives a slightly increased sound isolation and reduced noise leakage

How is the overall fit?

Beyerdynamic DT 880 Edition comes with an adjustable headband so that it firmly and comfortably cradles your head.

Does Beyerdynamic - DT 880 Pro have detachable cables?

No,it does not have detachable cable.

Is Beyerdynamic - DT 880 Pro good for long useage?

Yes, due to it being durable, lightweight and soft earpads make music listening for long hours comfortable

Does Beyerdynamic - DT 880 Pro need an Amplifier?

Yes, since the driver units are bigger, they will need an amplifier so that the studio headphones can performance to its full potential.

Which hard case can I buy for my Beyerdynamic - DT 880 Pro?

You can get the Beyerdynamic - DT Hard Case for your DT 880 Pro.

Why isn't there a 600-ohms version of DT 880 Pro?

Since most headphone output in professional environments isn't designed for 600-ohms studio headphones, Beyerdynamic only offers headphones with a maximum impedance of 250-ohms.

What is the technical difference between DT 880/990 edition and DT 880/990 Pro?

The corresponding variants with the same impedance sound the same. As same transducer systems are used. The major difference is the edition models have a slightly softer headband for enjoying music at home while the Pro phones have a tighter fit onto the head for everyday work in the studio.

What is the difference between Pro and Edition models of DT 770, DT 880 and DT 990?

The Pro series is designed for professional users and the Edition series are designed for end users. Also, the Pro and Edition series do not differ noticeably in terms of sound provided that they have the same impedance (e.g. the 250 ohm DT 880 Edition and the 250 ohms DT 880 Pro sound the same)

45mm Dynamic Drivers

The old guard of studio headphones, DT 770 PRO has a sound that stands the test of time making it a worthy consideration for home and studio use. Albeit the old school design, it has very good comfort, supreme isolation and a clean sound quality.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

SETTING THE BENCHMARK FOR STUDIO HEADPHONES

The Beyerdynamic DT 770 PRO is built as an ideal studio monitoring headphone suitable for the most demanding professional and audiophile applications such as for recording studios, post-production or broadcasting situations.

LOVED BY PRODUCERS, MIXING ENGINEERS, SOUND ENGINEERS AND AUDIOPHILES ALIKE

Beyerdynamic DT770 Pro studio headphones have set an industry benchmark for reference audio sound and accurate sound reproduction. They are loved by music enthusiasts, music producers, sound engineers and broadcasters all over the world. These studio headphones are used in all the studios and have a great response towards the entire frequency range. It also delivers punchy detail in low frequency music.

YOUR STUDIO ON THE GO

DT770 Pro would never let you compromise with the studio sound you prefer to listen to, you can just hold them up and take them where you want.

CHOOSE THE RIGHT VARIANT FOR YOU

32Î© - The highly optimized 32 ohms variant is used for regular casual listening over laptops and smartphones. 80Î© - The 80 ohms is a wide choice for a range of studio applications. It is the most commonly used variant. 250Î© - The 250 ohms are more suitable for mixing and recording in the studios with audio interfaces and mixing desks.

EXCELLENT IMPULSE RESPONSE WITH A CLEAN SOUND

These studio headphones deliver a top-notch impulse response and exceptional isolation in a perfectly neutral listening environment. The high frequencies have detailed and differentiated sounds whereas the ultra-low bass sounds are defined and crispy.

SUPREME COMFORT WITH SUPERIOR VELOUR EARPADS

The DT 770 PRO comes with velour earpads while the 32 Ohm Limited Edition variant comes with leatherette earpads which is meant for long hours of wearing. The inner headband softly sits on the head and the nominal pressure of the headband is approx. 3.5 N which in simple terms means it gives adequate comfort.
